name: 2BR in Beautiful Brownstone!!!
summary: This charming apt has accents from the distant past yet has been renovated with the conveniences of today.  Newly renovated kit with stainless steel appliances, 8 ft tall windows, fireplaces, TV with wi-fi & is located in Bushwick Brooklyn  10 mins from city!
space: The 2 Bedroom apt is on the 2nd floor of a 125 year old brownstone.  The entire building has been renovated to keep the integrity of the home yet upgraded with all new plumbing and electricity to suit the needs of today.   Apt#2 has two fireplace mantels, two large closets, 8 foot windows, a kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a living room that gets loads of natural light.  It has views of the huge Cedar trees across the way, a beautiful landmark and a lovely garden in the back.  It is a beautiful, modern apartment with reminders of the past.

Newly renovated kit with stainless steel appliances, 8 ft tall windows, fireplaces, TV with wi-fi & is located in Bushwick Brooklyn  10 mins from city! neighborhood_overview: Bushwick was a brewery town back in the day.  The Brewery Town!!!  Bushwick provided the United States with 70% of their brew.  To this day you can still see the mansions left by the brewer's families. You can see them on Bushwick Avenue while you're walking from the train station!  Bushwick is a changing neighborhood filled with houses that were built in the 1800's and still standing.  My Brownstone is one of them, built in 1889!  Welcome and enjoy!
notes: The train station is only 4 blocks away.  Shopping, Laundry, Groceries and fast food eateries are steps away from there.  Bushwick is a prime area because it is 10 minutes away from the city during rush hours, 15 mins from Queens, and 30 mins from the Bronx. Bushwick has a mixed variety of cultures and experiences.  Welcome to Bushwick.
transit: The closest train station is located on Broadway & Gates Avenue on the J Train.  The J Train runs from the borough of Queens through Brooklyn through Manhattan and back through Queens again.  Queens is our biggest borough and Brooklyn is our most populated one.  Train maps will be provided for you upon your arrival.  Saratoga Park is the nearest park to the residence and is a 10 minute walk.
access: Unless there is an emergency, there is no permitted roof access and hanging out on the fire escape and in front of the building is not allowed.
interaction: My husband and I live on the bottom two floors, so help is not far if you need it.  We hope that you'll enjoy your stay and we're sure that you'll love the apartment.  :-)
house_rules: CHECK-IN TIME is at 9am  - 11am CHECK-OUT TIME is at 11am.   It is possible that it can be earlier or later if you ask the Host atleast 48 hours in advance. Please do not move any of your luggage downstairs until the Host is present at 11am, during Check-out. Any time change requests as per check-out must be made known to Host at least 48 hours in advance of Check-out time. •	LUGGAGE:  When taking your luggage in or outside.  Please do not drag the luggage up and down the inside or outside stairs.  It will cause damage that you will be responsible for. •	QUIET HOURS are from 11pm to 12 noon.  Voices carry so, no talking in the hallways please or stomping on the floors.   •	STAIRS:  Please, no running up and down the stairs at anytime   •	DOORS:  Please do not slam the doors and always be sure to close and lock the front door.  •	WINDOWS: Please make sure to close all windows upon leaving each day.  If rain, forecasted or not, creates standing water on the floor, the floor will be ruine

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a vocal musician who has traveled all over the world performing.  I love different things, places and meeting different people.  Making people feel at ease and providing them with what they need makes me feel good.  I'd love for you to find comfort in my home from when you open the gate and smell the fresh flowers from the garden to when you enter the furnished apartment and experience  the late 19th century perfectly blend with the comfort and amenities of the 21st century.  I am also a Kangen Water Specialist & Machine Distributor spreading good health with a machine that enhances the buyer's wellbeing with a machine the transforms harmful tap water into antioxidant water with a higher ph.  I cannot live without my Kangen water, my Husband, my family, music and my dog.

reviews.comments: Stephanie war sehr freundlich und hat uns toll aufgenommen. Der Kontakt war super und im richtigen Maß: Nicht zu viel, aber da, wenn nötig. Tolle Nachbarschaft mit Einkaufsmöglichkeit direkt nebenan.

Stephanie is a great host. She is very warm and helpful. 
We felt welcomed by her and her husband right away. 
The apartment is very spacious. From the apartment you can easily walk to the subway to go to Manhatten or the bus stop. 
There are different stores such as a grocery store and restaurants in walking distance. We had a great time there and would come again.

From the beginning of the booking process to the end of our stay, our host Stephanie and her husband Kevin were  gracious, accommodating and available! The apartment was clean, cozy and comfortable. The location was within walking distance to the subway system, drugstores,markets, and scrumptious street food vendors!
The apartment was a homely oasis after a long day of hitting the New York pavement. I will definitely  be highly recommending this AirBnb!

We spend an amazing stay at Stephanie's home . This place was quiet, large, beautiful, warmy and very clean. It was for us the best place to discover New York City, calm and near from Manhattan and a lot of great places in Brooklyn ! Stephanie and her husband are very friendly and helpfull people.

By far the best Airbnb host I've had thus far. Stephanie is very warm, generous and comforting. The apartment is everything you could imagine; spacious, full of light and beautiful. Stephanie went above and beyond in terms of communication and accommodation, even going so far as to set up a meeting at a dance studio by someone I idolized! She & her husband have succeeded in really making their apartment a home away from home. The apartment has a lot of literature on the area of Bushwick and the Brooklyn Burrough which were very helpful in my adventures. The apartment itself has original fireplaces, all new plumbing and electric. Just the perfect match of antique and modern, while still holding it's original integrity. Stephanie is also very fun to chat with; very knowledgeable about New York & the arts if that's what you're into. There's a corner store on the same block which is very convenient & the subway is about 3 blocks away. If you're not wanting to venture out, the Apple TV in the apartment will handle your Netflix craving! If I come back to NYC long term this will be the first listing I look for.

I can't thank more for what Stephanie and Kevin have done for us during our stay. They were extremely friendly and approachable. Everything was very tidy and clean when we moved in and sweet Steph also bought us alkaline water and so much more little things such as toothbrush and so on. They live just downstairs so I could easily go to them when I had problems. 
The trains are just a 5 min walk away and there's basically everything you need close by, like Walgreens, laundromat and so on.

The apartment was perfect and exactly as described with plenty of room for two. The air con worked well and the shower was great!
It was a five minute walk to the Gates Ave subway and there was no problem ordering an Uber from outside.
Stephanie was a kind host providing lots of information regarding the local area, maps and visitor guides. 
I'd happily stay again.

Lovely, comfortable apartment with great amenities in a historic brownstone! Stephanie and Kevin were accommodating, friendly hosts and included some treats on our arrival -- a bottle of wine and breakfast supplies to get us started, along with a warm  welcome. The apartment is located close to public transport and is just a train ride away from Manhattan -- very convenient and the hosts also provide a range of guidebooks and tips on Brooklyn for those keen to explore the surrounding area. Many thanks Stephanie and Kevin for a great stay!

Stephanie is a five star, AAA, +++ hostess. She is very nice, available, and helpful.
The apartment corresponds exactly to the description with a large living room, two comfortable bedrooms and well equipped for a daily life.
The apartment is 10 mn walk from the subway, 20 mn by subway from Manhattan downtown, and 40 mn by car from JFK airport.
The apartment is in a typical charming brownstone which makes you feel a real New-Yorker.

Increible el apartamento; todas las comodidades. La descripción y fotos totalmente reales. Una cama comodísima. Únicamente, comentar que  solo había una silla para poder comer en la mesa.
Stephanie siempre disponible en ayudar y en aconsejarnos lugares para visitar. En el apartamento hay todo tipo de foletos y información de la ciudad.
La ubicación del apartamento muy correcta. La zona no está tan animada de bares y locales como el vecino Williamsburg. Pero decir que el metro está a dos calles.
Nosotroz estuvimos casi dos semanas, y a la semana de estar Stephanie limpió el apartamento, nos sorprendió positivamente. 
Lo único que recomendamos a los próximos viajero a NYC es que hablen antes con el anfitrión por el tema de las maletas. No existen lugares de taquillas en los sitios públicos más céntricos como en la mayoría de ciudades.

Stephanie a été très accueillante, elle a toujours été présente si nous avions besoin d'aide ou de renseignements. L'appartement est super, très bien placé, proche de tout. Grâce à Stephanie, à sa disponibilité et à l'appartement, les meilleures conditions étaient réunies pour passer un excellent séjour !

I loved staying in this lovely home. The apartment was really beautiful, spacious and clean, within a short walk to the train station in a great neighborhood, and Stephanie and Kevin were amazing hosts, really friendly, helpful and accommodating. I look forward to staying here again, we had a great time during our stay!

Stephanie and Kevin were there to greet us on arrival helping us with our bags and ensuring we knew where everything was. When we had questions they were happy to assist whenever we needed. We really enjoyed the neighbourhood too. Felt like we were in the real NY and not just in a tourist area. But in day g that we could easily jump on the subway to get into Manhattan and took the train to Long Island for a day too. We would definitely come back.

Very pleasant stay in this apartment very clean and close to transports (less than 10 minutes walking). The description and pictures are exactly like the apartment. Good address for a trip to New York City without being in Manhattan. Laure, Julien and Gaspard.
Beautiful brownstone! Enjoyed our stay so much we want to come back!

I rate Stephanie's place as my best ever airbnb experience.
Everything is same as description and photos. 
It's about 8 mins away from subway station. 
Supermarket is just two blocks away. 
The apartment is so cozy and clean. 
We love the kitchen most, you have all the tools and seasonings. 
we will definitely visit Stephanie's place again when we travel to NY in the future.
This was my second stay at Stephanie's and just as before I loved it. The brownstone apartment has become my favorite AirBnb & Stephanie my favorite host.

We enjoyed our time at Stephanie's place. She was very welcoming and communicative even before we arrived, and always available if we had questions. 

The subway made it easy enough to reach her place and we definitely found it more economically viable and peaceful to stay outside the hustle and bustle of Manhattan.

Stephanie's place is an excellent base from which to explore New York City.  It is situated very close to the subway..but not close enough to disturb your sleep!  Similarly any noise from local traffic does not cone through to the bedrooms.  The apartment is clean and very well equipped.  Stephanie was very punctual for check-in and check-out, and also offered suggestions and tips on what to do.  Her consideration to offer an umbrella for the Columbus Day parade was especially appreciated.  Stephanie also checked regularly by e-mail to see how we were doing.

An earlier review mentioned that the area might appear to be a little run down, but from our perspective it is a very mixed area which reflects the whole neighbourhood in general.  We felt safe at all times even when returning very late at night.

We would have no hesitation to recommend this delightful brownstone.

Our stay at Stephanie's brownstone was an amazing experience. She was more than generous and accommodating for our multi-week business trip. The brownstone is very cozy, clean, and stocked with amenities. It is just a short walk to the train, a multitude of dining options nearby, and a quiet street. By far, Stephanie has been the best host I've experienced using Airbnb!
This house has been our home away from home for a week. Thanks to Stephanie our stay was very pleasant. Everything was perfect. This was a great first airbnb experience.

Stephanie and Kevin were great hosts.  We stayed for 12 days and the apartment was clean and comfortable.  The location was convenient as it was only a 5 minute walk to the subway and a 20 minute ride into Manhattan.  We would definitely stay at Stephanie's again if we needed an extended stay in New York.

Stephanie and Kevin warmly welcomed in Brooklyn. They made us immediatly confortable and familiar with the neighborhood.
We felt at home during the whole 12 days and the appt was exactly what we expected. The location is very convenient to explore all NY boroughs (Manhattan is not the only one!).
We thank again Stephanie and Kevin for the perfect reactivity every time we needed assistance during those freezing but delightful winter days.
Special thanks for the flexibility on Check in and Check out time, we really appreciated.
We warmly recommand Stephanie & Kevin who were entirely part of our trip.
Can't wait to come back in New York and renew the experience!
I  very much enjoyed my stay at Stephanie’s beautiful brownstone. She and her husband Kevin are wonderful hosts.

깨끗하고 3명이 묵으면 적당해요. 2층인데 생각보다 계단이 가팔라서 캐리어를 옮기는 게 힘들어요. 호스트가 도와주긴 했지만, 다른 한편으로 계단이나 마루바닥이 긁히는 걸 너무 염려해서 부담이 되었어요. 위치는 지하철 J (Hidden by Airbnb) 이 가깝긴 하지만 맨해튼 가는데 대부분 환승이 필요해요. 단점은 집앞 도로나 계단에서  나는 소음이 전혀 차단되지 않아 시끄럽다는거예요. 호스트가 관리를 꼼꼼히 하여 아파트는 깨끗하고 요리하기도 좋아요.

Cool 2 bedroom place. Stayed with my two teenaged sons. We loved being close to the subway for easy access to the rest of the city.
Stephanie is extremely welcoming and helpful, and knowledgeable about the area.

Het appartement in Brooklyn is minder dan 10 minuten lopen van de subway die je rechtstreeks naar Manhattan brengt. Het appartement heeft ruime woonkamer, 1e slaapkamer en kleine 2e slaapkamer. Mooie uitvalbasis voor 2 personen, eventueel met kind. Stephanie is hartelijke gastvrouw die snel reageert op onze vragen. Airco aanwezig maar alleen voelbaar in woonkamer, slaapkamers vrij warm (was ook 35°C buiten).  Winkels en eettentjes in de buurt. Wij hebben er 8 mooie dagen overnacht en prijs/kwaliteit is goed.

Stephanie is a very detail-oriented host who carefully listens to one's situation/wishes/tastes and will proactively give out pieces of advice and recommandations accordingly.
The appartment looks exactly like the pictures. It is well located, clean and very well equiped.  And the beds are as comfortable as they could be!!
I had an amazing stay in New York  and Stephanie being a top quality host definitely played a big part in this experience!! 
Highly recommanded!! Thanks again!!
A spaceous and beautiful apartment, close to the subway and everything you need actually, worming and kind hosting!

I stayed with two of my friends in Stephanie's apartment during our two weeks vacation in New York City. It looks exactly like the pictures and it was everything we were looking for. It was close to the subway the neighborhood was really nice and we enjoyed exploring it during our stay. Stephanie were an amazing host, really nice, she answered all our questions and were ready to help us during all of our stay. The flexibility when it comes to check it and check out times was really appreciated. We had an amazing time in NYC during our stay and we recommend it for anyone who's looking for a place to stay in New York City.
Thank you
Stephanie is a very kind and caring host and she has a wonderful, cozy apartment. We enjoyed our vacation in NYC and our stay at Stephanie's place a lot. Thanks so much again!!

Great apartment, so beautiful and clean. Very close to Subway station (J train takes you directly to Manhattan).
The host, Sthepanie was so nice and helpful, way more then we could have expected.

I stayed at Stephanie's place with my daughter for 20 days. The flat is exactly as in the photos! We had a lovely stay. Stephanie and Kevin are wonderful hosts they are very accommodating, caring, thoughtful, very discrete and have a lot of very interesting information to give you. The flat is very beautiful, cozy and comfortable. It is close to the subway with very easy access to Manhattan and the rest of Brooklyn. This was by far the best experience I had with Airbnb  up till now. I will certainly come back and I recommend it to anyone who wants to have a wonderful time in New York.

It is certainly a pleasure to say how wonderful our stay in Stephanie's Brooklyn brownstone apartment was. Stephanie is a warm and welcoming host and this apartment is the perfect home-away-from home. It turned out to be exactly as depicted on the website (but larger than expected!), with a wonderful location close to the subway to allow us to easily explore Manhattan.
The living room was spacious and comfortable, the kitchen well-equipped, the bedrooms luxurious with comfortable beds and warm blankets, the building well-maintained and centrally located close to supermarkets, laundry, restaurants, subway and bus stops. All was spotlessly clean and the linens and towels generously supplied. The mid-week cleaning was an unexpected bonus. 
We visited during winter and the central heating was warm and reliable and the apartment has its own hot water system so we never ran out of hot water!
The apartment could not be better located and Stephanie's suggestions both in person and in the binder in the apartment provided an insider's view of Brooklyn and Manhattan.
Everything about our experience was first class and exceeded our expectations in every way. I would not hesitate to recommend this apartment to anyone travelling to Brooklyn or Manhattan - it is absolutely perfect!

Stephanie and Kevin were great.  They were always responsive to our questions and concerns whether by text or in person.  Location was primo:  Easy to get to Manhattan and other neighborhoods in Brooklyn, and having groceries and liquor stores nearby was nice.  Stephanie had some local suggestions that we took her up on and are glad we did.  Check out SEA (Thai-club-tropical-bar vibe), which had delicious, beautifully presented food and strong service.  Visiting NYC during Christmas has long been a goal of ours, and having a comfortable, close-in location helped make it a wonderful gift to ourselves.  We appreciated their hospitality and had a great time.  Two thumbs up and big recommendation for staying here.

name: Magnífica casa.Vista espetacular!
summary: Casa magnífica no bairro Jardim Botânico com vista espetacular para o Cristo, lagoa, montanhas e mar. 3 amplas salas, piscina, jardim, garagem para 2 carros, elevador, 6 quartos sendo 3 suítes . Localização privilegiada. Segurança 24 horas na rua.
space: Nossa casa é extremamente arejada e iluminada. A proximidade com a mata atlântica faz com que o ar seja fresco e puro. Macacos-prego, tucanos, sabiás, andorinhas, bem-te-vis, maritacas e demais pássaros visitam nossos jardins com frequência.

Macacos-prego, tucanos, sabiás, andorinhas, bem-te-vis, maritacas e demais pássaros visitam nossos jardins com frequência. No inicio da locação e na entrega das chaves. Também gosto muito de interagir com meus hóspedes, mas depende da abertura de cada um e do meu tempo disponível. A casa possui caseiro que mora no local, o qual estará presente todos os dias, das 7h30 às 16h, dando assistência, se encarregando de pequenos reparos e cuidando da limpeza das áreas externas, incluindo a piscina. summary: L appartement etait renove il y a 1 an. Il est completement meuble et equipe. Il est tres spacieux, lumineux et calme. Il est situe entre Plateau et Mile End, 2 minutes du metro Laurier.

name: Tropical Beach House, 2 bed/2 bath, full kitchen
summary: Tropical two bedroom, two bath beach house located in a quiet, country style residential neighborhood.  Just a two minute walk from one of the most spectacular beaches in Hawaii!    Full kitchen, AC in bedrooms, eat outside on the lanai, beautiful garden w/BBQ.     Lots of amenities including WiFi, boogie boards, beach chairs, sun umbrella, coolers. Fall asleep to sweet ocean breezes, wake up to a glorious sunrise!
space: Ocean~Song Beach House is well decorated and totally tropical, a very clean and comfortable home for your island getaway. It features two bedrooms with air conditioning, one with a king bed and the other has a queen.  (There is also a packnplay and a floor futon available upon request.)  There are two full baths, and a spacious living room which opens directly to a large kitchen.   The kitchen has a full size refrigerator, flat-top oven and stove, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, rice cooker, and blender.  There is also a propane BBQ grill for guests in the garden! Sliding glass doors open from the living room to a covered porch, which looks out to a very lush and private tropical garden. There are lots of amenities, including beach chairs, beach mats, boogie boards, a sun umbrella and coolers for the beach.  The house has start-up supplies of t.p., paper towels, garbage bags, and some spices and condiments. Waimanalo is a truly special place, ideal for those travelers who want to get
description: Tropical two bedroom, two bath beach house located in a quiet, country style residential neighborhood.  Just a two minute walk from one of the most spectacular beaches in Hawaii!    Full kitchen, AC in bedrooms, eat outside on the lanai, beautiful garden w/BBQ.     Lots of amenities including WiFi, boogie boards, beach chairs, sun umbrella, coolers. Fall asleep to sweet ocean breezes, wake up to a glorious sunrise! Ocean~Song Beach House is well decorated and totally tropical, a very clean and comfortable home for your island getaway. There are two full baths, and a spacious living room which opens directly to a large kitchen.   The kitchen has a full size refrigerator, flat-top oven and stove, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, rice cooker, and blender.  There is also a propane BBQ grill for guests in the garden! Sliding
neighborhood_overview: Waimanalo is a truly special place, ideal for those travelers who want to get off the beaten path.  We have the longest beach on the island----five miles of white sand and turquoise waters!  And the best thing is that it's so peaceful here, most days you can walk for a couple of miles and only see a handful of people!  Gorgeous sunrises.  Great for boogie boarding and snorkeling. There are quite a few really good little resturants in easy walking distance from the cottage:  Ono's Steak and Shrimp Shack, I Love Nalo (vegan), the Waimanalo Beach Cafe, Keneke's Plate Lunch.
notes: Please Note: upon arrival guests will be asked to pay the Hawaii hotel tax of 14.97%. Please bring cash for this payment. Mahalo! When a reservation is made I will send a detailed rental agreement for you to sign and scan back to me. I ask that this be returned to me within 48 hours of making a reservation.
transit: Parking is available on the street directly in front of the property.   Public transportation on Oahu is excellent.  The bus stop is close by, less than a five minute walk from the property.
access: This is a large, gated property with three vacation rentals and my home.  Each rental has its own very private space, complete with outdoor garden and BBQ grill.   The outdoor beach shower at the front of the property is shared by all, as well as the washer and (coin-operated) dryer located in the carport.
interaction: Although there are other rentals and my home on this property, the feeling is of complete privacy.  But at the same time, I am here and I'm always happy to assist my guests with suggestions on fun things to do, great restaurants, best snorkeling spots, and interesting cultural events.  Guests are always welcome to send me a text or give me a call.  But you probably won't see me around much unless you need me!
house_rules: This is a no smoking property, although accommodations can be made for you to smoke outside.  Please notify me in advance if you are a smoker and want to smoke in the garden. This property is only for registered guests.  Due to parking and noise constraints, guests are not allowed to invite family or friends onto the property.

host.host_about: Please see my other listing for a full profile.

reviews.comments:
Ocean Song Beach House was perfect for what we needed.  Skye was very welcoming and accommodating.  This house is located close to one of the most beautiful beaches I've ever been to.  Other great things are the quietness of the neighborhood & community and the privacy was awesome.  The cottage was about what you'd expect from a vintage beach home.  

I would recommend this cute little home to anyone that has a laid back attitude, likes to get away from the crowds and is ready for relaxing on the beach.  Skye provides beach chairs, boogie boards and other beach necessities that we used a lot.

Skye was a wonderful host.  She met us promptly and gave us great local knowledge of where to go.  The home was very nice for our family, and she very accommodating to my 2 small children.  Very close to an absolutely wonderful beach.   This was a wonderful place to stay and Skye was a wonderful host.

Skye met us upon arrival and showed my family around and made us feel welcome from the start. 
The neighborhood was a quiet and friendly area. The beach is about a 2 minute walk past 4 homes. The property is gated and private.
The beautiful beach is quiet and local. My kids and I enjoyed boogie boarding and body surfing.

Skye's place was comfortable, clean, had welcoming Hawaiian style and a short walk to the beach and to a few quaint local shops & cafes. Skye was friendly, communicated promptly and took our booking at very short notice, which we really appreciated.

Skye was very friendly and easy to communicate with. She meet us upon arrival and gave us info about where to go and what to do.
The place is nice, comfortable and clean.
The best part is proximity to the beach (2 mins walk). Also, the beach is very private.
Thank you Skye!
Skye's beach house is a perfect place for beach-lovers. Beautiful beach within a few minutes! Skye was very friendly and easy to communicate. We would love to stay at her place again.

The location was lovely and it was very homey inside the house. It looked much better than the pictures and it was really close to a beautiful beach that wasn't too crowded. Definitely a great place to stay.

Being sent to Hawaii on a work trip was the perfect opportunity to tie-in a family vacay. But, when work in Honolulu was done we knew we would want to get out of the city and really enjoy all the Oahu had to offer. So, after doing a lot of pre-trip comparisons to properties across the entire island, we chose Skye's Ocean Song beach house. We found the Waimanalo area to be a little gem - less-crowded than Kailu and the popular North Shore, while allowing easy access to them. And, we found this property to be the perfect base within Waimanalo. Some highlights:

* A one minute walk from this property will put you on the sand of Waimanalo Beach. It is not private but very private 'feeling'. It was easy to take in a few sunrises and to jump in & out of the water without involving car rides. The beach itself was perfect for body-boarding with strong waves that break a little to close to shore for surfing. Yet, there was an excellent snorkel spot a mere two miles away (great recommendation from Skye). This property came generously equipped with boards, mats, an umbrella, and even beach towels. It will cut down on what you will have to spend.

* This is a multi-unit property yet was a true 'entire property' reservation. We had our own parking, our own yard, our own patio, and our own gas grill - something we put to use multiple times to save $ and time.  The Ocean Song was is the perfect setting for the four of us, enough room and well-equipped.

* Skye was the perfect hostess - accessible, knowledgeable, and eager to help. She seemed genuinely interested in us having the most enjoyment possible.

If one was to search for a downside in staying here, it might be the lack of immediate access to conveniences. Yet, this is exactly why we chose this property. The area is not over-developed. All of the grocery and other needs you may have can be found in a several minute car ride to Kailu. Then, you'll come back and be glad you did.

All told, we LOVED our stay here. The biggest disappointment was leaving. My first day back home and at work went okay. I did lay under my desk in a fetal position and cry for two hours. After that it was fine.

Our group of four had a fantastic stay at Skye's place in Waimanalo. The rooms were comfortable and well appointed, and the location was one of the best in Oahu. A stone's throw from the beach! Skye was an organised and attentive host, and gave us some great advice for local dining. Highly recommend.

I would give five star to this lovely house. Beach is just one minute walk and very beautiful and not crowded. My family tried to avoid crowded Waikiki downtown and looked for calm and peaceful place. It’s 100% match. 

Location also perfect. Down to Waikiki and up to Kualoa Ranch, PCC and north shore. Hanauma bay is just 15min to drive. 
Moreover, Skye is super kind and has warm heart. She’s perfect host. I can recommend this house to my relatives and close friends in Korea. 
.Comments in Korean. 
어머님 70세 생신을 기념한 가족여행이었는데, 와이키키는 너무 복잡해서 뭔가 조용한 장소를 찾았습니다. 
해변이 너무나 멋지고 조용합니다. 관광하기위한 위치 조건도 아주 좋았습니다. 
노스쇼어를 포함한 대부분의 관광지로 이동하는데 최적의 위치 였습니다. 
집도 깨끗한 상태여서 가족 모두가 만족했습니다. 
조용한 가족여행을 준비중이시라면 최적의 장소일듯 합니다.

everything is as advertised; Skye is friendly, knowledgeable and available (within limits obviously); house is basically child-friendly and location is excellent - about 50 yards to the beach if that; there's a lovely outdoor space with working bbq as bonus

Skye's home is full of beach charm, it is comfortable and feels like home. Skye is a great host full of jubilant joy and willing to answer any questions one may have. The supply of beach towels, chairs and body boards was wonderful. Would love to stay here again!!!
Skye was a fantastic host, amazing location, yards away from one of the best beaches on Oahu. Greatly recommended!

Ocean Song Beach House was nicely decorated and it was located within a short walk to the lovely Waimanalo Beach.  Skye was a hospitable host, making sure her home had plenty of beach towels, chairs, beach umbrella, clothes washer, and clothes dryer.  A variety of magazines and games were also available for indoor family time.  Skye's beach home has access to a part of Waimanalo Beach that is simply gorgeous, yet almost private.  We enjoyed our experience and recommend others try this little gem of a beach house!

Awesome place!  Roomy two bedroom two bath with island/beach feel.  Everything you need for short or extended stay (including full kitchen and laundry if needed).  Charming private lanai. Very clean.  Location and access to wonderful windward beach (best on island) was terrific.  Skye is extremely friendly and helpful.  Highly recommend...two thumbs up!
Skye is wonderful and her home welcoming. Sunrises are a must see on the beach so close and practically private. Beach towels and comfort generously provided. Mahalo!

After the weariness of travel there was no better way to be welcomed to the island of Oahu than ushered in by Skye herself to her wonderful lodging. The home was perfectly clean, and enormously welcoming and cozy, not to mention gorgeously decorated. From fresh plumeria in the bathroom, to a shelf of page turners for your beach going there are lovely additions and helpful items in every inch of this bit of paradise. Besides the helpful travel guides in house, Skye is in fact the best guide of them all. Every tip she gave ended up as the highlights of the trip (From the best shrimp shack a few blocks away, to a beautiful local concert that was truly locals only).

The beach is a stone's throw and it is the best beach I've visited on Oahu. The sand is like flour, the waves are calm (perfect for boogie boarding), and it was almost entirely empty each time we went. The outdoor shower makes cleaning up after a breeze as well. 

I was expecting a nice stay at an airbnb, I wasn't expecting the whole wonderful package that is a stay at Skye's. It's a real home away from home feeling.  Mahalo, Skye!
Location was perfect. We were able to do all of the things in Oahu with ease.

The location is great!  A quick walk to the most beautiful beaches with strongest waves.  We felt like locals in that area.   Skye was a great host and very helpful with local suggestions.

The house wasn't quite as expected though.  The entire house is so hot.  Take your time away from the house when you can.  There are air conditioners in 2 rooms.  This house states that there is room for 5 but one guest had to sleep on the couch.  The other room was locked up and not accessible to guests.

Overall, of course we had a great trip.  It was not worth the amount paid before check-in and then the added "hotel fee" that is due when you arrive.

Great place in a great location.  We took most of Skye's recommendations for things to do and see around the area and had a great time. Lots of thougthful touches and a small stroll to an awesome secluded beach. Definitely a nice relaxing departure from the the hustle of Waikiki.

Skye greeted us with a warm welcoming and so many great suggestions for the course of our stay. She definately gave privacy and was quick to respond to text messages with questions. The house was beautiful and provided everything we needed for our trip. She even covered our beds and bathrooms with flowers to greet us!!

Everything was as described. Just a very short distance to the beach! It was pretty windy the first day we arrived and not really swimmable but after that things calmed down. Plenty of room for two couples. Air conditioning in the bedrooms worked well in those rooms, very comfortable!
Fantastic location, great beach, convenient apartment, fast internet.
Great location next to a beautiful beach. Very relaxing spot.  Very clean and well kept. We had a awesome time.

We really enjoyed our stay on this side of the island. The house was very comfortable and a short walk to the beautiful swimming beach.  Great if you are looking for a quiet location with loads more character than staying in a condo.

The cottage is located 40 minutes ride away from the turistic areas of Honolulu. 
The landscape is breathtaking. The cottage itself cozy laid back Hawaiian style. 3 minutes walk from the stunning beach.

Skye our host was extremely welcoming and helpful.

Close to shopping amenities and restaurants in Kailua town. The local Whole Foods first class.

You definitely need a car to get by.

The nearby sea life research park is well worth a visit especially if you have kids. 
Their luau was beautifully located by the sea and the show entertaining and food fresh and tasteful.

Just one “fyi”
There was a generator located right outside the master bedroom. So you may want to bring earplugs.

Overall a great stay and recommendable.

Expect to be amazed at how beautiful the area is in and around Waimānalo.  The white sands, blue, blue, water and almost deserted beach was just what we needed! The house is cute, clean, cozy and stocked with everything you’ll need for a fun-filled adventure.  Skye was a wonderful, informative and gracious host.  We had such a great time, we are already planning our next trip!

Skye was very warm during the booking process. As soon as we had questions, put politely, about the unorthodox booking process, however Skye became suddenly hostile. This was. Very unpleasant experience I have never had during an Airbnb stay. Skye puts an added tax at the bottom of her description of the bungalow. You will not see it unless you read right to the end of the lengthy description. It does not appear on the ‘additional prices’, so it is very easy to miss. She only notified me about this extra substantial amount of money she wants in cash on top of the Airbnb fee once the bungalow was paid for in full and could not be cancelled. The worst of it though was she in fact sought to charge me even double this extra amount when she sent me a rental agreement after my reservation for almost $400. When I questioned her about this new arbitrary amount, which thank goodness I did instead of just paying it, she said it must have been an error. When I complained to Airbnb about all this conduct the person she had communicated with told me that Skye was so aggressive to her she was left trembling. I know that people have had good experiences with Skye, just beware of getting on her wrong side or questioning her questionable methods. 

Also the house is far less private or close to the beach than the pictures misleadingly imply. It is attached to the main house and you are very much living in Skye’s shadow do to speak (see above).  In general the house feels very much in the middle of suburbia.

Awesome place and awesome host.  There are many highlights, but at the top is the amazingly beautiful and totally uncrowded beach a half block from this place....I think it’s the best on the island.  The accommodations and host (Skye) are amazing too...you can’t help but relax and soak up the aloha spirit here.  Although this is a relaxed area, away from the bustle of Honolulu (great for families...we have an 8 yr old who loved it)  you can still get to good restaurants, bars, shops, and other amenities on the Windward side easily from here if you’d like...e.g. Kialua is 15 minutes. Highly recommend.

name: Dover 42, Friendly Rentals
summary: This apartment has: 4 single beds, 1 double sofa bed. The Eixample is a great area for strolling around, shopping, gazing at some fine modernista buildings, exploring the Sant Antoni market or simply enjoying some great cafés, bars and restaurants.
space: This apartment has: 4 single beds, 1 double sofa bed. Licence number: HUTB-001859 This apartment is one of several we can offer in the building. The photographs are a selection of the various units. The apartments may vary slightly in the layout or décor but the features are the same. Your specific apartment will be allocated on arrival. The Dover apartment is located in a building renovated in 2015. This 2-bedroom apartment is ideal for couples, families or groups of friends looking for a modern accommodation in a great location.    The living/dining room is decorated in gentle neutral tones creating a lovely, welcoming atmosphere. It is equipped with a dining table that seats 6 and a comfortable sofa. The living/dining room has direct access to a small balcony overlooking the street. The two bedrooms come with two single beds each. The bathroom has a modern design and it’s equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided on arrival.  The spacious, modern kitchen is fully equ

The Eixample is a great area for strolling around, shopping, gazing at some fine modernista buildings, exploring the Sant Antoni market or simply enjoying some great cafés, bars and restaurants. The living/dining room is decorated in gentle neutral tones creating a lovely, welcoming atmosphere. It is equipped with a dining table that seats 6 and a comfortable sofa. The living/dining room has direct acce
neighborhood_overview: EIXAMPLE ESQUERRA  (LEFT) This area  of the Eixample was built at a later stage and contains some great marketplaces  and some less well-known Modernista sights, however, there is still plenty  going on in this area… with it’s lively, energetic atmosphere the night life is  wonderful, with lots of bars and hot spots to visit while in Barcelona… Although  this side of the Eixmaple may not be teeming with elegant, must see landmarks  it does have one or two treasures such as the Universtitat de Barcelona  building, this is an elegant construction with very pleasant gardens and Cassa  Boada and Casa Gofverichs build by one of Gaudí’s collaborators in the early  1900’s… …two markets in this area, generally frequented by locals are the Ninot  and the Mercat de Sant Antoni; the latter converts into a second hand book  market on Sunday mornings;
transit: Ideal to discover the city either on foot or by public transport.
access: Travellers will have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: We will be more than happy to help you with anything you need. We can organize a transfer from the airport to the apartment.
house_rules: CHECK-IN Week Days: The check-in and key collection takes place at: Friendly Rentals, Passatge Sert, 1-3 - Barcelona. Weekend and bank holidays: The check-in and key collection takes place at: Friendly Rentals, Carrer Ausias March, 27 - Barcelona. Important:  Late arrivals between 21:00 and 02:00 hrs require an extra service fee of 30€ which must be paid to the late service agent at Check-in.  Loud music and parties are strictly prohibited. Guests in a Friendly Rentals apartment should be aware that if loud music is played, or a party is held, and the neighbours complain and/or police are called, you may be immediately removed from the apartment regardless of the time, day or night. Noise regulations and respect for other residents between 22:00 and 10.00. We would appreciate your full cooperation in this matter and we hope you understand that these rules are necessary, as our apartments are located in residential buildings with people that have to get up early and go to work. The quie

host.host_about: hi!
host.host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

reviews.comments:
The charming apartment block is well-located on a lively block, with supermarkets, bars, airport bus, metro stops and street markets all very close by. 

As the first guests in the newly-renovated apartment, there were a few small details to be ironed out, but Lina and Marina proved responsive, reactive and helpful (and this throughout the Christmas period) and did everything that could possibly be done to deal with our requests. 

These aside, it was a comfortable apartment, with very convenient location and very supportive hosts.

Very nice apartment . 
Looks like everything was prepared with the highest attention . 
Apartment looks exactly as the photos , but once you get there it is even better , cozy , secure , clean and bigger than expected . 
I highly recommend this  apartment in case you have to visit Barcelona.
Definitely I would book it again .

Beautiful apartment, nicely furnished and in a nice location. Although took around 15-20 minutes minimum to get to las ramblas. 45 minutes to walk to the beach. Very well furnished with lots of useful amenities including a hair drier, washing machine etc. Beds were comfortable although no proper double bed (two singles pushed together). Bit cramped for 6 people but would be perfect for 4, maybe 5.

Beautiful apartment close to Urgell metro station. Lina was a great host when we noted the toaster didn't work she bought us a new one within hours. Very responsive hosts with all the essentials provided. Great renovation of a classic apartment too. Would highly recommend.

L'appartamento è gestito da un'agenzia molto professionale e disponibile. Siamo arrivati alcune ore prima del check in, ma ci hanno messo a disposizione l'appartamento da subito.
Si tratta di un bell'appartamento e molto pulito, in una posizione molto conveniente: è infatti a pochi metri dalla fermata della metro Urgell sulla L1 e l'autobus per l'aeroporto El Prat ferma proprio di fronte alla porta dello stabile.
L'aria condizionata ha funzionato bene, il WiFi non sempre.

The apartment is a part of an apartment hotel chain. The location is good, especially coming from the airport there's a bus stop right around the corner. There was an extra fee for our late arrival after 10pm. The apartment itself was sizeable enough for 4, and furnished like a normal, neutral hotel room, with a nice balcony. Unfortunately there was a strong moldy smell around the bathroom, so I wouldn't have liked to stay for more than a night or two. Nice cafes and supermarkets just around the block.
The apartment is a good point to visit Barcelona. Anything you need is available and the team of Lina cares for everything. The furniture is simple but comfortable.
La ubicacion esta muy buena, el departamento super completo y limpio. Muy amables todos
Asegurarse que ante las solicitudes las mismas sean respondidas
Great apartment in a great location. Highly recommend
Très bel appartement avec Balcon situé dans un quartier coloré et proche du métro et de Barcelone centre.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Roof top apartment BEST LOCATION
summary: Big apartment (3 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms + 40 m² of roof top) with good vibes, bright and well apointed.  One of de best location, just between Copacabana and Ipanema Beach (one of the best sunset of Rio).  Close to shoppings, bars, restaurants.

name: CHARMING 2 BRM COTTAGE BIRCHGROVE
summary: Fantastic location for New Years Eve, join the huge crowd and watch the Bridge light up from Birchgrove park! Within a stone-throw of all the hustle and bustle of the Darling Street Bars, Pubs and Cafe's.
space: A beautiful location to base your stay in Sydney in a quiet tree lined street of Birchgrove.  Gorgeous coffee shop three doors down from the house, 10 minute walk to famous Darling Street with its cafes, restaurants, bars and shops.  15 minutes on a bus or ferry to centre of Sydney including Opera House.  The house sleeps 4 people with two rooms which have double beds. There is a washing machine recessed into the bathroom. TV, WIFI internet, dishwasher and everything else for daily living.
description: Fantastic location for New Years Eve, join the huge crowd and watch the Bridge light up from Birchgrove park! Within a stone-throw of all the hustle and bustle of the Darling Street Bars, Pubs and Cafe's. A beautiful location to base your stay in Sydney in a quiet tree lined street of Birchgrove.  Gorgeous coffee shop three doors down from the house, 10 minute walk to famous Darling Street with its cafes, restaurants, bars and shops.  15 minutes on a bus or ferry to centre of Sydney including Opera House.  The house sleeps 4 people with two rooms which have double beds. There is a washing machine recessed into the bathroom. TV, WIFI internet, dishwasher and everything else for daily living. You will have full access to the whole house and courtyard for your stay. Birchgrove is a stunning area of Sydney.  It is a very peaceful and relaxed community, yet conveniently close to Balmain village and the city.  Balmain has a great inner-city vibe with a huge range of cafes, restaurants, bars
neighborhood_overview: Birchgrove is a stunning area of Sydney.  It is a very peaceful and relaxed community, yet conveniently close to Balmain village and the city.  Balmain has a great inner-city vibe with a huge range of cafes, restaurants, bars and shops. Enjoy waterfront parks (including Birchgrove Oval across the street) and beautiful heritage street-scapes.
transit: The bus stop is located three doors down from the house.   Bus goes via Balmain’s Darling Street to Sydney’s Townhall.  Ferry from Birchgrove Wharf takes you to Circular Quay.
access: You will have full access to the whole house and courtyard for your stay.
house_rules: Please do NOT use the fireplace. Please NO smoking in the house, the courtyard is fine. Please be respectful of other residents in the area and treat as if it were your home.  As this is a quiet residential area please no parties or noise disturbances.

host.host_about: Hi, we are Nadia & Sean from from Sydney, Australia.  We love meeting new people and are a friendly and respectful couple.

reviews.comments: A great experience the first time live at home locals, owner of the house is very intimate, all kinds of problems can patiently answer. The house is very comfortable, the family can barbecue, appliances complete, the location is great, go out to take a bus into the city center, if you look at Sydney's New Year's fireworks, it would be a good choice, you can see the panoramic view, if you come to Sydney This would be an excellent choice.
Great location, nice folks, more than adequate lodging.  Sean & Nadia very helpful.

name: Oceanfront top floor beach-get-away
summary: Maili Cove is an oceanfront, breathtaking paradise! If you are looking for a very quiet, countryside, serene, vacation spot - this is definitely it! Our one bedroom beach get-away is our home away from home! We love it & so will you! Time to escape!
space: Open Space Floor Plan.  Fully furnished for your vacation needs!  One bedroom plus a sleeper sofa in living room.  Lanai / Balcony for lounging right off of living room with amazing palm tree ocean views!  Top Floor of a 3rd story walk up beachfront "ALOHA" retreat!  Note this complex does not have an elevator.  Top floor offers the best views!
description: Maili Cove is an oceanfront, breathtaking paradise! If you are looking for a very quiet, countryside, serene, vacation spot - this is definitely it! Our one bedroom beach get-away is our home away from home! We love it & so will you! Time to escape! Open Space Floor Plan.  Fully furnished for your vacation needs!  One bedroom plus a sleeper sofa in living room.  Lanai / Balcony for lounging right off of living room with amazing palm tree ocean views!  Top Floor of a 3rd story walk up beachfront "ALOHA" retreat!  Note this complex does not have an elevator.  Top floor offers the best views! Saltwater pool is open from 8:00am to 9:00pm Gated Complex; Key access provided to pool & to ocean. Expansive Maili Beach Park - right next door! Parking for one car is reserved. I live in Honolulu and this is our home away from home!  We instantly fell in love with maili cove & it provides a great relaxing escape whenever we get the chance!  Please, feel free to contact me during your stay! Aloha! M
neighborhood_overview: Maili Cove is a very local Hawaiian neighborhood.  The cove is architecturally placed to boast Ocean Views and Privacy!  When you are in the bedroom, kitchen, dining area and half of the living room - you see NO neighbors!  Your view is flanked between swaying Palm Trees, Saltwater Pool below, and Ocean - get ready for amazing SUNSETS!!!
notes: Maili is about 35 minutes to the airport and about 45 to 50 minutes into Honolulu.  Best tip is to travel during non-commute hours as it is country & drive aloha! We are literally 7 miles from Ko'olina Resort which boasts awesome lagoons, golf course, and top restaurants - Monkey Pod & Roy's.  Kapolei is considered to be the next big city of Oahu, next to Waikiki.  This next door city hosts many restaurants and provides for all of your shopping needs.  Stores include Target, Costco, Safeway, Foodland, Walmart, and many more!  To wash clothes if need a washer is available in the building facilities (6 quarters) & a dryer is available in this unit.  Laundry Basket & detergent provided.  Check in & out time may be flexible a few hours depending upon the booking schedule.  Feel free to check the booking calender or inquire about times to meet your needs! Aloha!
transit: Bus Stop very near, however, would highly recommend a rental car to explore the island of Oahu!
access: Saltwater pool is open from 8:00am to 9:00pm Gated Complex; Key access provided to pool & to ocean. Expansive Maili Beach Park - right next door! Parking for one car is reserved.
interaction: I live in Honolulu and this is our home away from home!  We instantly fell in love with maili cove & it provides a great relaxing escape whenever we get the chance!  Please, feel free to contact me during your stay! Aloha!
house_rules: This is a peaceful, serene, quiet oasis!  # 1 rule would be - - respect the tranquility and show Aloha!  * Strict Condo Pool Rules to ensure your relaxation!  Up to four guests that are staying overnight are allowed in pool area.  Sorry this pool does not allow day guests in case you have extended family and or friends nearby.  Parties over 4 guests are not permitted in pool area - sorry this is one of the house rules which is monitored closely by maili cove management!  There are 4 BBQ's available at the pool area for grilling out and sunset dinners!  This is a Non-Smoking Unit - no smoking allowed in the unit nor on our lanai/patio! *No pets *Safety first, please no candles!  *Park in our designated parking space; Please when parking pull in forward - no backing into spaces is allowed facing building.  *No glassware in pool area - plastic glasses provided!  * Use earbuds in pool area for your music and or screenings - no speaker systems allowed * Remember to bring your access key for

host.host_about: Aloha! Maili Cove blends two must have's for us perfectly - it sits right on the beach & is close to our family for all the birthdays, bbq's, and FUN!  I moved from California to Hawaii in 2006 and was able to transfer with my job & this is HOME now!  Lucky to Live in Hawaii and do what I love to do.  I am a child psychologist.  Love working with kids, teens, and families!  Putting together each perspective and being challenged to figure out how to make things better!  I have a private practice in town and have worked for 15 years for one of the major hospitals.  We love to travel. Italy, Greece, and an Alaska Cruise were our last vacations - - Next up London!  Can't wait!  As a host - I am personable, respectful, professional, and dependable! Value friendships and family.  Love to be active - enjoy hiking, tennis, & beach time!  When we do "stay-cations" - one of my favorite things is to check out a NEW BEACH every day - really take in the island!  Relaxing! Beautiful! & really "re-sets" you! Hope you have an Amazing time on Oahu!

reviews.comments: AMAZING is just one of the words to describe this wonderful home. The view is unforgettable!!! The condo is just a few steps away from the ocean, very secure and close to the local market. As soon as you step into the condo, the view will take your breath away. Being able to watch the sunset from the balcony and swim in the salt water pool every day was a true blessing. Dr. Chase has completely gone out of his way to make this home comfortable so you can relax. The condo is beautifully furnished with great detail. Each item of this home was hand selected and finished to enhance the amazing ocean views. Dr. Chase has fully stocked the home with everything you need, even beach essentials. If you're looking for a quiet relaxing getaway THIS IS THE PLACE TO STAY! Dr. Chase was a wonderful host and a great pleasure to work with. He went out of his way to make our stay memorable.

Chase was FULLY accommodating with my needs from day one.  Prior to booking, Chase always was there with a quick and honest answer.  It make the decision to move forward easier when your doing something like this online.
Mike

We really enjoyed 1 week at this beautiful place. We stayed a lot at the pool area which is amazing. The communication with the owner was really good and uncomplicated. 
We would definitely go back to this sweet place.

We stayed 6 days in March 2016. This condo has awesome ocean views, it feels like a well taken cared home. It had everything that we needed for a vacation. The full kitchen is excellent, it has laundry facility, swimming pool, outdoor grill, free parking and WiFi and all the beach that anyone wants. It is located in a residential neighbourhood in a small town only 35 minutes form Honolulu. Close to shopping centers such as CVS. Major stores about a 15 minute drive only. If you stay here you get to see the real life in Oahu. Try Barbeque Kai for local food and West Oahu Surf Shop if you want to surf. The area has lots of beaches that most visitors never get to go. Hiking to end of the island is a must as well. Chase is a very accommodating host.

My wife and I were very pleased by the oceanfront condo,and truly look forward to returning. The place could  not be  nicer, with the oceanfront location, the quality of the  condition and amenities, and the true pleasure of staying there.
This getaway was exactly as promised.  Adorable inside and instant access to a beautiful beach outside.  Thanks to the host for such an enjoyable stay!

Had a great time.  My second stay.  The room and location are exactly as described and photos reveal.  Will be returning in Oct/Nov.  Highly recommend the Host (Dr Chase) and the room itself.
Mahalo,
Mike

This was the first experience I've had in renting an AirBnB, and I couldn't have been happier with it. The apartment is exactly what you see in the pictures, adorably furnished and cozy. The beach is underused for how gorgeous it is. Sitting on the balcony or even in the sitting room to watch the sunset was a dream. The nearby town is hit or miss with shops and restaurants, but the good stuff isn't far away (about a 15 min drive). Dr. Chase is wonderfully pleasant and prompt in answering any questions you have. I genuinely have no complaints, and would rent this gem again!

We stayed here for 6 days and we absolutely loved it!  The condo is beautifully decorated and is literally only steps away from the beach!  This place has all the comforts of home and more! Our family enjoyed the beautiful beach which was almost like our very own private beach and absolutely loved the heated pool!  The surrounding area is very quiet and is very close to a bunch of stores and shopping places.  Dr. Chase was very hospitable and made sure we had everything we needed.
We will definitely be back here again soon!!

My wife and I loved this place!!!! It was in the most relaxing, serene area. The pool was amazing, right at our fingertips. House was clean and had all the amenities necessary. We love this place and can't wait to come back. We will miss Hawaii and love it so much

Our host left great directions and he gave us great tips for places to enjoy! The home gave us a beach home vibe and had everything that we needed to enjoy at the beach! We LOVED it here and it really felt like home to us!!!  It is definitely hard to leave this place! We hope to visit again in the future! We are so grateful for Dr. Chase opening up his place to us!!  We are happy that we honeymooned in Waianae where it is less congested than Honolulu. :-)

If total peace & relaxation is the therapy you need, then this is the place for you!  Crashing waves, long beach walks, sunset viewing on your lane or on the beach, swimming in pool and trade winds caressing your skin ALL offer the love and calm of the Aloha spirit RIGHT HERE! 
I've stayed in several Airbnb places, but none as immaculate as this one. Dr. C was the perfect host, responding immediately to any questions. Checking in & out was clear & easy. If you like what you read in the description, then you'll love this oceanfront Aloha Beach House because it's all true!!! Mahalo

Aloha Dr. Chase!

Your "Home away from home" exceeded all of our expectations. Your place really made our Honeymoon that much sweeter! The location is prime and every detail in this place made us feel right at home. All of your recommendations were very helpful. My wife and I really enjoyed Paradise Cove Luau. It was ONO! All the amenities that your place had to offer was a great added bonus. We're so glad that we chose this place of peace that was away from all the hustle and bustle of the city. 

Thank you so much for making our Honeymoon one we will never forget!!! We will definintely be staying here when we do come back! 

Mahalo from VEGAS a.k.a. Da 9th Island! 
-Ashley & Sam Orque

Easy booking, easy check in, and MAN WHAT A VIEW!  The unit is perfectly furnished to feel like you really have gotten away--a vaca in paradise.  The whole complex was quiet, friendly, and lush with vegetation and clean pool.  Kitchen was equipped with everything we needed as a family to make our own meals the entire trip.  Prior to arriving Dr. Chase sent recommendations as to where to shop before getting to the unit so all of our food supply was done upon arrival.  He is a very thoughtful owner and sent very nice updates and messages prior to arrival and during.  We had a fabulous trip thanks to this blessed place.

Beautiful place, perfectly described. Super clean and well suited for island exploring. I loved it! Great beach too. Just north of the apartment is one of the nicest beaches on the island. You really can't go wrong! And Dr. Chase is awesome to deal with!
It was great!

Our host was easy to communicate with and responded immediately to emails and texts. Everything was as stated and the condo met our needs perfectly. Dr. Chase also graciously extended our check out time to better accommodate our return flight. The condo is located on the warmer west side in an area inhabited by locals. We loved our stay and highly recommend.

Dr. Chase is an amazing, attentive host. He responded in minutes to my emails or texts. His house is beautiful! 
The view is spectacular and being able to fall asleep to the sound of the ocean is incredible. This space is quiet and gorgeous! Hang out by the pool for a day and take a walk along the beautiful beach later. The shoreline is gorgeous and relatively quiet. This place is awesome! Thank you for being a great host.

We thoroughly enjoyed our week in this clean and well equipped third floor condo on the west coast.  The interior decor is tasteful and fits the setting beautifully.  We left the balcony door open every night and it was delightful to awake every morning to the view of the palm trees swaying in the breeze and to fall asleep to sound of the waves crashing on the beach. The pool and barbecue area is clean, quiet and very relaxing. We found that at this time of the year, the weather seemed to be much clearer here on the west coast and we had far more sun than we had found in Waikiki which was a bonus.  The ocean, right in our back yard was very tempting but the waves were really too strong to be able to swim safely during our week here.  Instead, we made great use of the Ko Olina lagoons about ten minutes down the road and had no trouble finding parking any time we went.  The drive to the end of the island is well worth it to see the beautiful expanse of almost deserted beaches. One drawback is the traffic noise from the highway but we kept the front door closed at all times and it blocked out most of it. Chase was very helpful and left a binder full of very good suggestions of restaurants and activities in the area.  We were very pleased over all with our first experience using Air BnB to find accommodations.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Dr. Chase's beach home.  The grounds and condo are very well maintained -- the location is terrific for walking on the beach (immediately outside the gate) and soaking in the beautiful sunsets.  The condo is secure, comfortable and had everything we needed.

This condo was exactly as shown in the pictures! Beautiful sunset views from the lanai each night, tasteful beach decor, and a fully stocked home away from home. The kitchen is fully stocked with all of the appliances/dishes you could ever need, there are also beach chairs and beach towels for use. The AC unit and large fan were a huge bonus for us! The condo is in a relaxing, safe, and gated community, complete with a security guard at night.  The salt water pool is relaxing, and the entire pool area is quiet and serene. We had most of our lunches in the pool area, and took full advantage of the grills/BBQ.   Dr. Chase was so quick to respond to all of our questions/concerns along the way, and even let us have a later check out time. If you are looking for relaxation and a quiet area for your vacation, this condo community is perfect. Located right on the beach (only a few steps from the pool), this is the perfect spot to get away from city life and relax! Thank you Dr. Chase!

The beach house was exactly as pictured. It was very clean and fully stocked with all the essentials. If you are looking for a place to stay for a peaceful getaway, this is it. Dr. Chase is an awesome host. Responds super fast and is very helpful, giving tips for local activities and food recommendations. Highly recommended.

This condo is a fantastic option for a stay on the beautiful Island of O'ahu. Best view, great people there and the perfect sunset direct at the ocean. Dr. Chase is very helpfull and all was more than perfect. We had a phenomenal time there with everything we need. We will be back!!
We really enjoyed staying here and would highly recommend staying in Dr. Chase's place to anyone looking to stay on Oahu. We had a great time!

The beach get away was great and as described. Clean and well supplied with beach towels, 2 beach chairs, cookware and dishes. The view is incredible and the condo complex is quiet and relaxing. A great option if you are looking for something away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki. We would stay again!

This condo is amazing! The view of the pool and ocean is spectacular and the condo is so lovely and decorated perfectly.  Our family stayed for 8 days and didn't want to leave. We have nothing but great things to say about this place. Maile Cove is a hidden gem on Oahu. Such wonderful beaches and hikes nearby too. Our family will definitely be back for another staycation in the future. Thank you, Dr. Chase! :)
Dr. Chase’s place is a great overall value with stunning views.  We wanted to get away from crowded touristy areas and mix with the locals, Waianae was perfect for that.

A great location for a quiet getaway on Oahu.  The view is fantastic and the pool is very nice.  Having BBQ's at the pool is a nice feature.  The unit has most everything you need, although note dishes are done by hand and the clothes washer is a communal one.

Our only negative has nothing to do with the unit or Dr. Chase, who is terrific to deal with.  It is the traffic in the area that is a pain.  There appears to be perennial construction, and it can be a slog trying to get somewhere south.  And there is a lot of stuff in Kapolei (about 10 miles south) that you might want, including grocery stores and restaurants.

All in all, we highly recommend Dr. Chase's beach hideaway.  If you want a quieter vacation than the norm, it would be hard to beat his condo.

We spent our honeymoon here and let me tell you, it was an absolute dream; the photos don't even do the impact of the view justice. We loved sitting on the beach and watching the sunset, and all of the little touches of Aloha around the condo made the space feel so special and welcoming. It was a great jumping off point for all of our Oahu adventures, and such a wonderful spot for days we wanted to just relax. Mahalo Dr. Chase, we'll never forget it!
For my first experience I was satisfied. I will definitely use airbnb again based on Dr. Chase and his home. More people should stay there.
Dr Chase is an awesome host; very welcoming and accommodating. The place was easy to find and was exactly as the pictures show; very clean and spacious with gorgeous views! Thank you Dr!
Amazing space.  This was my second stay and not my last!

Lovely place!  Felt very welcomed here.  Such great décor and has everything you need. It is near some great hikes - Ka'ena Point and the Pink Pillbox, and many beaches. We pretty much left early every morning and got back after dinner, exhausted and ready to sleep and start all over the next day! We hit every part of the island from (Website hidden by Airbnb) is situated on the one main road that runs up and down the west coast. We had no problems here whatsoever - very smooth rental.

The place is in a great spot with a wonderful view of the ocean.  We were amazed at how quiet this unit was.  Everything you need is in the unit including a dryer which I missed in the original booking so it was a wonderful surprise. Dr. Chase was great at checking in and giving local tips on what to do and where to go and it was very much appreciated.

The condo was lovely and the view from our lanai is spectacular. The pool is great and we talked to other guests staying there who were very nice and friendly. We would definitely stay again! Gorgeous sunsets every night!

Walking into Dr. Chase's beachside condo and heading out to the balcony, it is easy to sum up our impression in one word - - Wow!!  A beautiful place with an amazing view.  We had a terrific stay here.  It had all of the basic amenities you'd expect in a quality Airbnb place.  Highlights include the view, easy access to the beach (more below), great recommendations for eating out.

For those considering staying in the future, it is probably worth noting a bit about the location.  It is at least 30 min out of town - - more in traffic.  Additionally, it isn't necessarily in the nicest part of town.  And while we felt safe the whole time (my wife went running by herself in the area) it was something we observed.  Finally, the condo backs right up to the main 2-lane road and as a light sleeper I had a hard time sleeping through the night due to the traffic.  Turning on the fan/AC helped reduce that.

But as far as value - - can't beat it.  We had a wonderful time and Dr. Chase was quick to answer questions and offer some great recommendations.

Dr. Chase's place was exactly what I was looking for in a peaceful weekend at the beach with the intention to recharge and enjoy the beautiful surroundings. The condo was clean and I felt comfortable instantly. I'm glad that I stopped by the condo before going shopping because I was surprised at how well stocked it was. You could definitely not ask for more with the amazing views and easy access to the beautiful private beach below. If you're looking to escape the hustle and bustle... have a beautiful beach to yourself... immerse yourself in the local relaxed culture then I definitely recommend Dr. Chase's place. I found check-in and check-out to be super easy and I appreciated how quick the host was to respond to my questions. Thanks again Dr. Chase!

Exceeded all our expectations. Comfortably and stylishly furnished. Lots of thoughtful touches. Loved being on the sunny side of the island away from the tourism but close enough to visit the attractions. Amazingly quiet beach (w/ sea turtles surfacing nearby!) Highly recommended for vistors wanting to get away from it all!
Very nice and cozy appartment. Unfortunately it's located at a busy four lane road.

The Condo Dr. Chase has was just wonderful, We couldn't have been happier with it. It has everything you need to be comfortable, we bought an extra fan and 2 extra pillows which we left for the next guests. Also left our snorkel gear we bought so hopefully the next guest can use!  The beach is wonderful just watch for the rocks the waves uncover daily! Our first day we walked down the beach to the left and a giant sea turtle had come up on the beach! 
We went to the end of the road Kaena Point State Park, we found that to be the closest and easy in and out beach ton snorkel. 
We had dinner our last night at the Eating House  at Kapolei...Excellent food and service not cheap but worth every penny!
I hope that all future guests enjoy the Condo as much as we did. Very chill area which is just what we wanted!
Mahalo!

Dr. Chase was an excellent host. Unit was spacious enough for 3 adults to be comfortable for a week. Great long and empty beach and a nice pool. Fabulous view from the unit overlooking the pool and ocean. It's a bit out of the heart of the action on Oahu, but we wanted to be away from the crowds, so this worked out great for us. The area does not have much (any) night life, and there is a dearth of good restaurants, so if this is what you are looking for keep this in mind. This might bother some folks but was not an issue for us. Unit was well appointed with snorkel gear, great WiFi, and the dryer for suits and towels was very much appreciated. A very good experience for our fun week on sunny Oahu!

An absolute gem! This location was positively amazing, from the amazing balcony view,  steps from the beach, to all the special touches throughout the condo. Fully stocked with all beach essentials. Thank you Dr. Chase for providing such a fabulous hideaway retreat for major relaxation.
Highly recommended. The place was clean and pleasant. All needs were met and my wife and thoroughly enjoyed the balcony. Thank you, Dr. Chase
This unit was in a great location with a fantastic view. We had everything we needed to have a great stay. I would highly recommend this place to stay.

It was very nice there. We were sad about going home after 1 month. This condo is totally equiped, more than you need for daily life. Everything was spotlessly clean and we were overjoyed about so much hospitality. We liked the Pool - we went swimming every morning and evening , because the ocean were very bleak- and the view too. Dr. Chase thanks for all! Christine & Michael
Everything was excellent. Dr. Chase had added lots of little things like snorkeling gear and boogy boards for our use. It was a great home away from home for our honeymoon. Can't recommend enough!

the Condo and souroundings were as described, to buy Food etc. you have a small selection near but if you drive some 10 minutes there are some Super Markets as e.g. Foodland Farms ( one exit after Ko Olina coming from Maili Cove). Waves are very high in Winter, but again if you go to Ko Olina it is super in one of the 4 lagunes

I sat on that balcony every morning and looked at the beautiful view while I drank my coffee , pounding surf to put you to sleep , sunsets were stunning, had a resident come out and blow a conch shell horn every evening at sunset .. absolutely beautiful.

This is probably one of the best airbnbs that I've stayed at. A couple of reasons why:
1. Location - amazing view of the beach and sunset. We decided that we wanted to stay in a less busy area and getting here was super easy. Because we were provided a parking spot, we rented a car and drove to different parts of Ohahu very easily.
2. Amenities - first aid kits, snorkeling gear, boogie boards, sunblock, bathroom amenities, and much more were provided for us
3. Interior design - the design of the condo was beautiful and we felt right at home. You can tell a lot of thought and care was put into every room
4. Convenience - checking in was super easy and simple

Thank you Dr. Chase for allowing us to stay at your lovely place!

We had an amazing stay here. In person, the condo looked exactly like the pictures. My favorite part of the trip was the amazing view of the ocean. I sat there every morning and evening to watch the sunrise/sunset. The people living at the condo were very nice and extremely respectful. Most of the tenants seemed to be retired, and the noise of others was always minimal. 

We even did a load of laundry near the end of our trip. There is a laundry room that you can use if you have quarters. The condo has its own dryer which was very nice. The bed was comfortable and there were plenty of towels and other amenities. Soap, shampoo and conditioner were provided. The kitchen was very well stocked with all the dishes, pots/pans and condiments you would need. 

Thanks for the comfy and relaxing stay!

This a wonderful place to stay if you want to be away from the craziness of Honolulu!  You need a car and groceries but the peaceful atmosphere is worth it.  We spent the days exploring Oahu then lovely evenings relaxing & enjoying the sunsets!

We  really enjoyed our stay in Dr. Chase's condo.  It is a bright and happy space with aqua blue touches bringing the feel of the ocean up to the third floor.  The view - gorgeous, the sound of the waves - lovely, and, since it wasn't our first stay at Ma'ili Cove, we weren't surprised by the sounds of Farrington Hwy.  The plexiglass on the windows in this unit really cut down on the noise.  Excellent addition.  The Wi-Fi connection was great.  We enjoyed coffee on the balcony in the morning, exploring the island or reading poolside during the day, and watching the sunset in the evening while listening to a resident blow a conch shell.  Friendly residents and guests gathered in the courtyard in the evenings to watch the sunset and visit, and some of them bbq'd.  Several bbq's are available.  There were sand chairs, boogie boards, a cooler, beach towels, and snorkeling equipment in the closet alongside a dryer.  The kitchen had everything we needed to feel at home.  There was an air conditioner in the bedroom, but we didn't need to use it.  We left the balcony screen door open overnight.  Very nice place.

The sunset views are awesome!  The beach is fantastic and on weekdays you will have it to yourself!  The pool is excellent and rarely used, we were usually the only ones there.  The condo is super clean and comfortable.  If you are a light sleeper you will have issues, there is a hospital nearby and sirens go all night.  If you are looking to stay on the west side of Oahu you found the place - book it!

name: Pittwater - designer home &  pool
summary: Beautiful modern architect designed home - 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, 2 living spaces, north facing back garden, deck & swimming pool. Quiet street and 100m walk to Pittwater and child friendly beach (no waves). 5 minute drive to surf beaches & shops
space: Modern 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom open plan house with north facing sunny yard, pool and deck area.
description: Beautiful modern architect designed home - 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, 2 living spaces, north facing back garden, deck & swimming pool. Quiet street and 100m walk to Pittwater and child friendly beach (no waves). 5 minute drive to surf beaches & shops Modern 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom open plan house with north facing sunny yard, pool and deck area. Access to house and garden (not garages). Happy to have a chat to guests if any questions. Quite street with 100 metre walk to Pittwater (sailing, swimming), plus access to walking path to Church Point one way & Mona Vale the other direction. Cafes in walking distance. Bus stop 100 metres away on main road - Pittwater Road (near water). Mona Vale shops 3 minute drive and beaches 5 minute drive away.
