house_rules: 大廈內設有24小時保安 住客24小時都可辦理入住手續(24 hr Check-in)  禁止吸煙,並保持環境清新,單位門外設吸煙區(露天) 請勿在床上飲食,若弄污床上用品將收取400港元清潔費 請於晚上11時後保持安靜,以提供寧靜的睡眠環境 房間有空調 上下舖床 洗头水沐浴露有 牙刷牙膏有 拖鞋自備 (有即棄酒店拖鞋備用) 毛巾自帶 (新毛巾hk$20/條) 風筒可借用(按金hk$100) 熨斗可借用(按金hk$100) 洗衣+乾衣 hk$60/7磅 房有轉換插頭 前枱位置可寄存行李(免費) 我們是遊客賓館,只限持海外護照, 旅遊証件的外籍人士(連入境記錄章及於批准逗留時限內)或港澳通行证登記入住｡ - 24hrs reception service - No eating on the bed, cleaning fees is at hk$400 and up.  - No smoking in all rooms and all indoor. Smoking area is available outside of flat entrance with open area. - Please be quite after 11pm - bunk beds style room - hk$100 refundable deposit for hairdryer - hk$100 refundable deposit for iron + ironboard - no free towel; hk$20 for new towel available at reception - bring your own slippers, disposable hotel slippers is available for free.  - We offer the same day luggage storage for free. - Overnight Luggage storage is hk$10-30 per pc per night, depends on size and availability. - we provide shampoo and soap - we do not provide toothpaste+toothbrush - Speci

host.host_about:
Centrally located in Mongkok, Kowloon, Dragon Hostel offers economy private rooms and shared rooms for all people around the world. 
Experience Hongkong style, what we eat, how we work, how we live, and how we have fun!!

reviews.comments: 깨끗함. 쌈마이로 최고
位置很好,交通也很方便
入住与退房便捷｡交通出行购物都很方便｡房东服务周到｡房间有窗户,通透采光好｡三人合住性价比很高｡
房东人很nice,位置也很好找,就在旺角地铁站附近,就是晚上车流声会有一丢丢吵,不过带了耳塞就听不到了｡厕所有点迷你,因为不常住,不妨碍使用｡
交通购物都很方便,房间虽然小但是很干净,性价比高
So far so good! Would definitely choose this place as my accommodation for my next trip!
位置挺便利的
香港所有民宿差不多都是小客栈,这家地理位置很不错,wifi也很快｡房间干净,有空调,很方便｡

房間簡潔｡
交通便利
性價比高｡
房東人很和善｡
大家要記得入住時間和退房時間､不要像我一樣⋯⋯淚｡
可以放心预定,很好,房东也很好,房间干净,被子床褥睡起来很不错,这是一次舒心的选择
三个成年人出游,联系了房东希望给我们预留三个单人床｡嗯,老板给我们安排了,房间虽小但是很干净｡且老板提供的路线很准确,出了地铁口很快找到住处｡住的地理位置很好,离地铁以及附近购物,吃的地方很近｡房东很热情,发的信息及时回复｡总之,这次香港出游住的dragon house很满意,推荐一下｡
个人感觉比预想要好一些,位置是真的特别中心,一出门就是地铁站和新世纪广场｡而且房东人很不错,我们上午十一点左右就到了,房东帮我们办理了提前入住,走的那天还帮我们免费托运行李｡就这个价位来说,在香港和很不错的了｡
還可以
比预想好很多,房间不是很大,但是非常干净｡也有热水可以洗澡洗头｡非常满意

Good budget option for a quick stay in Hong Kong. Not much space in the room, but that was to be expected. If you need a quick place close to the metro this hostel works well. Added bonus that there was a delicious dim sum restaurant just down the street.

房间很整齐干净 虽然小 但是住得挺舒服的 在旺角肯定找不到比这里性价比更高的民宿了!民宿除了有提供牙刷牙膏一次性拖鞋 还很贴心地提供了行李寄存服务 转换插头免费茶包热开水和冷开水 而且房东人都很nice很好说话 唯一缺点就是我们住的房间洗手间没办法冲水 所以上厕所很不方便 希望能快点修好~
总的来说还是很推荐的 性价比真的非常高
房间不大但是干净整洁白天会有打扫,交通非常便利,唯一的美中不足是房源位于繁华的市区虽然房间在7楼之高但楼下行车的噪音仍有些影响睡眠,带个耳塞体验会更佳~性价比良好~

一间舒适的住房能够给旅行添色不少,这次的住宿体验真的非常好｡旅馆距离旺角地铁站非常近,出了地铁站大概走2-3分钟就到了,出行很便利｡楼下就有711,药房,商场跟小吃店,要买宵夜零食这些非常方便,附近的古早味跟早餐店超好吃!订的是3人房,一张上下床跟一张单床,房间很干净,真的一根头发丝都找不到的那种干净,还会有人每天帮忙收拾垃圾,房间里边有空调电视热水器与独立卫生间,毛巾拖鞋要自备,吹风筒在饮水台公共区域｡房东是个很亲切的老爷爷,登记的时候就很温柔地给我们介绍跟指引,退房之后帮我们免费寄存行李,在我们离开的时候还很亲切地给我们指路,感恩｡
房东很热情,房间很小但香港大家都懂嘛,位置离旺角地铁很近,性价比很高｡

Super convenient! Just a few minutes walk from Mong Kok station. The location is amazing and we love it. The room is tiny but clean. The only thing bothers is the busy street and noise till midnight. But it won’t bother that much. Pretty good choice for stay!
房子会有点拥挤,不过旅游将就住下还是可以接受的｡房间比想象的干净很多,总体还是不错的｡

name: Cosy Flat 1 Block from Leblon Beach
summary: Super Cosy 1 Bedroom flat one block from Leblon beach.  Perfect for a couple or family up to 4 people.  Located in one of the best streets of leblon, close to shops, restaurants, supermarkets and all facilities you need.
space: The Flat is located on the 7th floor of the building that has all services you need:  24 hour reception, shared pool with restaurant on the top floor!

host.host_about: I'm a TV Executive Producer from Rio de Janeiro that spends every single free time traveling around the globe.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Maria was an amazing host.  She was there to greet us and give us tips on what to see and do.  The apartment was very clean and in a really great neighborhood.  We would definitely stay here again!

Descrição do anúncio foi tudo de acordo.
Anfitriã bem atenciosa.
Bairro muito arborizado e bonito.
Apartamento bem aconchegante, tudo de bom.
Serviço de limpeza e Recepcionista do prédio ok.
Great host! Never get to meet her, but she was really helpfull with whatever we needed. The apartment Is amazing, exactly like the pictures, great location! Hopefully i Will stay there again.

Maria was quick in her response and helpful in how to get checked in.  She told me where to eat and helped me get acclamated to the area. I felt safe in the building and the area as this was a big deal for me.  I am so happy that after researching so many places we picked her flat. The kids found it funny when I referred to her as 'my friend' even though we did not meet.
Maria was really helpful and very responsive to messages. She recommended some fantastic restaurants in the area and made everything very easy. We had a lovely time.

name: IDEAL! HABITACIÓN DOBLE CON BALCÓN
summary: Ideal! The apartment is located in one of the best areas of Barcelona, Fort Pienc, neiborhood very quiet 10 minutes walk from the city center, and less than five minutes from the Borne where you will find restaurants, bars and other places with night
space: Ideal! The apartment is located in one of the best areas of Barcelona, Fort Pienc, barr (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ery quiet 10 minutes walk from the city center, and less than five minutes from the Borne where you will find restaurants, bars and other places with nightlife. On the other hand it is also just a five minute walk from the Arc de Triomphe and Ciutatella park, and 15 minutes walk from the beach of Barceloneta. The room is full equipped with large closet, double bed (135x190),desk with available computer with free WiFi, mirror, cobbler shoe and access to sunny balcony. The apartment has WIFI connection optical fiber, sunny terrace where you can have breakfast or lunch (if the weather permit it), large living room to watch the 42 " television, fully equipped kitchen (washing machine, refrigerator, oven, microwave, kitchen utensils ...) and spacious bathroom with shower, towels and gels. Most of the time the flat was without people, so you can feel more comfortable. At 20
description: Ideal! The apartment has WIFI connection optical fiber, sunny terrace where you can have breakfast or lunch (if the weather permit it), large living room to watch t

reviews.comments:
Choć gospodarza nie było na miejscu kiedy przyjechałyśmy, odebrała nas bardzo pomocna Laura - współlokatorka Adriana. Mieszkanie wyglądało prawie tak samo jak na zdjęciach. Jest to ładna kamienica, mieszkanie już wiekowe, ale dzięki temu ma swój klimat. 
Dobra lokalizacja - centrum Barcelony, blisko do metra i stacji autobusów, przy mniej uczęszczanej ulicy. Aczkolwiek w nocy, jeśli ktoś nie jest przyzwyczajony do hałasu, sporadycznie przejeżdżające pojazdy mogą przeszkadzać.
Ogólne wrażenie jest bardzo dobre. Polecam mieszkanie u Adriana!

name: 2 beds in Chic Apt in Astoria NYC
summary: 2 private bedrooms available with two comfortable queen-size beds. 1 full bathroom. 10 mins from LGA and 15 Mins from midtown NYC.  My apartment is definitely a unique find in NYC! You will find plenty of room in my elegant and comfortable home.
space: Come relax in my fully updated 2 story apartment in one of the hottest neighborhoods in NYC. With brick walls, beautiful hardwood floors and elegant furnishings, I hope you will enjoy a taste of life in the big city.
description: 2 private bedrooms available with two comfortable queen-size beds. 1 full bathroom. 10 mins from LGA and 15 Mins from midtown NYC.  My apartment is definitely a unique find in NYC! You will find plenty of room in my elegant and comfortable home. Come relax in my fully updated 2 story apartment in one of the hottest neighborhoods in NYC. With brick walls, beautiful hardwood floors and elegant furnishings, I hope you will enjoy a taste of life in the big city. You will have full access to two private bedrooms with queen size beds, and a private bathroom. I will give you the WiFi password upon arrival. Feel free to enjoy the television with full cable and help yourself to use of the kitchen for light cooking. I will greet you upon check-in and provide a key to access the main entrance to the building and the apartment. I will be home most of the time and would love to get to know you and help you make sure you enjoy your time in NYC. Astoria is a vibrant neighborhood full of wonderful res
neighborhood_overview: Astoria is a vibrant neighborhood full of wonderful restaurants, bars, cafes and parks. Just ask me for some suggestions of what to do if you are not planning on being in Manhattan the entire time.
notes: Coffee and milk available every morning :)  TRANSPORTATION: If you are flying and arriving at LaGuardia Airport, you can take the M60 Select Bus Service from each terminal and get off at the Steinway Street stop which is just across Astoria Blvd from the apartment. If you are coming from JFK you can take the AirTrain to Jamaica Station and pick-up the NYC Subway from there. You will want to take the E Train from there towards Manhattan to the Jackson Heights/Roosevelt Ave. stop and transfer across the platform to the R Train towards Manhattan. Get off at the Steinway Street stop and walk 4 blocks to the apartment. You can also take a cab from either airport.
transit: There are multiple options for getting around. You can take the Q101 bus through the heart of Astoria and over the Queensboro Bridge into 59th Street area. You can also pick up the N,W trains several blocks from the apartment (Astoria Blvd stop) as well as the M,R trains (Steinway stop).
access: You will have full access to two private bedrooms with queen size beds, and a private bathroom. I will give you the WiFi password upon arrival. Feel free to enjoy the television with full cable and help yourself to use of the kitchen for light cooking. I will greet you upon check-in and provide a key to access the main entrance to the building and the apartment.
interaction: I will be home most of the time and would love to get to know you and help you make sure you enjoy your time in NYC.
house_rules: I just ask that you be respectful of the apartment and leave the apartment in the way that you found it upon arrival. No shoes inside the apartment. Feel free to wear sleepers or flip-flops to walk around the house No eating/drinking in the bedroom No smoking No pets I am a young professional currently working on my second Masters degree. I like to keep a nice home and are happy to share it with new friends!! :)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
My name is Raul and I am 33 years old originally from Asuncion-Paraguay. After obtaining a Law degree and becoming a Lawyer in my home country, I moved to NYC which has been a little over six years since that. I recently completed my second master's degree, MBA. I have a strong interest in interior design which you'll see throughout the apartment when you come. I love to dance Latin music, cook international dishes, and get to know and make new friends from around the world.
I hope to meet you soon :)

name: Queen bed in Newtown Home
summary: This three bedroom house is the perfect location for a day or week on the outskirts of Sydney.   Newtown is a vibrant area with loads of cafe's, bars, restaurants, parks and quirky streets to explore and just a 5 minute walk to the train station!
space: The house is a bit old and has some Newtown wear and tear but has everything you need.  With beautiful hardwood floors, a courtyard to enjoy breakfast outside and a spacious room with a queen bed we trust you will feel at home.
description: This three bedroom house is the perfect location for a day or week on the outskirts of Sydney.   Newtown is a vibrant area with loads of cafe's, bars, restaurants, parks and quirky streets to explore and just a 5 minute walk to the train station! The house is a bit old and has some Newtown wear and tear but has everything you need.  With beautiful hardwood floors, a courtyard to enjoy breakfast outside and a spacious room with a queen bed we trust you will feel at home. Guests will have access through the main door shared by the house.  You will have your own set of keys provided on arrival. This three bedroom house is shared by three people.  One of us travels a lot so we put one of the rooms on Airbnb when it is free.   You will be sharing the house with two people who are very friendly and always happy to share a meal or a drink or perhaps explore Sydney together.  We work during the day so the house is pretty quiet then. Enjoy walking the streets and seeing the street art or chill
neighborhood_overview: Enjoy walking the streets and seeing the street art or chill out in a quiet cafe or park and read a book.  Newtown is home to everything hipster and trendy plus it is full of free spirited individuals!
transit: This Newtown house is just a 5 minute walk to the train station one block off king street so quiet at night but only a stone throw from great cafes and bars.  The train or bus will will get you into the CBD to see all the major sights in just 10-15 minutes.  Or grab a bus to the beach in just 30 minutes. We are just 1km from beautiful Sydney park with over 20 acres of parkland to explore and a great off leash dog park.
access: Guests will have access through the main door shared by the house.  You will have your own set of keys provided on arrival.
interaction: This three bedroom house is shared by three people.  One of us travels a lot so we put one of the rooms on Airbnb when it is free.   You will be sharing the house with two people who are very friendly and always happy to share a meal or a drink or perhaps explore Sydney together.  We work during the day so the house is pretty quiet then.
house_rules: We ask that you treat the house with respect, we are open to having pets come along with you on request.  No house parties please.

reviews.comments: Allison was EXTREMELY helpful and accommodative. Lovely girl, and so are the other 2 ladies. Comfortable bed, plenty of space in the wardrobe.  Newtown is a fantastic location, a couple minute walk to the train station and a 10minute train into Circular Quay.

Allisons and co were awesome. The place was perfect for me. I just needed a couple of nights in Newtown with some similar aged people. Was a very relaxed and independent vibe. One of housemates was very nice and even invited me out with her friends. I felt very welcomed although with a good dose of space and privacy. Perfect 5/5. Oh and it was my first air bnb stay :) 
Thanks Allison and co!

Had a great week here Allison was super helpful! She worked away for the week but was there when we checked in and told us all about the property! Her room mates are really nice and friendly and made us feel welcome for the week! I would defiantly stay here again and would highly recommend it!
Very good place to stay and try all that Newtown has to offer, especially food. The girls put us onto the carriage works food market.

Alison's was a great place to stay. Very conveniently located close to the main streets of Newtown and less than 10 minutes from Newtown Station. Her other house mates were great and I enjoyed a good chin wag with them one evening I was there. Highly recommended.

The room was bright and airy. The location was only a couple of streets from King St in Newtown and was very close to cafes and train stations. The house was clean and well maintained and the housemates were friendly and welcoming.  All in all a good location and a great little place to stay.

reviews.comments: This was my first time using AirBnB and I really enjoyed it. My host was great, helping me get to the location from the airpot, helping me get set up in Hk with buying an Octopus card and SIM card, as well as helping me reach the MTR when I was leaving. He just made my stay in HK convenient and hassle-free. If you want to just chill and relax in HK, then I recommend this place.

.... PERHAPS THE (Website hidden by Airbnb) "HORRIBLE" experience one could face ....
Host was contacted a few days prior arrival via phone and told me, he'll NOT be in HKG ....
But I was able to meet/see Host on said day of arrival (early a m), but Host did NOT WANTED TO ACCEPT me ...... however, he did pay me back (next day) the already paid request for the accommodation ..... 
I had a MOST TERRIBLE time, since AT THE VERY SAME MOMENT/TIME a quite STRONG Typhon was rolling over Hong Kong   ... to find some alternate accommodation was almost IMPOSSIBLE with such short notice AND ALSO NO TAXIS AVAILABLE ....... !!!
P/s, a few month ago (after the confirmation), Tang wrote/answered through eMail that he's looking forward/welcoming me ..... hahaha
Sorry, my first and LAST Experience also with "airbnb" = NEVER again ..... !!!

summary: Our house is located in a calm and charming village in the heart of Catete district, two blocks away of the subway. All rooms are composed by a box spring bed, sink, TV, fridge, wardrobe and a writing desk. We have wifi, kitchen and laundry available
description: Our house is located in a calm and charming village in the heart of Catete district, two blocks away of the subway. All rooms are composed by a box spring bed, sink, TV, fridge, wardrobe and a writing desk. We have wifi, kitchen and laundry available

name: Owl's Landing- The Loft
summary: Make Sure you READ the house rules and Frequently Asked Questions! Airbnb is a home sharing platform. It is based on TRUST and Economics. It is like staying at your friend's house and leaving them some money to pay for the associated costs.  I have to trust that you will respect myself and my home. I want you to be happy so if you are used to a hotel experience please book elsewhere,my place does not have those standards of service. It's a simple home intended for nice people on limited budgets.
space: The loft bed is a full size mattress. The upper loft bed is only designed for one person. Beneath it is an additional full size bed that can sleep two people. The window faces East looking out at the Bay. 30 min from Battery Park, Manhattan. There are shelves and a spot to hang your clothes. Common areas living, room, kitchen, bathrooms are shared space. House has WiFi. There is 1 SHARED BATHROOM. There is also 1 SHARED WC. Please READ the entire listing. Please READ the House Rules. Please READ the FAQ's. Please READ.
description: Make Sure you READ the house rules and Frequently Asked Questions! Airbnb is a home sharing platform. It is based on TRUST and Economics. It is like staying at your friend's house and leaving them some money to pay for the associated costs.  I have to trust that you will respect myself and my home. I want you to be happy so if you are used to a hotel experience please book elsewhere,my place does not have those standards of service. It's a simple home intended for nice people on limited budgets. The loft bed is a full size mattress. The upper loft bed is only designed for one person. Beneath it is an additional full size bed that can sleep two people. The window faces East looking out at the Bay. 30 min from Battery Park, Manhattan. There are shelves and a spot to hang your clothes. Common areas living, room, kitchen, bathrooms are shared space. House has WiFi. There is 1 SHARED BATHROOM. There is also 1 SHARED WC. Please READ the entire listing. Please READ the House Rules. Please REA
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood here is very nice. It is generally quiet except for the occasional firetruck, or sometimes local parties by neighbors. Shutting a window keeps out most noise. It is NYC after all, so it's not rural quiet. Saint Pauls avenue is filled with old Victorian houses that are very nice to see and create a pleasant area. There are restaurants nearby, and a store about 4 blocks away for food items and other needs. It is about 12 minutes to walk to the Ferry or 2-5 minutes by bus. The areas towards the Ferry can appear run down in some spots. Again, this is NYC, filled with a great diversity of people. The area is safe, but it is not Disneyland.
notes: There two other rooms listed on Airbnb. The links are here: www.airbnb.com/rooms/9882254 garden queen www.airbnb.com/rooms/9695052 twin bunks www.airbnb.com/rooms/9767864 loft full THIS IS NOT A HOTEL, IT IS A HOME. THERE IS NO CLEANING FEE. Expect normal lived-in conditions for the house. Some people like to describe the house as "run-down". Bathrooms and floors cleaned once a week! All bedrooms cleaned between use! Airbnb does not leave enough room to describe house, PLEASE READ EVERYTHING!! Please respect other guests. The local buses all run down Victory blvd (about 2 blocks away) towards the Ferry. The Ferry is 24/7 and runs every 30 minutes, 15 during rush hours and is free. There are also buses that go to Bay Ridge, Brooklyn (about (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minute ride).
transit: The local buses are all about 2 blocks away on Victory blvd and run to the Ferry. Ferry is free, 24/7 every 30 minutes (15 minutes during rush hours). From Manhattan side you have the 4/5 express trains, 1 train, and R train as well as Manhattan buses and tour buses, and Battery Park with ferries to Statue of Liberty, and Ferry to Governors Island.
access: The room comes with your own private key. You have additional access and use to the Living Room, Kitchen, Lounge, Back patio, Backyard, and Gardens.
interaction: I work a lot but am happy to help whenever I'm around. Please feel free to ask me anything. If you need directions for travel or recommendations for food I will be happy to help. If there is something you are looking for or need please communicate it so that I can help you. Everyone is different, it is important that you communicate any needs.
house_rules: ALL GUESTS are responsible for following HOUSE RULES Owl's Landing House Rules - FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS BELOW *1. NO outside shoes beyond landing/foyer area. Inside sandals, slippers, etc.. that don't touch the streets are fine.  2. Private or Restricted posted areas are off-limits and anyone found trespassing these areas will be asked to leave immediately. 3. All keys are to be returned to designated area at check out time. No keys given shall be copied, or altered. Extra sets available upon request. Lost keys=$25 4. You break it, you buy it. 5. No smoking in the house. If you smoke, please ask for an ash tray and please keep all smoking to the outdoor areas, do not leave cigarette butts on the ground. 6. Secure and lock front and back door at all times, do not leave doors open or unlocked. 7. Communications must be through Airbnb messaging service which will provide a record of correspondence. The Airbnb messaging service chimes my phone uniquely so I am able to respond to you qu

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I work as a Conservation Ecologist to restore, study, and encourage balance to conserve natural areas, remaining habitat, and resources in New York City for indigenous species of flora and fauna. I like the outdoors, I enjoy travel and travelers alike. I try to be peaceful and patient with all things and try to be kind to all since that it was I enjoy in return. It is a fascinating world of differences and I am merely one fragment of the whole, a passing beam of light in a world of passing, beaming lights. I enjoy tall tales, short tales, adventurous tales and just nice, friendly people that have love in their heart and that are salt of the earth.

reviews.comments:
Top, I absolutely recommend!
Location is great and so much better than Brooklyn. You are at Manhattan Downtown in under 30 minutes with the free ferry. Also very welcoming!

Alex was a great host. He made me feel as though I was home. The listing was accurate and the room was just as in the pictures. I would definitely stay at Alex's place again next time I am in Staten Island.

개인실은 다소 불편한 점이 있습니다. 서양인들은 어떨지 모르겠지만, 2층 침대가 천장과 딱 붙어서 앉아있질 못한다든지, 침대 밑에 있는 의자도 너무 낮아서 개인작업을 하기에는 적합하지가 않아요. 다만 숙소 자체의 불편함을 제외하면 모든 것들이 만점에 가깝습니다. 스테튼 아일랜드 페리 타는 정류장하고도 가깝고, 무엇보다도 호스트가 너무 친절합니다. 흡사 오래 보고 살아온 동네 아저씨 느낌ㅋㅋ. 호스트가 추천해주는 식당들 전부 맛있고, 공원도 다들 가볼만 합니다. 대신 초록이 좀 우거졌을 때 오세요. 저는 이른 시기에 와서 좀 고생 하다 갔어요ㅠ

Alex greets you at the door with a smile and the keys for the house. He can tell you where to go for anything you want to do. The view from his house is great, and the ferry is a short walk away. 10/10 would stay again.

I was lucky to enjoy Alex’ hospitality and advices during my two weeks stay in New York. He has a lovely and comfortable home, a great place to stay. And the free rides on the Staten Island ferries to and from Lower Manhattan are breathtaking and were a highlight each day. If I ever have the opportunity to visit New York again, that’s the place I want to stay again. 
Many thanks, Alex, having made my stay in New York really special!

Simply beautiful. Owl's nest is a very special home in one of my favorite communities of New York City - Tompkinsville. Alex's house feels like a home the second you walk in. Great shower, great location and a wonderful way to be close enough to Manhattan for an easy commute without feeling overwhelmed by the craziness of the city that never sleeps.
It was a great stay in a charming little house in Staten Island, just a few minutes away of the ferry. Alex is very welcoming and makes you feel at home.

Alex is a super relaxed guy who tries to make your stay as comfortable as possible. He arranged his schedule so he could meet me early and he even bought a hair dryer for me. The house has everything you might need and the location is perfect if you want to be in Manhattan in 30 minutes but still relax from the bustling city. I had a really great experience.

Alex's place was so relaxing I didn't want to leave but unfortunately because he's so popular he was fully booked. A beautiful rambling yard with amazing views of the water and Manhatten. His house is eclectic and a world of its own. Alex was incredibly generous with info about everything and really interesting to talk to. Didn't even want guests doing the dishes or anything like that. Incredibly good value . I would have just stayed there for a week and commuted back and forwards to Manhatten or Brooklyn if I could have. Highly recommended .

Thanks Alex!!  My stay was brief but a very good one.  The room was clean and as listed/promised.  Alex's communication was great and he gave me a good thorough tour of the house and rules.  Wifi was very good and I got to meet some other VERY nice guests while I was there the next morning.  A very easy walk to the Staten Island Ferry and the Craft House nearby was a great local bar/restaurant  with good food and great beer.

The house Owl ´ landing was awesome and i can only recommended. It is special and comfi, i felt very good there. House is also good located, cca 15 minutes walking from the South Ferry, with connectivity during whole night. 
Alex is very nice host who helps you feel comfortable and welcome and provide you with all information which you need abt your stay. Thank you Alex.

Alex is a wonderful host, and made us feel very welcome. My young son and myself spent over a week at Alex's and we had a wonderful time. We felt really at home. The entire house is very nice, with all the necessary amenities. The neighborhood is nice, and a short walking distance from my son's school - which was a huge plus. And, Alex is a really nice and laid-back person who made us feel very welcome and at home. I would not hesitate to stay at his place when I'm in the city again.

THE BEST OF ALL!! It's a great room! I felt extremely welcome and comfortable. It's in a great location. The house is in a calm and nice street, close to the ferry and some restaurants. The host makes sure everything is okay by offering snacks, explaining some rules as well as giving some tips on where to go/what to do around the area. GREAT GREAT GREAT!

Alex is a great host. He even gave me a ride to the ferry that I was almost about to miss. He welcomes you and shows you the house and where to go. He is a great guy to talk to anytime and he makes great breakfast meals. Between the numbers 1-10 on how great Alex was being the host I give him a 100. He wasn't only a host but also my new friend. Great experience, thank you Alex.
Great place to stay with a very friendly host
Never a problem safe clean and friendly

Alex est un hôte délicieux et prévenant et la chambre est tout à fait confortable. On se sent très vite chez soi dans sa jolie maison pleine de plantes vertes, avec un jardin fouillis à l'arrière. Au bout de la première demi-heure, j'ai eu l'impression qu'on se connaissait depuis longtemps. Et en plus, cet homme sait parler aux oiseaux !  Merci Alex pour ton accueil chaleureux.
The room and home are as pictured. Alex is a warm and attentive host.

The location is only 14 minutes from the Staten Island ferry, so it's very convenient commute to the city. There is a laundromat right near the house in case you need to wash your clothes. The house is very peaceful and quite. The bed itself is very comfortable, perfect for a good nights sleep.

Alex is a very friendly and helpful host, he provided me lot of travel tips on Staten Island and invited me for a taste of California wine upon check-in. Highly recommend his place for convenience, comfort and value of money. 
Tip for light sleepers: better close the window when you are sleeping, otherwise you might feel the noise of running vehicles a bit disturbing

It was a great place to stay. Alex is friendly and helpful. There are bars, a supermarket and busstops nearby The bus takes 5 minutes to the ferry and there are many buslines going in that direction. We had nothing to complain about. Thanks again Alex
Alex gave us a tour of his home and has a lot to offer. Great place, great location for for the ferry! Alex was very helpful and I would stay again!

This was my first Airbnb experience, and it was certainly not my last. Alex is very open and easy to talk to, and I felt like home the whole time I was there. I would definitely recommend staying there. It is really just a few minutes walk to the ferry, and going to Manhattan every day with the wind in my face and the skyline ahead was always a nice way to start the day. The place is clean, comfortable and in a nice and quiet neighbourhood. Personally I also liked that he has many plants in his house. When I arrived, Alex had tons of recommendations for nice restaurants nearby and also told be some nice places in Manhattan when I asked him. Well, what else can I say. I would stay there again next time if I get the chance! A really cool location! Thanks Alex!

Alex's home is eclectic, comfortable and interesting. At first I was concerned because there is no central air, but with a box fan in the window and a comfortable bed, I slept soundly and had a great night's sleep. 

I was visiting for business and left early in the morning and didn't return until later in the evening, so I did not have much interaction with the host, but Alex was very friendly and helpful during check-in.

Staten Island neighborhoods can go from nice to rough at the turn of a corner, and not being family with the area, I did not venture out at night. The house is conveniently located less than a mile from the ferry and I never felt unsafe walking to and from.

Overall, it was a very nice experience and I would stay again.

Alex's place was great. Just the thing I needed. It was clean and the pictures describe exactly what you get. At first the ferry ride made me skeptical, but it turned out to be the perfect opportunity to unwind from all the city hustle. As for Alex, he was very welcoming and personable. He gave me tips on what to see and some good restaurants. I would definitely stay again!

Alex is a great host who could inform us well about all the travel plans we had. We really felt at home. We could use living room, kitchen and patio. This place is highly recommended. The South Ferry to Manhattan is only a short walk and free of charge. On the way to the ferry there is a good supermarket on Bay Street / Victory Avenue with fresh department everyday open from 7 AM until 10 PM.

Alex is a great host.  He is very attentive, explains everything about the house and the environment. He also thinks of everything his guests need. He even has umbrella's for his guests and makes delicious coffee in the morning. I would really recommend Alex as a host. But he's also a very nice person you can have a great conversation with. Thanks Alex!

Alex made checking in very easy, communicating promptly before we arrived and showing us all the amenities and features after we arrived. The house itself is very nice and has all the features and conveniences one would expect and within walking distance of the Staten Island Ferry (recommended - it's free and has good views of the Statue of Liberty if you're not willing to pay for a tour!) over to Manhattan.

Good location with easy links into Manhattan via the Staten Island Ferry (free, but only gets you on shore unless you want to do a LOT of walking).
Facilities were clean & tidy, and it was enjoyable to spend time there. 
Alex was a brilliant host, helping us work out how to get around, along with other guests, and all just after having had an accident himself.
The room can get quite hot during the height of summer, but we were out exploring in the day and it was manageable with several fans in the evening and night.
Highly recommended if you want somewhere affordable to explore Manhattan from!
Alex was a great host! He welcomed us warmly, gave us excellent tips about New York and Staten Island and we felt like at home. Highly recommended and we will definitely return.

Alex is a great host, it was a pleasure to have deal with him. He is friendly, helpful and easy to communicate person. His place is clean and nice. Bathroom is not 5 star but it still has all that you need :) The best thing about Alex's place is location. It's less than hour trip to Manhattan Island on the free of charge ferry. I highly recommend Alex and his place for everyone who looking for nice room in NYC for reasonable price.

Alex have been really welcoming even if we arrived later than we thought because of the NY traffic. The bedroom is small but useful, towels were provided and beds were ready before we arrived. We could use all the commodities in the house which was really pleasant. Everything was great, thank you !

Blanca and I enjoyed our stay at the Owl's Nest. We found Alex very informative and friendly but let us do our own thing. It was our first time using airb&b and was wondering delighted. The description of the room was exactly what we found, we will use it more and more with more confidence. Blanca and I would like to thank Alex for adding some spice to our adventure.

Excellent choice if in need of being near Manhattan and not concerned about extra time in taking the ferry and alternatives.  If driving by car, even better since that is what I did.  Plenty of street parking.  Was able to stay and drive into Brooklyn, etc...

alex's house is like a home,it is lovely,big and comfortable. He is very friendly and provide many useful suggestions,help to do everything you want. House is in a quiet area and easy to arrive city centre,you can take a free ferry from staten island to city,you also can get a good view for statue of liberty on the ferry which is pretty good,so i recommend alex to you,this is a good choice!

Mieszkanie u Alexa to była przyjemność ! Bardzo fajna okolica, wrażenia z płynięcia promem na Manhattan niezapomniane . Alex jest bardzo sympatyczny. Zaraz po przyjeździe udzielił nam wszelkich informacji. Polecam !

This was a very last minute booking, and I'm so glad I've found Alex! His place is walking distance from the ferry, and was a block away from the bus I needed during our stay. His home is clean, warm, and cozy, and Alex was super helpful. Highly recommend it!

Alex made us feel welcome on arrival and during our stay, offering advice about the area and Manhattan and making a fresh pot of coffee in the morning which was nice. We were able to use all of the kitchen facilities, including light cooking and had ample space in the fridge for our things. The wireless internet worked well and was easy to connect to and there was a PC & TV we could use in the living room with Netflix etc. Staying with Alex is a good value option for a visit to New York, especially with the free Staten Island ferry. It is only a few minutes by bus to Alex's place and the bus schedules are planned to coincide with the ferry arriving at St George's. Whilst Alex's street is nice, the area between it and the ferry terminal is not as nice and we did not always feel completely safe, especially at night, for example we had an altercation with someone aggressively pestering us for money at a bus stop on Bay Street during the morning and several unpleasant characters on the bus at night, who were shouting, swearing and banging on the windows. Obviously this is outside Alex's control and some people may not be as bothered by it as we were, but i think its important for travellers to be aware. Overall we enjoyed our stay which was really good value when compared to staying elsewhere in New York.

Staying at Owl's Landing was possibly the best Airbnb-experience anyone could hope for. Alex is a wonderful person and an excellent host who has both great tips on what to do in Staten Island and elsewhere in New York, and who also takes care of the little things, like making sure there's designated shelf-space for your things in the bathroom. On top of this, the beds are comfy, the decor of the house utterly charming, (and there's a supermarket very close by and the ferry really is only in perfect walking distance). I'd recommend staying at Owl's Landing any day. It was a perfect stay. Thank you, Alex.

Alex was extremely helpful & nice, would have liked to have time to chat more but we were busy.  Use of kitchen & bathroom was easy & flexible. Alex was very generous - even booked us a taxi in the rain on last day. The only possible drawback for someone alone was that we felt a bit wary on the streets at night.
my parents loved it! Everything was perfect! If you are Brazilian and looking for a place to stay, I recommend Alex

La chaleureuse maison d'Alex est idéalement située si vous ne souhaitez pas être en plein bruit et que vous recherchez un peu de verdure. Non loin du metro, à côté des bus qui vous mènent à St Georges. Nous avons pu nous y reposer moi et mon fils, et profiter tranquillement du ferry gratuit qui vous mène à Manhattan pour faire du shopping et visiter des musées pendant 9 jours. Alex est de bons conseils et il sait vous laisser vivre votre vie dans la bienveillance. Il s' est montré attentif à nos besoins et questionnements et ne s' éternisait pas dans des réponses approximatives. La maison était chauffée fin octobre et la sympatique vue sur la baie a rajouté du charme à notre séjour. La chambre était propre et un peu excentrée des autres chambres et il y a un espace pour ranger les affaires. Nous recommandons!

Alex was a very nice host!  Before I even arrived, I was pleased with his response time whenever I messaged.

He was very personable and seems responsive to quest cues.  When I arrived, I just wanted to sleep, he realized and gave me the short and sweet tour.  Other guests arrived like 10 minutes later and were treated to a lovely speech about Staten Island and a mini tour using Goggle Maps.

He had coffee and tea available for people.  Alex also made extra coffee in the mornings after I mentioned I drank coffee in the morning too.  

Listing itself I feel is well worth the price charged.  Owl's Landing is a home and has the wonderful quirks that come with being a lived in space.  I got to dig a place that has a stack of comic books available to read in the bathroom and a Batman toy handing on entrance coat-hook.  The public areas of the house designed to be cozy, which was nice when I wanted an afternoon of not being a tourist.

I stayed for a week and cleanliness was never an issue.  The public areas stayed neat and bathrooms remained stocked.

I was happy with the location.  My vacation plans had me going to all five boroughs, so I knew my transit times going in and out were going to be long.  As is the nature of New York City, it was connected to everywhere, some places take a longer time than others.  

If you are planning the normal Manhattan tourist places, this place is a good bargain.  The ferry makes it easy to connect to Manhattan, I personally didn't count that part into my transit time since I got wonderful views riding it.

I would definitely consider staying with Alex again!

I stayed the night before NYC marathon in Alex's place.  Which is in a walking distance (10 min ) from the ferry station and around 2 miles from the  start line. The house has enough space,  room and shared areas, everything is super clean. Alex is a great host, he prepared coffee in the morning, have apples for snacks and clean towels in the room.  And the best,  thanks again for that,  he gave me a ride closer to the marathon star line =)  !!

The host Alex  is very very nice:helpful,welcoming,accommodating.

The house feels very warm, there  are desserts and fruits which Alex share  with us.

The  facilities are good and we can cook happily in his mother-like-kitchen.

The location is  good.  The ferry is convineice  and have good view at night.

Of course, the room is clean and tidy.

We enjoyed the time spending at Alex's home and highly recommend.

Probably my best airbnb experience ever.
Alex's house is charming, cozy, functional and well located. We loved the patio, the plants inside and the velvet couches.
The host itself is great as well, full of good advices and attentions. 
Thank you again for this amazing stay!!
Clara & Coraline
We booked for two nights and the experience was so great that we extended our stay there for 5 more nights! I highly recommand Alex, you'll love it!
Good value! Loved the Netflix!

Alex is a great host. Perfect if you're wanting a private place to sleep, walking distance to Ferry at a reasonable price.

Would stay again if I came back.
Great value, Alex was very helpful. Room can be quite cold during the winter (blankets available).
The location is good with reasonable prices.
This was our second time at Alex's place. It is cozy and convenient, and Alex was a nice host.

Alex's place is really comfy!!! After the long bus ride, I feel very relax in staying in this clean and comfy place. Alex explained everything in the house and that is very useful, especially the part that telling me the shops near Alex's place. Highly recommended for everyone!!
Staying on Staten Island as a tourist is awesome! The ferry is really close and runs 24/7! Clean house and wonderful host. Best bang for your buck. Will definitely be back!

First time we stayed at an airbnb and we were very pleased with our choice! Alex is a great host with a very clean place! There is a lot of space within the house that he has allowed for the guests and it was very helpful for our down time. The room was a little tight but for the price it was way more than we expected! The area is a little strange but there are great restaurants around and the Ferry into town is within walking distance! Overall a great stay!
Seriously a great place
great place! very happy

Great place, Alex us warm and hospitable- he even offered us some dinner when we first arrived and interrupted his cooking! he also loaned us jackets as we didn't have enough warm clothing. Clean, lovely home, easy to get to with the free ferry to Staten Island. Good wifi, nice that he offeres Netflix etc, we really appreciated tea and coffee too :)

We had a great time at Alex's place. Everything was as described online and very clean. 
Alex could also recommend us places to eat at and to see in the neighborhood.

I would recommend to stay here!
We had a very great time staying at Alex's place for the weekend. Alex was a great host! The location was perfect, only a 10 minute walk to the ferry. Would definitely stay there again!!
A true gem for the price!! J'y ai voyagé avec ma fille et nous avons été toutes les deux charmées par cet endroit!

Eine sehr schöne Wohnung in Staten Island ganz in der Nähe der Staten Island Ferry, die 24 Stunden am Tag alle 30 Minuten kostenlos nach Manhattan und zurück fährt. Das Zimmer war sauber und beide Betten relativ groß und sehr komfortabel. 
Alex war sehr freundlich und wir hatten eine angenehme Zeit. Ich kann es auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen. Man wird für diesen Preis kaum etwas vergleichbares finden können.
The room was great, felt like home. A few minutes from the SIFerry. Buses all the way to the SIMall. Quiet and friendly.

We had a really good time at Owls landing.
The house is comfortable.

Alex is a nice and good host.
He's working a lot but always finds some time for a chat.

The house is near to the ferry which makes it really easy to go to the city.
The trip is beautiful in all weather conditions.

We loved New York, and all its nice and sometimes crazy people, so much.

Hope to come back one day.

Thank you for having us Alex.

Greetings Nicolette and Annanova :)

It was fun to go on the ferry and see the statue on the way home and back . Theres a great taco place nearby. Also Staten island is an interesting place in itself to explore. The tea collection at the house was amazing! We really enjoyed our stay!

Owls landing was a perfect place to stay for a quick trip to New York. Although we spent minimal time on Staten Island there is parking in the neighborhood and shops and restaurants as well to explore. A very quick walk to the Ferry terminal into Manhattan, although buses are convenient if you prefer. We enjoyed the views from the ferry of the Statue of Liberty, and hopping on the subway on the other side, or just exploring Battery Park and the financial district. 
There were three of us staying so the top bed is a little awkward if you have limited mobility although the bed itself is comfy and there is ample space to hang your clothes in the room. Towels are provided as well.
Alex was a great host and gave a tour upon our arrival and pointed out everything we would need to know. There's lots of space to cook if you are there long enough, and to relax in the comfy living room with lots of plants, wifi and Netflix! The place is very accurate from the pictures!

Super close to the Statin Island ferry. The ferry only took 30 minute to get to Manhattan and it was free. 
This place was great and Alex was a very helpful host.
Very Comfortable stay with all facilities and generous host
Affordable and quiet location
Very nice and quiet

Alex ist ein toller Host, er hat uns persönlich begrüßt, die Wohnung gezeigt und tolle Tips zu Restaurants usw. in der Umgebung gegeben. Seine Wohnung ist sehr gemütlich, es gibt viele Pflanzen und einen kleinen Garten hinter dem Haus. 
Alex hat extra für uns die Klimaanlage angemacht, die im Nebenzimmer war, damit auch unser Zimmer kühl wurde. 
Alex' Airbnb ist sehr zu empfehlen
Good demonstrations in the house like candles. Free cookies and bananas. Staten Island is another surprise.

It was a very nice neighborhood and quiet! Very easy to travel from the home to the ferry with a bus system ! There was a grocery store in walk-able distance and that helped for the week! The home was a little warm with no air conditioning but Alex provided some fans which helped when we were there.
Fantastic vibe, and I'm lucky to have stayed a few nights at Owl's Landing.

Great spot, 10 - 15 minute walk to the free Staten Island Ferry - for me that was part of a 50 minute commute to the Financial District. The awesome part of that being the 25 minute super relaxing pleasant ferry ride onto the island... another 10 minute walk and I was where I needed to be!

Alex' place is safe, clean and comfortable plus he's super cool and well-versed New York-wise and generally - making for great conversation should you get the chance. The room was basic but very comfortable and large enough (including room to hang my pants and shirts for the week) for me as a business traveler. Air conditioning in the room makes a huge difference depending on the type of sleeper you are and I benefited greatly from the unit Alex had in place. Check-in and entry/re-entry/departure were super easy with the way Alex has everything setup.

Alex pointed me to some great little local mom & pop restaurants just around the corner when prompted, literally a 45 second walk to Azteca - amazing little authentic Mexican taqueria.

I wholeheartedly recommend a stay in the Owl's Loft and will return when opportunity presents.

Alex is a great host! He is very friendly ! Very nice conversations that we had and he is helpful and he is receiving you with open arms. It was so great to stay there and I was really in love about his small house I will definitely come again ! Great experience !

I stayed at Alex's place from June 30th until July 2nd and I came back on July 11th until July 13th. I was so satisfied about my previous stay that I didn't want it to look for a new place to stay. I knew already a little bit of the neighbourhood and I was getting used to his house. I was feeling so comfortable there. Alex wasn't there at my second stay but because I already know the rules it was ok. He was so kind to propose his house even he wasn't there. I ain't sure that I will find someone like him again in a future. I can only suggest him. Especially people who love the bohemian style will find peace and happiness there. If I'm coming back to NY I will definitely stay at Alex's ! Thank you Alex for making my stay so nice and comfortable!

We really enjoyed our stay at the Owl's Landing, I was travelling with my family and the place was great, close to the ferry which takes you for free to Manhattan and gives you a beautiful view of the Statute of Liberty and the NY skyline.

We spent a very lovely stay in Alex's home.His house is very nice, we enjoyed a lot the garden where we liked having breakfast.We enjoyed a lot the birds singing around . Alex is very friendly, very helpful and generous.He made us feel at home. We really enjoyed speaking with him.Landing's owl is a place we recommend to anyone who wants to stay and visit New York. It's a very convenient place. It's very easy to take the Staten Island ferry to Manhattan either by bus or by walk. We will definitely like to stay there again.

Alex's place is a wonderful little haven in NYC. We enjoyed riding the ferry and easily explored Manhattan and Brooklyn with this as our home base. Alex is easy to communicate with, super helpful and very kind! We would stay here again for sure.
Super séjour, très bon accueil et très disponible!

We spent 5 nights at Alex's. His house is close to the bus stop and to the ferry which is very convenient. Although Alex was not here most of the time we were there, it was easy to communicate with him. His house is very nice with lots of plants everywhere, a nice backyard and it was clean. We could use the kitchen to cook many times. It was great to go home every night, enjoying the night views of downtown Manhattan and arriving in a quiet place to get some rest before another busy day. Thanks Alex for allowing us to stay at your place!

We spent a great time at Alex´s Owl´s landing. Everything was perfect, the room, kitchen and comfortable living-room. It is close to the ferry which goes very often. Also the communitacion was great, Alex was realy nice and helped us with everything.
Very nice place and Alex was a great host! Very convenient location but the walk from the ferry could be a bit shady at night. Overall, I highly recommend this place!
Great place, great host! Highly recommended if you are here to visit tbe NYC. Staten island takes to manhattan for free. Quiet house with homely feel to it.

Alex is a wonderful host. One of the best I've met so far. He was always quick to respond to my emails and very generous with his house, sharing his personnal space very gracefully. His place is very clean, an older house with a lot of charm and with really fun and creative decorations. Our room was very comfortable and the kitchen really well equiped for cooking. He thinks about a lot of thoutfull little details like some exercise mats, a big TV sreen with some movies, and (Hidden by Airbnb) maps to figure your way around. He even had some free cookies for anyone needing some comfort food! His place is definitely on top of our list for any further stay near New York City.
Really nice place
Alex is a great host.  His house is full of interesting, eclectic items and decorations that make it feel very comfortable and homey.  The gardens and outdoor sitting area are also very nice!
Great place to stay, a very convenient 15-minute walk to the NY ferry.
Had a great time at Alex's home, a very nice place with a very kind man.
We had a great stay with Alex, the house is very well located, we loved taking the ferry to Manhattan and back. Really recommend this place, Alex is a very friendly host

Alex è una persona davvero cortese e disponibile. La casa è fornita di tutto e ci si sente davvero a proprio agio. 10 minuti a piedi dal Ferry che vi porta a Lower Manatthan. Il vicinato è sostanzialmente tranquillo ma forse se siete donne e da sole vi conviene prendere l'autobus s78 la notte: parte subito dopo l'attracco del traghetto e vi porta praticamente davanti casa.
Exactly what you'd expect. The host is really nice and the place is cheap. About 10 minute walk to the free Staten Island Ferry which will take you right into Manhattan.

Le logement est conforme à ce qui est présenté sur le RBNB.
C'est un excellent rapport qualité prix:la maison est vraiment charmante, Alex est vraiment accueillant et discret. Prendre le ferry gratuit pour se rendre à New York chaque jour est très fun et très pratique.  Je recommande vivement cette endroit .
This place has a great vibe and Alex is  very knowledgeable  about Staten Island and it's hidden treasures for visitors. Take advantage and you will have a great time!
Ferry is close

We really enjoyed our stay! Alex's home is about a 12 min walk to the Staten Island Ferry, which is awesome. We didn't see him much, but Alex has an excellent response time to messages, and is willing and able to answer all your questions. We had ever changing check in times, but Alex was very understanding and worked with us, allowing for early check in. One shower can be tricky at times, but the home is kept clean and is a very quiet environment.

Already been here the second time and it was perfect again. The best airbnb I have ever been!

We had such a great time!
This is my second time staying at Alex’s place and again it was awesome staying there. Alex is a great Host when I say that like he should get an award for best host ever!! Thank you so much!

Strongly recommended. Owl's landing is by far the most amazing Airbnb experience for me and Alex is the most attentive and thoughtful host I've ever met. Perfect communication, effective response to your request. The loft bed is the room is full size with a really comfortable mattress. The guests even are provided with free fruit, cookies and delicious beverages. There is a warm atmosphere and other guests are all very nice and friendly. Close to laundromat, grocery stores and buses taking you to ferry terminal to Manhattan. Will come back next trip in NYC!

Très bon séjour ! On se sent très vite comme à la maison, ambiance détendue. À 20min à pied du ferry pour Manathan, parfait pour les visites au centre ville. Alex est très gentil et serviable, encore merci à lui !

I and John enjoed our stay at Alex's place so much, so it was a bit sad to move out from there. Everything you need is there. We found it very convenient and homly to have breakfast and evening tea at home. Thanks for coffee, guys :) The house is very clean, the bed is huge and super soft. Location is super reachable to South Ferry. We didn't face any problems with transportation to the lower Manhattan. Thank you very much for maintaining the house as it is. We really like it
great value! lots of nice little touches like free coffee and tea, close walking distance to the ferry and lots of restaurants

We stayed 4 days there. Its simple but comfortable, clean and calm. The living room full of plants and pillows is really nice, you can enjoy netflix after a long day walking. 
10 min to ferry terminal by bus, you can use your mta card.
Alex is nice and has been fully understanding
Thanks

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez alex , la chambre est bien la maison est grande et bien équipé nous avons manqué de rien .
la chambre est très bien placée, près du ferry et avec stationnement gratuit juste devant .
je recommande
Adoramos a recepção, muito interativo, deu várias dicas, boa acomodação.

Alex isa flexible host, he can adjust the check in time to your  convenience.
However, the room is better for 2 rather than 3. 

It is a shared house with other  guests In the other rooms so be ready to share the bathroom.

Great location, easy walk to the Staten Island Ferry. The beds were very comfortable. Alex was welcoming and helped us get to know the area. It’s the perfect place to stay when you visit New York City!
Stylish, clean and great location right next to the Staten Island Ferry. Will defintely stay here again and recommend to anyone wanting to stay in the Staten island / Manhattan area.

Alex is a very kind and helpful host. If you have a question he's prompt to answer. He put his kitchen at our disposition. He is a working man so we didn't see a lot of him and we were out most of the time visiting New York.

I spent a super couple of days at the Owl's Landing. It was so easy to get there and to get away from. The ferry terminal is only a short bus ride away, though we usually preferred to just walk. There are supermarkets, bars and restaurants close-by. As a traveler, I like to make myself at home by cooking for myself in the evening. Alex' home was just perfect for that. The house is well epuipped, there was nothing to be desired for. Guests even get their own fridge and compartment in the cabinet. And there was a warm and welcoming atmosphere at all times. Thank you again for that, Alex!

Alex has fantastic communication and made everything easy and seamless. My family raved about how beautiful the place is. I've added it to my favorites for when my family is in town.

Déçue par le manque de propreté du lieu et de découvrir une auberge de jeunesse plus qu’un airbnb. Nous n’avons jamais vu les propriétaires, ma fille a été piqué par des bestioles pendant la nuit et la douche n’a jamais été propre.

We loved our stay with Alex. His home is spacious and welcoming. There is a very nice living room area with many plants and comfy places to relax. Alex was a very accommodating and welcoming host who provides great communication. We will be staying there again. We highly recommend this home .
Alex is a great host! Really thoughtful and knowledgeable!  Thank you for making us feel at home!
Maison bien située a Staten Island près du Ferry donc très pratique.
Great place!!! Cheap and efficient!

Sehr guter Ort um NYC aus einer etwas anderen Perspektive anzusteuern. Für die Strecke nach Downtown sollte man eine Stunde kalkulieren, dafür nähert man sich mit der Staten Island Fähre langsam der City und bekommt eine gute Vorstellung von der Größe, ideal für tolle Fotos. Alex ist sehr offen und hilfsbereit und der ideale Ansprechpartner für Natur- und Umweltthemen.
Super quiet and was the place was very clean!

The loft was a great stay and it had all the amenities you would need. Not too far from the ferry to Manhattan (10-15 min walk). Alex was an amazing host. Would highly recommend and will definitely be back when I visit New York City again.

O lugar é ótimo! Super limpo, bem decorado, com uma energia maravilhosa. O Alex foi super educado e atencioso desde o início. Assim que cheguei, me passou todas as informações da região e do acesso até Manhattan. O chuveiro é ótimo, a cama também. A cozinha é bem equipada. A região é tranquila e de muito fácil acesso para Manhattan. O trajeto com o barco é uma delícia e super confortável. O espaço que fiquei é ideal para duas pessoas. Para 3 pode ser um pouco desconfortável, já que a outra cama fica acima, bem próxima ao (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza me hospedaria novamente lá.
Can walk to ferry. Alex is excellent host.

Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Alex nous a accueilli et expliqué très bien le fonctionnement de l'appartement. Nous avons apprécié chaque matin la terrasse pour le petit déjeuner, avant d'aller prendre le ferry pour Manhattan. Le quartier est populaire et sympa, et les resto et le supermarché deux fois moins chères que de l'autre coté de la baie.
The location was great and Alex was very prompt with any questions we had! It was a pleasant and painless experience.
The place is wonderful in every way! From the 5 minuet walk to the ferry to the plants in the living space and the beautiful bar.

Nous avons reservez la chambre Le Loft du lundi 6 aout au mercredi 8 aout. Nous etions dans le Vermont les jours avant et c’etais notre premiere fois que nous allions visiter New York, à bord de notre voiture. Si c’est votre cas et que vous allez chez Alex, prevoyez 15$ pour traverser le Goathals Bridge, sinon c’est simple, facile d’accès avec stationnement gratuis sans soucis pour votre vehicule de ce quartier.

Nous avons été acceuillis par Alex chaleureusement, il a bien prit le temps de nous faire visiter ses installations et en plus ils nous a donner beaucoup de conseils avec trucs et astuces pour bien profiter de notre séjour! Des fruits, quelques bières et autres commodités etaient à notre disposition. 

Le plus gros avantage, est l’emplacement de sa maison. Vous n’êtes qu’à 15 minutes à pieds du Staten Island Ferry!!! Ce traversier est gratuit et de loin le meilleur pour voir de prêt la statue de la liberty, le Skyline de New York et Brooklyn avec son pont! Le ferry fonctionne 24/24! Vous arriverez directement à Manathann dans le district financier pour voir le Pont de Brooklyn, le Chargin Bull et le memorial du World Trade Center.

Ensuite, Alex nous a expliqué le fonctionnement de la carte pour utiliser le Metro. C’est le meilleur moyen pour profitez pleinement de votre voyage.

Pour son acceuil, l’amplacement, le cachet de la maison et surtout le prix... il est difficile de voyager avec autant d’avantage à petit prix! N’hesitez pas! 


English—

We reserve the room Loft from Monday 6th August to Wednesday 8th August. We were in Vermont the days before and it was our first time visiting New York (road trip) aboard our car. If that's your case and you're going to Alex's house, plan $ 15 to cross the Goathals Bridge, otherwise it's simple, easy to get to with no worries parking for your car in this area.

We were greeted by Alex warmly, he took the time to make us visit his facilities and in addition he gave us many tips to enjoy our stay! Fruit, a few beers and other amenities were available.

The biggest advantage is the location of his house. You are only 15 minutes walk from the Staten Island Ferry !!! This ferry is free and by far the best to see near the Statue of Liberty, the New York Skyline and Brooklyn with the bridge! The ferry runs 24/24! You will arrive directly at Manathann in the financial district to see the Brooklyn Bridge, the Chargin Bull and the World Trade Center memorial.
Then Alex explained the operation of the map to use the Metro. This is the best way to fully enjoy your trip.

For its acceuil, the extension, the stamp of the house and especially the price ... it is difficult to travel with so much advantage at low cost! Do not hesitate!
Besonders dankbar waren wir,dass Alex uns so grosszügig nachts um 1/2 2 hereingelassen und eingeführt hat....unsere Flüge waren alle verspätet...Ein sehr freundlicher Gastgeber
L'annonce décrivant le logement et toutes les précisions sont réellement conformes à ce qu'Alex propose. Il est un propriétaire attentionné, réactif, et de bons conseils. Un grand merci

Alex's Airbnb is so authentic! The house has an original style! The place has exceeded my expectations. The bathroom and room were very clean and organized! Also it's easy to get the ferry station by foot. And the ferry is free! It takes 10-15 min to arrive in Downtown of Manhattan. The air conditioning of the room was essential to provide a comfortable stay since was very hot in the summer.
It’s a great house, close to the ferry which is free (and you can see the statue of liberty), we loved it and would definetely recommend to others!
je recommande!!
Alex‘s place is great! 10-15 min to the Ferry and the ride to Manhattan every morning was amazing. Definitely recommending this host and place.
Fantastic place to visit NYC, Alex is very kind the place perfectly located, clean and tidy. Our stay was better than expected, next time I'll come to NYC, I'll tray to stay at Alex's place again

Super netter Gastgeber in einem sehr verwohntem Haus. Da mehrere Zimmer in dem Haus vermietet werden und nur ein Badezimmer zur Verfügung steht, kam es oftmals zu Wartezeiten bzgl. des Duschens. Toll war die Fahrt mit der Ferry nach Manhattan.
Look no further, this was a fantastic home away from home

Alex was present when we arrived, and ever so kind and helpful. His house is nice and cosy, the lounge and kitchen are decorated with style, making the whole place special and charming. Here is an address I will recommend to my friends!
It was a great stay, cozy and comfortable! Very close to the ferry station and a great recommendation for a short stay to New York.

We enjoyed our stay at owl's landing.  Alex was a very good host who took time to show us the amenities and provide recommendations for the local attractions and public transportation.  The room was comfortable and very clean.  It was a short walk (< 1 mile) from the Staten Island ferry which provided easy access to Manhattan and the other boroughs.
Great accomodation close to downtown. Highly recommended

Alex was such a responsive and polite host, his place was full of ammenities and was super cosy, warm and stylish. Highly recommend to anyone wanting to get away from the bustle of the city and relax for a few days! :)

We loved our stay at Alex’s place. He’s a great host and all around a great human! The flat is super cosy, especially the living room with all the plants and fairly lights. I caught a cold while we were in New York so we spent more time at the flat than we planned to but we didn’t mind that much because we ended up having such a nice time just hanging out and drinking endless cups of coffee and tea (that Alex provided).

Getting to Manhattan and other boroughs from Staten Island can be a bit of a trek but the ferry and subway run 24/7 so it’s easy to go anywhere. And you can’t beat the views of the Statue of Liberty and the Manhattan skyline from the ferry. The neighbourhood can seem a bit sketchy and run down but it’s completely safe. We never had any issues.

This is my second stay at Alex's home. He is a great host, very responsive, and the place is warm as if you were truly staying as a guest in his home. Also, the location is close to Manhattan and Alex provides plenty of information on traveling and local food spots. Highly recommended!

summary: Short walk to the newly opened MUHC - Glen Campus and to the Vendome metro station.  Quick access to  Downtown core, local universities : McGill, Concordia, UQAM, and Universite de Montreal. Walk to grocery stores, pharmacies, and clinics.
description: Short walk to the newly opened MUHC - Glen Campus and to the Vendome metro station.  Quick access to  Downtown core, local universities : McGill, Concordia, UQAM, and Universite de Montreal. Walk to grocery stores, pharmacies, and clinics.

host.host_about: I'm a native Montrealer with three "young adult" children.  I enjoy meeting people from different parts of the world and show them what this vibrant city has to offer.

reviews.comments: Well situated building, lovely area, close to everything. Cosy rooms, I had everything I needed for a short-term stay. I was looking for a furnished apartment and I was so happy to find this offer. I would definitely come back again. Thank you.

This was my second time I stayed at one of Franca's Apt. I stayed for one month and everything was fine. The location is great and just near to restaurants, coffeeshops, bars. The subway station is just 5 minutes walking from building. Franca is a kind lady and whenever I had some problems, she answered my calls very quickly.

The place is very clean and in a great location, the 24 bus will take you straight to downtown Montreal.

The wifi was unreliable but the issue seemed to be resolved with a new router towards the end of my stay.

Franca was a very accommodating host.

Appartement propre, bien situé, confortable et suffisamment équipé. Prévoyez cependant des adaptateurs Européens si vous venez de l'Europe. Franca à été une super hôte à l'écoute, réactive et aimable. Mon séjour à été très agréable. Je recommande !

name: Grand appart sur le Plateau
summary: Appartement tout équipé et meublé situé sur le Plateau proche des commerces de proximité. Proche du parc Lafontaine et des commerces et restaurants de l'avenue  Mont Royal.  Métro Sherbrooke à 10 mn en bus.  Chambres : 2 chambres fermées, 2 lits queen très confortables dont un de qualité supérieure, oreillers neufs assurant de bonnes nuits de sommeil  1 canapé-lit dans le salon Wifi Au 1er étage d'un immeuble de 3 étages sans ascenseur. Balcon avec table et 2 chaises.
space: Logement tout équipé situé au 1er étage d'un immeuble de 3 étage très calme. Un petit balcon avec une table et des chaises rendent les beaux jours très agréables. Les heures d'arrivée et de départ sont flexibles. Au cours du séjour nous sommes disponibles en tout temps car habitons juste au-dessus de l'appartement.
description: Appartement tout équipé et meublé situé sur le Plateau proche des commerces de proximité. Proche du parc Lafontaine et des commerces et restaurants de l'avenue  Mont Royal.  Métro Sherbrooke à 10 mn en bus.
