neighborhood_overview: Le joli parc Lafontaine est le parc le plus grand du centre-ville avec son lac, ses canard et son petit train. Il est à seulement 5 mn à pieds. Le parc Baldwin et les piscines extérieures (l'été) et les patinoires (l'hiver) sont également à distance de marche. Les commerces de quartier sont à 50 mètres (boulangerie, café, magasin d'alimentation, etc).
notes: Le logement comporte deux chambres fermées avec dans chacune un lit queen. Dans le salon il y a 2 canapés dont 1 canapé lit. La salle à manger comporte une grande table en verre. Possibilité de fournir un lit parc pour les tout petits. Environnement calme et paisible.
transit: L'appartement est idéalement situé près des bus 24, 10 et 45 qui parcourent la ville de long en large. Le métro Sherbrooke est accessible à 10 mn en bus.  10 mn en bus également de la gare routière du bus qui va à l'aéroport et de la rue St-Denis (quartier latin très prisé pour les visiteurs).
access: Immeuble sécuritaire avec interphone.
interaction: Nous pourrons vous renseigner avec plaisir si vous le souhaitez sur les différents endroits à découvrir de la ville. Nous sommes disponibles pour toutes informations ou demandes que vous pourriez avoir, et ce pendant tout votre séjour.
house_rules: L'appartement est réservé aux non-fumeurs mais possibilité de fumer sur le balcon. Les fêtes sont interdites. Également il est interdit de faire venir des personnes autres que celles ayant réservé. Les animaux sont interdits.  Nous demandons de respectez les lieux et les voisins et retirez vos chaussures en entrant dans l'appartement. Notre immeuble est calme . Le voisinage et nous-même apprécions cette belle qualité de vie. Merci de ne pas faire de bruit après 22h svp.

reviews.comments: Nice place and very helpful hosts. We were very comfortable and our hosts were easy to contact with questions. They gave us an overview of the area when we arrived so that we'd know where to go for groceries, bus, and train. We had a great stay!

Nous sommes une famille de 4 pers et nous avons voyagés avec nos deux enfants 9 et 14 ans .Nous avons eu un accueil très chaleureux malgré le retard que nous avons eu à l'aéroport et un GPS capricieux ...
Guy et sa femme ont été tres sympathiques durant tout notre séjour et très disponible en cas de besoin.
ils ont su nous mettre a l'aise de suite. L'appartement est totalement conforme aux descriptions et aux photos de l'annonce. Il est propre, calme, confortable et proches de toutes commodités.Nous le recommandons fortement ;nous reviendrons sans hésiter !
Un grand merci à Guy et sa femme

Super sejour chez Guy pour ma famille. Hote très accessible et très accommodant qui répond rapidement et à de petites attentions personnalisées. Quartier calme très proche du parc Lafontaine et emplacement idéal pour visite du plateau et du centre-ville. Appartement spacieux et très propre: excellent rapport qualité-prix. Rien a dire a part que Guy et sa famille sont très sympathiques et que je recommande chaudement ce lieu a mes amis et à ma famille pour un prochain séjour!

Our host was extremely friendly and very helpful. Easy to get a hold of and readily available for any questions. The apartment was very clean and we were provided with some amenities. It was close to all main attractions, including parks, bakeries, grocery and shopping. Overall a good experience and would definitely come back again.

An excellent place and very friendly and helpful hosts, they were always attentive to our needs and when we arrived they gave us an overview of the area. The apartment is bigger than shown in the pictures and very clean and comfortable. The location is excellent. We highly recommend it. If we travel to Montreal again we´ll surely call Guy. We had a great stay!

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement.
Guy s'est rendu très disponible et était très serviable. 
Nous reviendrons avec plaisir.

Guy's place was great to stay at. He was easy to communicate with and the place was just as described. The only little hiccup was that we were told after arriving that we need to check out by noon even though on the listing it says 6pm. This was not an issue for us because we were going to check out early anyways but it would have been nice to know in advance and not after we got there.

Nous avons été bien reçu par Guy à notre arrivée, et il reste disponible pendant le séjour si on a besoin de lui. L'appartement est bien situé, proche des sites importants et des quartiers à voir. Il est bien équipé, et les lits sont confortables. Si je devais mettre un point négatif, ce serait au niveau de la cuisine qui aurait besoin d'un petit coup de neuf. 
Notre séjour a été agréable et nous recommandons ce logement.

My brother and I stayed at Guys for 4 nights. Guy was very easy to communicate with. Check in was easy and Guy's wife met us at the door. Guy and his wife live upstairs so it's very easy if assistance is needed. The apartment was as described in the website. It was very clean and well equipped. Two queen size beds were very comfortable. The bedrooms are at the back and very quiet. The location is perfect. In the Plateau and close to public transit and Bixis. We both enjoyed this apartment immensely and highly recommend. Perfect for two couples or travelling companions. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks Guy!

nous avons été très bien accueillis par Guy et sa famille. nous avons profité pendant 3 jours d'un logement spacieux, agréable, propre, bien équipé et bien placé. sans aucune hésitation, nous recommanderions ce logement à des proches.

I loved this location and the home was beautiful and spacious.  The neighbourhood was quiet.  The only downside was the construction in the area caused transit detours that made public transportation difficult.   However, for its proximity to everything, I would stay here again and again!
Great time at Montreal,  Guy is helpfull host.Beatifull and spacius place.The Apart have everything close to all places in Plateau Mont Royal.

My three friends and I had a great experience staying in Guy's apartment. Guy was very hospitable in pointing out things we might need during our stay, providing maps and info, etc., and was flexible with our check-in and checkout times. He was very accessible in case we needed to ask him anything, as he lives right upstairs. The apartment was very spacious and just as represented in the pictures. We cooked in a few times and had everything we needed in the kitchen. We especially loved the neighborhood, which is very calm, quiet, and family-friendly; there is a primary school just across the street. It was a tiny bit further than we expected to get to the heart of downtown, but we felt like it was worth it for how great the place was; it was sort of a nice retreat from the busy city center Overall, it was a great experience and I would definitely recommend staying here to anyone interested in visiting the city!
We enjoyed our stay in this flat and would highly recommend it to other travelers.
He was very nice. The apartment was very clean! Great guy

Guy est une personne très convivial et sympathique. Le logement est très bien située de tout. Une petite supérette à 2mn du logement ! Il est à 30mn du vieux Montréal et du vieux port , à 30 mn du plateau Mont-Royale. Beaucoup de petits restaurants situé près du logement et très bien pour la qualité prix! Notre petits coups coeur: chez ma grosse truie chérie, le bistrot rue de la rivière ( il faut réservé) la banquise pour la poutine!  Le logement est bien desservis par les lignes de bus, pensé surtout a faire de la monnaie 3 dollars 25! Ou acheter un passe pour votre séjour il sert pour le bus et le métro.
Clean, comfortable and Guy and his wife were incredibly responsive.
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
superbe appartement spacieux, bien situé , tranquil, accessible facilement pour les transports . au top
Nice clean apartment. Guy was a Good host.
Very clean and spacious.

name: Qto Aconchegante no em frente ao Parque Olímpico
summary: Apartamento em frente ao parque olímpico: sala, quarto com ar condicionado , cozinha, lavabo e Wifi . Condomínio fechado com segurança privada que atende a área externa com área de lazer. Piscina, sauna, academia, estacionamento e  segurança privada. Fale com o anfitrião
space: Os hóspedes terão direito ao acesso às áreas comuns do condomínio e a todo apartamento, menos o quarto do anfitrião.
description: Apartamento em frente ao parque olímpico: sala, quarto com ar condicionado , cozinha, lavabo e Wifi . Condomínio fechado com segurança privada que atende a área externa com área de lazer. Piscina, sauna, academia, estacionamento e  segurança privada. Fale com o anfitrião Os hóspedes terão direito ao acesso às áreas comuns do condomínio e a todo apartamento, menos o quarto do anfitrião. Os hóspedes terão acesso a cozinha, varanda, sala e banheiro social. Estarei sempre disponível para ajudar em informações sobre a região e a que os hóspedes precisarem. O Bairro possui bancos, mercados, farmácias, Shopping center e todo tipo de serviço comercial na região. O prédio fica ao lado de uma estação BRT de ônibus que poderá se locomover por toda a cidade e integração ao metrô que liga até a Zona Sul do Rio de Janeiro.

reviews.comments: JULIO, NOSSO ANFITRIÃO, É UMA PESSOA SUPER AGRADÁVEL E QUE NOS DEU DICAS EXCELENTES PARA CONHECER E APROVEITAR A CIDADE DO RIO DE JANEIRO. O APARTAMENTO É OTIMO E BEM EM FRENTE AO PARQUE OLÍMPICO.
Tudo perfeito na hospedagem.

Super recomendo! Hospitalidade nota milll!
Atencioso demais!
Ótimo anfitrião!
Nos deu dicas maravilhosas de passeios no Rio!
O lugar eh super aconchegante, organizado e muito bem localizado!

Só tenho a agradecer o Julio por toda a hospitalidade e prestatividade.
Um BAITA anfitrião e gente boa demais! Ótimas dicas locais e a localização é excelente, walk distance até o Parque Olímpico e fácil acesso as demais áreas da cidade.

Podem reservar sem problemas!
Até a próxima!!
O apartamento é bem localizado, bem em frente do Parque Olímpico, é cômodo, aconchegante e limpo. Boa estadia!

Fomos super bem recepcionados pelo anfitrião Júlio, bem como o mesmo nos deixou bem a vontade. Ótima localização, apartamento bem limpo e com todos os utensílios necessários. Recomendamos e com certeza retornaremos :)

Localização perfeita  ! Facilidades de transporte, serviços, próximo à praia do Recreio  (recomendo). 
A hospitalidade do anfitrião foi melhor do que o esperado.  
Recomendo e reforço a indicação. 
Minha estadia e do meu filho foi plenamente satisfeita. 
Retornarei, com certeza.
Local mto bom, anfitrião bastante solícito, local com grande alternativa de transporte, , quarto aconchegante!!!

Minha hospedagem foi excelente, um anfitrião mto receptivo , descontraído  e prestativo. Nos deixou á vontade, mesmo ausente, pudemos aproveitar ao máximo da casa , pq tinha tudo ao nosso alcance, utensílios domésticos, supermercados, farmácias, transporte, etc. Voltaremos com certeza!!! Super Recomendo!!!

Quarto limpo e muito confortável, bem localizado, o anfitrião é muito educado, sempre disponível. 
Tive uma excelente estadia. Recomendo

Agradecemos a hospitalidade do Julio. Tudo conforme o esperado.
Recomendo!

Fui com meu namorado, e tivemos uma excelente experiência. O apto fica localizado bem proximo a estação de BRT, o que facilita muito a localização para os principais pontos turísticos da cidade. Sem contar a segurança que o condomínio nos transmite, ficamos super a vontade para sair e chegar a qualquer hora.
O Julio é um excelente anfitrião, que além de nos receber muito bem, fez parte da nossa viagem. Nos deu excelente dicas de lugares e passeios. Super recomendamos!
Lugar muito bom, de fácil acesso, seguro. Recomendo. Julio ótima pessoa, ajudou muito.
Excelente apartamento para casal! Adoramos.
Ótima estadia, Júlio muito gente boa!
Ótimo lugar para quem precisa ficar perto da barra. Apartamento novo e quarto confortável.
Ótima localização e apartamento muito confortável! O anfitrião nos deixa bastante a vontade!

Ótima estádia. Apartamento limpo, bem localizado e com ótimo preço.
Julio é um excelente anfitrião, me ajudou nas dúvidas e como chegar ao apartamento. Recomendadíssimo.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Belo apartamento, espaço aconchegante de fato, anfitrião bem disponível, prédio e redondezas com boa sensação de segurança, realmente perto do Parque Olímpico, só elogios. Quem precisar ficar na região, aconselho!

O apartamento é perfeito para quem precisa ir ao Parque Olímpico. Muito perto e seguro de andar nas ruas. Também é possível ir a pé aos supermercados na região. O anfitrião foi simpático e nos ofereceu ajuda sempre que precisarmos, porém o apartamento não estava limpo como foi descrito em outras indicações. Não sabemos o que houve, mas quando chegamos o chão do nosso quarto e do banheiro estavam sujos, o que não é legal para ninguém. No quarto também falta alguns móveis de apoio, há apenas um espaço dentro do guarda roupa, pois o outro lado está com objetos do anfitrião. Não pudemos usar a academia como descrito. O ar condicionado e cama estavam OK. Agradecemos pela estadia, esperamos que os erros ocorridos não se repitam com outros hospedes.

O apartamento é ótimo, boa localização. Nos sentimos seguros. Fizemos a reserva na noite anterior e mesmo tendo sido na ultíssima hora, Julio respondeu super rápido, foi atencioso e manteve tudo organizado e limpo para quando chegássemos. Além disso, Julio oferece boas comodidades que facilitam a estadia. Nos hospedaríamos lá de novo.

Um ótimo espaço para se hospedar, sempre limpo, bacana de ficar e super tranquilo!! 
Ótimo!!
Excelente anfitrião, super recomendo!!!!!
excelente lugar sem barulho algum , muito bom mesmo. recomendo.
Júlio César foi sempre muito atencioso e rápido. Tudo ocorreu dentro do esperado e da normalidade. Excelente opção para casais.
Ótimo para casal, tivemos uma ótima experiência, muito melhor do q esperávamos!l
O espaço do Júlio é muito bem localizado, próximo ao Parque Olímpico e praia da Barra. Organizado e limpo, excelente comunicação e hospitalidade. Recomendo muito!

Nada à reclamar, hospitaleiro, simpático, prestativo, local top.
Super recomendo!!
Ótimo localização, lugar tranquilo. Confiança total do anfitrião.
El departamento es hermoso, cómodo y limpio. Julio fue muy amable y nos dio  comento sobre el barrio. Volveríamos sin duda! Gracias por todo! Saludos.

Não sei nem por onde começar...  O local é simplesmente incrível, com uma bela vista para o Parque Olímpico, perto da estação de BRT, farmácias e supermercados, além de ter uma excelente segurança! Me senti super à vontade para andar nas ruas sozinho.
É muito limpa e organizada, com um toque especial de cuidado... todos do prédio são muito receptivos, hospitaleiros é extremamente educados!
O Júlio é uma pessoa muito além do esperado! Educado, gentil, extremamente prestativo... certeza que fiz um grande amigo no RJ!
Recomendo a todos que querem ir ao Rio!!!
Tive uma excelente estadia e quero voltar o mais rápido possível!
Julio é uma pessoa super bacana e seu AP é excelente!!!

Local bem bacana, Júlio César é muito receptivo, e a localização é . Fomos muito bem recepcionados e pegamos várias dicas de passeio com o anfitrião, que é muito gente boa.
Super indico, para quem quer um lugar tranquilo e de fácil acesso, com rotas rápidas pra pontos turísticos.

Júlio foi um excelente anfitrião, foi bastante solícito e nos deixou muito a vontade. O apartamento e a localização são excelentes. Tudo estruturado, limpo e bem cuidado. Próximo da praia do Recreio e da Barra, BRT, farmácia, mercado. Ideal para casais.

O Júlio é muito atencioso, deixa os hóspedes confortáveis mas sempre está ali quando precisamos de algo! 
O lugar é muito aconchegante, sem duvidas voltarei em breve.
Nada a reclamar, ótima hospitalidade.

O apartamento é super bem localizado e seguro (perto  dos shoppings, do brt etc), júlio césar foi muito prestativo e até fez um café pra gente haha, super recomendo o local e espero ficar mais vezes, recomendo.
Hermoso departamento ubicado en un complejo muy lindo! Es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Julio respondió siempre y muy rápido, súper atento. Dentro de Barra de tijuca, está muy bien ubicado!

Julio César sempre muito prestativo e comunicativo (fez até um café pra gente, que aliás estava ótimo), o apartamento corresponde as fotos, tem uma ótima localização, será um prazer nos hospedarmos ai mais uma vez.

Obrigado por tudo Julio.

name: Bright, Spacious, Sunlit 2 bed
summary: 10 mins walk to Beaches both Bondi and Bronte, 5 min walk to cafes,bars and restaurants. Our sun drenched apartment is spacious and perfect for a family or friends, with balcony queen bed in main room, single bed with pull out trundle in 2nd room.
space: Our wonderful space is perfect for small families, with all the amenities you need a lovely balcony off the main bedroom, you can enjoy dinner on at night time, or a spot of early morning yoga its the perfect size, just a 5 min walk away.The second bedroom has a single bed with a built in trundle that you can pull out for the 4th person/child our living are is spacious and bright there is also a share garden you can enjoy and you are more than welcome to pick some fresh veges from vege patch. :)
description: 10 mins walk to Beaches both Bondi and Bronte, 5 min walk to cafes,bars and restaurants. Our sun drenched apartment is spacious and perfect for a family or friends, with balcony queen bed in main room, single bed with pull out trundle in 2nd room. Our wonderful space is perfect for small families, with all the amenities you need a lovely balcony off the main bedroom, you can enjoy dinner on at night time, or a spot of early morning yoga its the perfect size, just a 5 min walk away.The second bedroom has a single bed with a built in trundle that you can pull out for the 4th person/child our living are is spacious and bright there is also a share garden you can enjoy and you are more than welcome to pick some fresh veges from vege patch. :) You can access the whole apartment accept for our office which will be locked and strictly out of bounds. We will be available to talk to during your stay. Bondi is bright and vibrant full of lots of funky cafe restaurants and bars, grocer, health foo
neighborhood_overview: Bondi is bright and vibrant full of lots of funky cafe restaurants and bars, grocer, health food store and bondi and bronte beach on your doorstep, Theres a lovely yoga studio round the corner and we are a 10 min bus ride to bondi junction or a 25 min walk.
notes: You will only have access to the main doors and can access the garden by the side passage.
transit: There is a bus stop a 3 min walk that will take you to bondi junction where you can access all buses and trains.  10 min walk to Bondi and Bronte beach.
access: You can access the whole apartment accept for our office which will be locked and strictly out of bounds.
interaction: We will be available to talk to during your stay.
house_rules: This is our home and we expect absolute respect whilst staying here. We do have cream carpet and light coloured furniture so please be mindful.  We are happy for 4 people only to stay at the property but no more please. Also, please don't have more than 8 total over in the evenings. We share the block with 3 other apartments and so need to keep the evening noise to a minimum!

reviews.comments:
We spent five fantastic days in Istambul going sightseeing, tasting Turkish cuisine, breezing the fresh sea air, watching this amazing city life, communicating with the extremely hospitable hotel staff and friendly locals. Me and my husband really enjoyed our comfortable stay at the Byzantium Suites Hotel. We had a double room with the sea view. All the photos of the hotel were genuine and we didn't have any unpleasant surprises. Just the opposite: an amazing window view, an incredible location, always cleaned room, a delicious breakfast with wide choice of dishes to every taste, the terrace restaurant serves tasty food , too. The staff was always friendly and willing to help.  We assume that the host Mr Gokey is a real professional in his field. We appreciated our stay in his hotel and would like to come back to Istambul some day again). We highly recommend the Byzantium Suites Hotel to every visitor of the city!
Teşekkür ederim!
Very good experience, will definitely book again next time.
You can't ask for a better location to the main sites.  The road is a little busy and expect to meet people trying to get you into their restaurant from literally the second you step out the door.

name: Sydney Studio in Glebe Close to CBD. SparklinClean
summary: A clean, lovely and bright  fully furnished studio in Glebe. Great view of the city skyline from the balcony. Close to Sydney down town, Darling Harbour, Pyrmont  fish market, 1.7km from Sydney University, close to great restaurants and cafes. Handy  to public transport,bus, light rail, WIFi is included. Cleanliness of the apartment is our priority. Equipped with everything you need. Free use of washing  machine.
space: The studio is furnished  with a quality double bed, sofa, small dining table, Samsung Smart HD TV, WiFi . It is on the top third  floor. Fully equiped kitchen, coffee, sugar, tea, new electric stove, cooking equipments and dining wares, microwave, fridge are available. We always put cleanliness as our priority and provide our guests with a comfortable bed made up each time with fresh clean linen and bath towels. The total size of the unit is about 40 sq m. It has a small balcony with great view of the water and city skyline. Quiet neighbourhood. The laundry is on the same floor and you don’t need to use coin to operate it. We provide laundry detergent, washing liquids, shower soaps and gel, shampoo, conditioner, tooth paste, toilet rolls.
description: A clean, lovely and bright  fully furnished studio in Glebe. Great view of the city skyline from the balcony. Close to Sydney down town, Darling Harbour, Pyrmont  fish market, 1.7km from Sydney University, close to great restaurants and cafes. Handy  to public transport,bus, light rail, WIFi is included. Cleanliness of the apartment is our priority. Equipped with everything you need. Free use of washing  machine. The studio is furnished  with a quality double bed, sofa, small dining table, Samsung Smart HD TV, WiFi . It is on the top third  floor. Fully equiped kitchen, coffee, sugar, tea, new electric stove, cooking equipments and dining wares, microwave, fridge are available. We always put cleanliness as our priority and provide our guests with a comfortable bed made up each time with fresh clean linen and bath towels. The total size of the unit is about 40 sq m. It has a small balcony with great view of the water and city skyline. Quiet neighbourhood. The laundry is on the same floo
neighborhood_overview: The apartement suits those who would like to stay near the CBD but still wants to enjoy the quiet suburban life. Glebe has many cafes and ecclectic mix of international restaurants. Nice place to walk or run along the bay foreshore just 10 minutes away. Westfield Shopping mall is nearby.Accessible to public transport, bus and light rail.
notes: Parking is not available on the premises. Street parking only.  But the public transport is very close and convenient. The unit is best suitable for 2 people.
transit: Easy access to public transport,  direct bus 431-433 to the city or 370 to Coogee beach via Newtown. A light rail to Fish Market, Darling Harbour, Central Station from Glebe Tram Station. Walking  distance to shops and Super Market. Short bus ride to Sydney  University or RPA Hospital Getting to the apartment from the airport by public transport is easy:   •catch the train from the  airport to Central Railway Station.  • From Central Station walk to Broadway Bus Stop. •catch a bus number 431 to Glebe.  •Stop one stop after Glebe Library  •cross the road to Forsyth St then left turn into Avona Ave.  •Look for building number 14 using drive way of number 6 Avona Ave. You also can catch a light rail instead of the bus from Central Station to Glebe light rail station and walk 10 minutes to the apartment
access: Entire Unit, WiFi, laundry/free use of washing machine on the same floor.
interaction: I will meet you on your arrival to give you the keys and I am available via phone/email to answer all your questions during your stay. Alternatively by arrangement  I will leave the key in a designated place.
house_rules: • Check-in time is 2pm. No smoking/no animals/pet/not suitable for loud party as we are in a quiet residential property. Quiet time after 10pm. Guests must be over 18 years old.

host.host_about: Hi I am Helena. Welcome to my page, hope you will find it useful and that I can help you with your stay in Sydney.

reviews.comments:
Best AirBnb we had so far. The apartment is lovely, clean and tidy. It has everything you need for a short or long stay. It's one block away from the main bus in glebe which takes you to central or the city (from there you can go everywhere). It's near a lot of really nice cafe's and bars and several parks. Helena was great in helping us with everything we needed and more!
The only thing I would advice is to be sure to find the apartment beforehand because its a little bit hard to find by the number, ask your helena for directions, she'll be more than happy to help!

Helena met us at the appartment to get us settled in.  She had put some basics and some goodies in the fridge for us and made us feel at ease immediately.  We were able to contact her very easily if we needed to and when we left we felt we had made a friend.

Amazing view of the Sydney skyline, quiet location, fast wifi & beautiful area!
Helena is a very nice and caring host. Eventhough I was late upon my arrival she changed her plans and came to me personally to hand in the keys.
The view from the balcony is amazing and the area is perfect for a walk or jogging.
Helena's apartment is highly recommended for business and / or leisure guests.

What a great first experience with Airbnb! The apartment was great and well cleaned. All communication with Helena was positive and fast. The Glebe area is great with lots of restaurant. I definitely recommend this place and I would stay again :)

Helena's place was absolutely lovely! The apartment is basically fully equipped with whatever needed, nice view of sydney skyline, close to bus station,plenty of restaurants nearby and fast wifi. Communication with Helena was fast, she replied most of my messages almost instantly and she's kind enough to meet me earlier for me to check-in. A place I would definitely recommend to others if you would like to have a complete home away from home experience.

Helena is a charming host, who met me to hand over the keys and show me the unit. 
The studio is bright and compact with a well equipped kitchen, and a comfortable bed. The balcony has a great view!
This is a quiet neighbourhood, only a short walk to shops, cafes and transport.
The waterfront walk to Rozelle or the Fish markets is a bonus.

Helena was extremely welcoming and helpful. She went out of her way to meet up with my parents and give them the keys because I was arriving early the next morning. Her place is clean, lovely, and very well stocked for guests. And it's in a  great location. I would recommend staying there to anyone. Glebe Point Road is such a lovely area too.

Accommodation was ideal for a month's stay in Sydney visiting close family. Although the kitchen and bathroom were  'dated' the apartment was well equipped with everything necessary for our stay and adequately suited our needs.

A great appartment! A good location and Helena is a very nice host. Communication was very good! We had a nice stay in Sydney. 
We would really reccoment this place. Thanks Helena
Great location, comfortable bed.  Everything you need in a little apartment. Awesome view from the balcony.
Lovely stay and very nice apartment. Helena was a great host
Great host with a very nice apartment in Glebe. Amazing view from balcony. Apartment had everything you need for both short or long stay. A lot of dining/cafes in Glebe. Really recommend this place!

I had a great stay at Helenas apartment. Helena was a great host and very quick to respond whenever I had any questions. The apartment was very clean upon arrival (and the complimentary fruits and drinks was a nice touch!) and has all the things you need to have a comfortable stay. I think the one thing I missed was a drier to dry my clothes/sheets/etc. in after washing them, but that didn't become a problem either since you can easily dry the clothes on the balcony or indoors. The apartment is situated in a nice and quite area in Glebe, and within walking distance to bus stops, shops and restaurants, the harbour and so on. I can truly recommend Helenas apartment for single travelers or couples looking for a nice apartment for longer or shorter stays in Glebe/Sydney.

Das Apartment liegt an perfekter Lage, um Sydney zu erkunden. Es gibt sehr gute Bus- und Lightrailverbindungen ins Zentrum (ca. 15 min) und in Glebe selber gibt es viele schöne Restaurants, Cafés und Läden. Das Apartment selber ist sehr schön und sauber, Bad und Küche sind etwas älteren Datums aber völlig in Ordnung. Wir haben hier zwei Wochen gewohnt und würden jederzeit wieder hierher kommen. Helena ist eine sehr nette und zuvorkommenden Gastgeberin, der Kontakt mit ihr war sehr einfach.

This is a great place to stay in Sydney. It's close to an efficient public transport system and lots of little shops and restaurants. Helena is a great host who keeps in touch to make sure everything is okay. The flat is well equipped and she provides fresh fruit and drinks to be sure you get off to a great start. Highly recommended.

Helena is a great, warm and very welcoming host. The studio at Glebe is in a very nice neighbourhood. It is very simple, clean and very well located tks to Light Rail and Bus close to it. The stay allowed me to discover a real typical Sydney area. Enjoyed the stay a lot.

Helena’s place was ideal for my visit. Situated not far from the trendy neighbourhood and many eateries. The place also has balcony and great city scape views. Overall very enjoyable. Would love to stay again in the future. Helena was excellent and extremely prompt in communicating!

My wife and I were very fortunate to stay at Helena’s place as our first stop in Australia. Helena is very considerate. She welcomed us with fresh fruits, drinks, and chocolates which gave us a very warm feeling after a long flight from the U.S. The apartment was clean, roomy, and well equipped with all we need for a month’s long stay. Fast Wifi made our work efficient. Helena was extremely informative and responsive. Her place locates at an excellent location, in a quiet and very nice neighborhood. A very short walk to bus-stop and light-rail station took us to anywhere at Sydney. The apartment is within walking distance to lots of nice shops, eateries, water-fronts, Fish Market, Broadway Mall, and the University of Sydney.  We enjoyed the morning walks to the nearby bayside park and Saturday’s interesting Glebe Market. We highly recommend Helena’s place for a business/leisure stay.
Comfortable apartment in a quiet and cool spot close to the Sydney CBD,  with excellent transport access, great facilities and thoughtful touches. Had a very relaxing time during my stay!
Very tidy apartment in one of the suburbs of Sydney. I will come back!
Clean, cozy and convenient place to stay. Helena is a nice and friendly host.

Great apartment, close to public transport and amazing views back over the cbd. Being off the main road very quite and for a studio very roomy and comfortable with well appointed kitchen. The host was excellent
It was nice place. I recommend this accommodation for everyone. Rapid response and kindness of host make me comfortable in Australia. Don't hesitate to reserve this room!

I was in Sydney for a week for conferences at the ICC in Darling Harbour. Helena's place was a great choice for this -- easy to get around on the light rail, nice neighbourhood, and had everything I needed.

Helena’s apartement is really the best quality/price place that you can find in Sydney. Great location, amazing CBD’s view from the balcony and all that you need is provided in the flat. In addition Helena was very accommodating with our arrivals condition. Finally my best Airbnb experience. Thanks again Helena.

name: Upscale Room in The Plateau by LeQube
summary: Stylish, modern and chic, leQube apartments are ideally located in the heart of the city to give you the authentic local experience in Montreal's Plateau Mont-Royal.
space: All of our homes are instantly bookable and include a customer support team available to answer any of your questions. Every one of our home’s is equipped with linen and towels, high speed wi-fi, bathroom essentials, a self-check-in procedure, kitchen and bathroom.
description: Stylish, modern and chic, leQube apartments are ideally located in the heart of the city to give you the authentic local experience in Montreal's Plateau Mont-Royal. All of our homes are instantly bookable and include a customer support team available to answer any of your questions. Every one of our home’s is equipped with linen and towels, high speed wi-fi, bathroom essentials, a self-check-in procedure, kitchen and bathroom. 48 hours prior to arrival, you will receive self check-in instructions which will include a unique access code to you're apartment door! Our customer service team is available Monday to Sunday, 9:00am to 9:00pm by phone, email, or Messenger. You can contact us about extra amenity requests, local recommendations and arrival questions. We’d love to contribute to the success of you’re trip however we’ll leave you to enjoy you’re stay. The apartment is located in a safe, vibrant, artistic and cultured part of Montreal. While exploring, don't miss out on the fabulous
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a safe, vibrant, artistic and cultured part of Montreal. While exploring, don't miss out on the fabulous local café's, restaurants from all around the world, renowned bars and nightlife and an overall great vibe. Our apartment blends right into the neighbourhood and you'll feel like a true Montrealer moments after checking in!
notes: This is a 3 story walk-up and this apartment is on the ground floor. Please note that we do not accommodate children under the age of 12 or pets at our Saint Hubert location.
transit: There is easy access to regular transportation in all directions and you are just two blocks away from the underground metro system.  On-site parking is available for $20 per night (subject to availability). There are also several free street parking spots available first come first serve. You will be provided with a parking guide upon booking.
access: 48 hours prior to arrival, you will receive self check-in instructions which will include a unique access code to you're apartment door!
interaction: Our customer service team is available Monday to Sunday, 9:00am to 9:00pm by phone, email, or Messenger. You can contact us about extra amenity requests, local recommendations and arrival questions. We’d love to contribute to the success of you’re trip however we’ll leave you to enjoy you’re stay.
house_rules: We strive to maintain a comfortable, welcoming space for all of our guests to share and enjoy. For this reason, leQube is a pet and smoke free environment. Excessive noise and additional guests are also strictly forbidden. We thank you in advance for being respectful and contributing to our efforts in keeping our home clean and welcoming.

host.host_about:
We are a small team of avid travelers and hospitality veterans who are huge fans of finding and sharing memorable life experiences. We look forward to having you stay with us in the heart of the city, the Plateau Mont Royal, and sharing our knowledge about the best local food, art, festivals and everything else Montreal has to offer!

Candy, Lisa, and Daniel
leQube Hospitality Team

reviews.comments: LeCube was amazing! It was, in fact, a cube. But for anyone who doesn't need a kitchen - this is perfect. I rented a room with a balcony and it was fantastic. The room was beautifully set up, immaculate, the bed was comfy and best of all - the shower was really, really nice. haha. I will definitely rent from them again, when I am back in town.

Where to even begin. Staying at leqube was by far one of the best and most memorable experiences we've had using Airbnb and through traveling in general.

The first thing that captivated us and the reason we chose to stay here was their design, style, and layout of the property. Sophisticated yet minimal, clean, simple, modern,cool and easy. 

The people behind leqube really went out their way to think of what a guest could need during their stay, everything was excellent and better than described in the listing.

The whole check in and check out experience was fast, seamless and simple and didn't require any intersection with the host, however they are available to help at a moments notice if you might need. The room comes with everything listed, and yes the Apple TV and Netflix combo are a cool and modern feature to have. Almost forgot to mention they have a rooftop lounge with ping pong and hot tub.

Apart from the overall amazing trip we had in Montreal, one of the reasons that made it so magical and made this particular city so memorable in our minds was having a place like leqube to call our home away from home for the weekend.

Counting down the days to our next trip to Montreal and our next stay at leqube.
Un endroit exceptionnel ! Une adresse à retenir pour l'emplacement, le calme et la terrasse urbaine.. Impeccable
The Cube is a great experience. Walking distance to everything and very cozy and quiet. A nice modern space. Check in and out is simple and the support staff were instantly responsive.
leQube is a really nice hotel apartment.

We had a wonderful stay here! The neighborhood felt safe, and there were many things to do that were walking distance from the apartment, which was very convenient. The space was functional and provided all the essentials.

We loved our stay at leQube.  The staff were friendly, super helpful and communicative.  The room was clean, fresh and comfortable.  We loved the Nespresso machine in the lobby, as well as the tea.  There is a fridge in the lobby where you can leave food if you label it.  The location is within walking distance of many restaurants and shops but a bit of a walk to the Metro if you want to head elsewhere.  That said the streets were so beautiful in the surrounding area we enjoyed the walk and ended up finding new restaurants and shops to explore along the way.  We would definitely come back!
Cozy and safe environment, easy access. Will definitely stay again.
LeQube offers a quaint, clean, central accommodation option. Great communication was the icing on the cake. Merci!
LeQube was the perfect place for our weekend getaway in Montreal. Super easy self check-in, well appointed rooms, and free snacks in the morning. Would stay again!

Everything was amazing. The place is so beautiful and clean ! I love the decoration, and the jacuzzi on the rooftop is pretty cool ! I could definitely live there all the time.
And, really good location
Cozy, clean and oh so convenient to the plateau buzz.

Belle chambre, et terrasse TOP !
Très bon emplacement (restaurants et bars à proximité)

My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights and loved it.  Great location near plenty of great restaurants, stores, and parks - but very quiet at night.  Gave us an opportunity to experience a side of Montreal we likely would not have experienced had we stayed at a hotel downtown.

My friends and I booked three units at LeQube and were all blown away! The place is amazingly decorated, in a great location close to restaurants, shops, bars, etc. The rooms were clean and modern and very well done and the self check-in/check-out was a breeze.  Beyond that, the little things really put this place over the top, from magazines, books, fresh fruit, coffee, and (Website hidden by Airbnb) yoga mats, which the girls used to do yoga on the rooftop each morning. We will definitely seek out more LeQube locations for our future travels. Trust me, book this place!

Très bon séjour à Montréal! Bon emplacement quartier tranquille proche de toutes commodités ( 2 stations de métro proches , restaurants et bars ...). Déco très tendance et hôtes réactifs.  Je recommande fortement !

LeQube is a fantastic option for light travelers! Great location - right along a residential street and steps from Duluth Ave and all its boutiques and brasseries. Easy walk to St Laurent and St Denis streets. Modest sized rooms, but very well maintained - Cozy and clean space. If the parking spot is available (slightly extra cost) I highly recommend - street parking can be a little tricky on St Hubert with the restrictions...and if your French is a little shakey :) Overall a great value and option in a great city!

LeQuebe is very stylish, clean and is located in a prime location in Montreal. Although there was not a lot of staff present, the access code entry and checkup emails made me feel safe and cared for. I would highly recommend it for someone who is looking for hotel quality without the high cost!
Great room!!
We loved our stay in this stylish space. Walking distance to lots of great restaurants and bars.

LeQube is in an excellent location and easily accessible.  Our room was clean, communication with the host was clear and the storage area for luggage before and after checkout was secure.  The lobby area is very convenient and stylish--it offers tea and coffee too.  We would absolutely stay again  and highly recommend LeQube to future guests.

I stayed at LeQube with a friend Jan 12-14. The communication from the host prior to the stay was excellent! I had no issues with the self-check-in. I loved the Welcome Booklet that was provided upon booking and came in handy the first day when choosing a restaurant to eat at.
LeQube is located in a lovely neighborhood, I always felt safe leaving the apartment.
The room decor was charming. I enjoyed the shower.
I was initially surprised by the size of the apartment. It was slightly smaller than I expected. However, I understand that this is common in Montreal and the overall value for the money is amazing.

LeQube, was one of my favorite Airbnb’s yet. The room was spotless, chic, and had a ton of space available to keep our luggage out of sight while we were there. This place also has a rooftop hot tub with a view of the city. 
If you’re trying to get out the door quickly, they even offer some hot coffee/tea, croissants and juice, such a nice touch. Most places were in walking distance. And at the very most you’re going to have a 15 minute walk to the main part of the city. Response time was incredibly quick. Although parking isn’t offered for every guest, it’s easy to find in the area, and we never parked more than a 1-2 minute walk from LeQube. We will definitely be staying here the next time we are in Montreal.
LeQube is a great option for a couple or single traveler. The apartment had everything that you would need for a quick stay in Montreal. Check in was seamless and communication was prompt.
bon voyage !
Another great stay at LeQube. I highly recommend it.
Love the space. Close to St. Denis with lots of access to restaurants and bars. Only downside is to find a parking spot close by.
The place was great in a nice neighbourhood. Will be staying here again on the future.
My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay. It is quite small but perfect for a romantic getaway. Location is great and the whole decor was beautiful.
It’s a very cozy and stylish place. It was perfect for us thank you!!
Beautiful and stylish space in a central location :) Would definitely recommend!
Such a cute and stylish space. Somewhat small but it was adaquate and relaxing to stay in! The host welcomed us nicely and the process was quick and easy. We'd love to come back again!
I can’t speak highly enough about how good of a business LeQube runs. Was not disappointed and will definitely be coming back!

I had an awesome stay at LeQube.  Checking in and checking out was incredibly easy - they even provide luggage storage to accommodate any early arrivals and/or late departures.  The hosts are incredibly responsive!  The room and bathroom were both clean and comfortable.  During our stay, the hot tub was undergoing repairs.  So I was slightly disappointed I could not make use of this facility during this trip.  That being said, I still had a great time and if I'm ever back in Montreal, I'd definitely come back to stay at LeQube!
Very clean, and modern. Very small but perfect for two people!
Great location, and very clean space.

Wonderful place in a perfect location. The rooms are beautiful and stylish. The common space is lovely. We especially loved the rooftop dipping pool. The communication was excellent. I would highly recommend staying here!
Great place and plenty of restauarants in walking distance! The lighting in the apartment at night was the only down fall. Other then that the place was perfect for what we needed!
Great place. Very tiny but great.

Our original booking had an issue and the host Fred provided us an alternative location that was larger than our original stay and no extra cost! He was great enough to give us a call ahead of time to advise on the different location that was approx. 2-3 minutes away from the original stay. The location that was stayed at was immaculate! Gorgeous and super comforting. Absolutely amazing stay!! This stay was a romantic birthday getaway. I am looking forward to booking again!!!

name: COPACABANA AMAZING APARTMENT IN FRONT OF THE BEACH
summary: Hey Dears, The apartment is in the best location, in copacabana beah, posto 6, near Ipanena Beach. South area, the one of the most popular area, near Copacabana palace Hotel. Near metro, and public tranports.
description: Hey Dears, The apartment is in the best location, in copacabana beah, posto 6, near Ipanena Beach. South area, the one of the most popular area, near Copacabana palace Hotel. Near metro, and public tranports.

name: Big 2bdm, Views, WIFI and carpark
summary: Large tastefully furnished 2 bedroom apartment well located in Woolloomooloo, surrounded by spectacular harbour with trendy bars and a multitude of dining options.  City and harbour bridge views from the living room and balcony.
space: Large 2 bedroom apartment at 88 Dowling Street, Woolloomooloo only minutes walk to the Potts Point, Domain and the city. The Royal Botanical Gardens, Opera House, and Circular Quay are all within walking distance. The Woolloomooloo area offers a multitude of waterfront experiences, trendy bars, and spectacular views. Picturesque alfresco dining along the length of the finger wharf, is just a few minutes walk from the apartment. Located on the third floor in a corner position, this stylish 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment with the internet included as well as car parking for one car. Fully furnished with full kitchen facilities including dishwasher, full sized fridge, and all kitchenware. There is an internal laundry in the bathroom. The living and dining area is very spacious and features a flat-screen TV, Foxtel Channels, CD and DVD player. The bedrooms are also tastefully furnished and spacious, the main bedroom has a king-sized bed and second bedroom two singles, both have built in w
description: Large tastefully furnished 2 bedroom apartment well located in Woolloomooloo, surrounded by spectacular harbour with trendy bars and a multitude of dining options.  City and harbour bridge views from the living room and balcony. Large 2 bedroom apartment at 88 Dowling Street, Woolloomooloo only minutes walk to the Potts Point, Domain and the city. The Royal Botanical Gardens, Opera House, and Circular Quay are all within walking distance. The Woolloomooloo area offers a multitude of waterfront experiences, trendy bars, and spectacular views. Picturesque alfresco dining along the length of the finger wharf, is just a few minutes walk from the apartment. Located on the third floor in a corner position, this stylish 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment with the internet included as well as car parking for one car. Fully furnished with full kitchen facilities including dishwasher, full sized fridge, and all kitchenware. There is an internal laundry in the bathroom. The living and dining area is
neighborhood_overview: Woolloomooloo area surrounds you with its scenic waterfront, a busy part of Sydney city, you should feel safe to walk around day or night and experience everything the area and beyond has to offer.
access: Facilities available for all guests are a pool, sauna, and spa. You will have internal access from your car park to the foyer area. This is a secure building with restricted lift access and common areas. OPTIONAL EXTRAS - you may wish to request for your stay: - Second set of linen/towels - Portable Baby Cot  Feel free to contact me (your host) in advance of your stay to arrange any extras/comforts you may require, I will let you know then of any extra cost that will be incurred.
interaction: Upon confirmation of your booking, you will receive detailed information about the arrangement for key collections, and contact phone numbers if you need any assistance during your stay. There are two key collection options for you to choose from: 1. Your keys can be held for you at a Kingsford office (en-route between the airport and Sydney city) There is an outside pin coded key box available 24-hours. 2. A representative for the accommodation can meet you at the property address to pass keys, and familiarize you with your accommodation (option 2 = fee applicable, not available 24 hours) On departure simply leave the keys locked inside the property. Your accommodation will be clean and fully serviced, ready for your arrival. There will be guest starter pack in the apartment that includes tea, coffee, sugar, milk, dishwashing & washing liquids, soap, shampoo & toilet paper.  Let me (your host) know what type of cuisine you like for local recommendations. I (Andrea) am also happy to ma
house_rules: Please be aware of the following Terms and Conditions and that as a guest you have acknowledged by clicking on 'request to book' via Airbnb that you are confirming that you understand the following Terms and Conditions and your guest responsibilities under the 'house rules'!  Arrival/Departure: Check-in time is from 2pm, check-out time is by 10:00am. If you require a late check-out, please advise at least 24 hours in advance and your host will do the best to satisfy your request, although this cannot be guaranteed. Keys can be collected from an Kingsford office (en-route between the airport and Sydney city), or alternatively your host can arrange to have you met at the property on arrival, however this service may not be available at certain times and a charge will apply for this service. Guests are required to phone representative 1 hour prior to arrival, without exception. This is to ensure that there is someone available to serve you. Your host takes no responsibility for waiting ti

host.host_about:
Hello and thanks for taking the time to read my profile. I am a roaming New Zealander now settled in Australia's most picturesque city of Sydney. I am delighted to become an Airbnb host of apartment/condominium/self-contained/flat style of accommodation right here in Sydney. 

45 years old, I have been a travel agent since my early twenties, this job experience coupled with my own extensive travel around the world (including many successful stays booked via Airbnb) plus meeting my travel client expectations has armed me with extensive knowledge base of what guests require of their stay.

Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions you may have in regards to the property you will be staying in, transport, activities, events, Sydney itself, I will be very happy to help with any information I can.

reviews.comments: Stor och trivsam lägenhet. Dock störande oljud från ventilationen i fastigheten nattetid. Trevligt område med flera restauranger och pubar i närheten. Enkelt att ta sig de centrala delarna av Sydney till fots.

The apartment was very spacious and clean upon arriving. I loved that there were restaurants, convenience stores and public transportation options close by.  Less than 2 km from the Opera House and Circular Quay.  Secure building.  All in all, this is a nice property.  We had a question about the wi-fi and Andrea responded promptly, which we appreciated!
Listing was very accurate and what we expected!
Great apartment, good location close to the City.

My family loved our stay in Andrea's apartment, great location, walking distance to Sydney Opera house and harbor bridge. Would definitely book again! 
Thx Andrea!
Andrea was a great host, she gave clear instructions as to how to collect keys. The location is at a nice and convenient location, with easy assess to major sightseeing spots.

Good apartment with a great view of the Harbour Bridge. Easy walking distance to city and botanic gardens. Good amenities close by (restaurants and grocery stores). Apartment is managed by World Apartments and Andrea was very responsive to our communications. Secure building with helpful reception staff.
Great apartment

We had a very comfortable stay in this beautiful apartment within walking distance to the Woolloomooloo Wharf. The space is large and nicely furnished, beds comfortable, and fantastic views! We walked to many of the local sights and especially enjoyed VIVID which we were not aware was happening when we booked our trip. We would love to stay here again if we come back to Sydney. Thank you for your easy communication throughout.

Fantastic 2 bedroom apartment with great views of the city and the Harbour Bridge.  The location in Woolloomoolloo is excellent and is within easy walking distance of the CBD and Opera House.   The apartment is well-appointed and spacious with large bedrooms.

The accommodation was perfect for our family. The apartment was huge so you never feel cramped. Comfy beds and good ammenities. Great views of city skyline and Harbour Bridge glimpses. 

A wonderful walk into the city via the botanical gardens, where you can catch ferries and see . Close to cafes and restaurants. 

Good prompt accomodating communication from Andrea. Thank you.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Andrea's place. The location was just great, we walked to lots of restaurants and cafes,  centenial park, into the city and across to circular quay. The apartment itself was just as pictured, very spacious with a great view.
Spacious appartment with great views of the city.
This is a very spacious apartment with a good view. Good for eating in or dining out at the local restaurants. A great base for exploring the city.

Extremely comfortable, stylish and well stocked with all amenities and equipment for a great stay. Modern, well furnished apartment with huge windows and lots of natural light.  Very easy access to hip neighborhoods as well as the gardens and parks.  Andrea was easy to communicate with and responded instantly.  An excellent resource for any  visitor to Sydney.
Very nice place to stay.. definitely gonna stay again next trip

This was a great property to rent, within walking distance of the Opera House and CBD. There were many great restaurants nearby. Andrea was very helpful and organised. I would recommend staying here as a good option.
The apartment is really nice good location and the host reply very fast the room is big enough and kitchen is awesome I do enjoy stay here Thanks Andrea!

Andrea is most helpful and provided us with information on public transport and other things when asked.  The apartment is only a short walk to many things including the botanic gardens, Sydney opera house and circular quay.

Fantastic location if you want to be near Kings Cross but also close enough to walk to circular quay and around the botanical gardens. The apartment was fairy quiet even though next to a pub (we stayed over the weekend). It is also right next to a primary school so no noise until kids start at school for the day (it was school holidays for us so wasn’t an issue at all). Highly recommend eating at Sienna Marina which is nearby and a walk along the wharfs and to see the Navy ships. Comfy beds and a lovely deep bath!!
Perfect location, quiet neighborhood with plenty of restaurants in a short walking distance.  Great beds, awesome view, short-walk to King's X station
Amazing location. Close to harbour and restaurants. Clean, spacious apartment with incredible views of city and harbour bridge.
Great location. Nice quiet and clean accommodation.

A lovely spacious and comfortable apartment in lovely quiet cul-de-sac location.  Very handy to city centre, mainly caught an Uber for around $11 but could also easily walk through the botantic gardens which were right there.  Restaurants handy, Finger Wharf just over the road and a great little cafe just down on the corner of the street.
Andrea at World Apartments was excellent to deal with, very helpful with great location.
Highly recommend for a central Sydney stay
Perfect size and location for a family visit to Sydney. Easy walk into CBD/circular quay in 20 mins.

This apartment is spacious and in an amazing location for walking to  the ferries at circular quay and the Botanical Gardens, the Wooloomooloo Wharf area has some great restaurants only five minutes walk. The view includes the harbour bridge from the balcony. We stayed for a week and the facilities for cooking and doing laundry were more than adequate. Andrea was a great host replying very quickly and providing perfect key collection details. We would love to return next time we make it to zdydney from the Uk

A very comfortable and spacious Apartment close to restaurants and other amenities... Lovely views from the large living room and a lovely little balcony to sit and enjoy a coffee or a wine .... Interesting things to discover within walking distance... The Apartment suited the purpose of our stay in Sydney for our long weekend...

Beautiful apartment in a big complex. Close to all amenities and easy walking distance to the city and amazing restaurants nearby. Our only complaint was the noise and behaviour of neighbours from nearby housing estate late at night.

Great location for the family as quite but close enough to the city action.  Lots of food choices in walking distance and a great cafe  (coffee) 100m away.  A comfortable 20m stroll to the Opera House via the gardens.  Apartment very generous in size for 4 and has all you need including foxtel.  Air Conditioner works well and car park is a bonus.
Nice place

She was very attentive and helped us with everything from restaurant recommendations to a place to park our car. The location was perfect; not far from the city but away from the craziness of it all.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: I am Brazilian, 39 y.o. live in Rio de Janeiro, have lived abroad for 4 years (England and The Netherlands). I love traveling, sports, reading and to have friends around. I have many friends from all over the world and I really enjoy to have contact with other cultures different than mine! So, it will be a pleasure to host you here and show you around!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: O apartamento é lindo, super novo, aconchegante, muito bem localizado a ponto de não ter vontade de sair dele.  Super Recomendo!

AP com ótima localização, próximo a praia, comércios em geral, bancos e estação de metrô, além de tudo é aconchegante e limpo. A anfitriã Clarissa, apesar de não termos nos conhecido, manteve contato antes e durante a estadia, sempre atenciosa e mostrando-se disponível.

Clarissa foi sempre muito simpática e solícita nos recebeu pessoalmente. O apartamento fica muito bem localizado, pertissimo da praia e com muitas opções de restaurantes e comercio em geral. Tivemos uma excelente estadia. Recomendamos.

El apartamento es exactamente lo que se ve en las fotos, esta limpio y el barrio tiene supermercados, bares, farmacias y más muy cerca. El trato con Clarissa fue super claro y es totalmente recomendable. Es un apartamento chico pero cómodo para 4 personas, nada mas que decir. Un éxito!
Tudo perfeito, desde o inicio clarissa foi mto rápida nas respostas, apto bem localizado ao lado do metro, mto confortável

Excelente hospitalidade! Fotos condizentes com a realidade, apartamento limpo, ideal para dois casais, nos atendeu muito bem. A anfitriã foi muito simpática, nos deu várias dicas e respondeu tudo quase que imediatamente! Estamos muito satisfeitos!
Bom atendimento.... perto de tudo... localização muito boa, porém muitos moradores de rua e cheiro ruim nas imediações do predio
Ótimo o lugar a Anfitriã!
Muito bom o apartamento ! Ótimo espaço. Me atendeu em tudo. As fotos são bem fidedignas.

O espaço da Clarissa é muito bem localizado. Há mercados, padarias, pizzarias, bares, tudo muito perto. Além disso, fica a apenas 2 quarteirões da praia. Tanto a cama como o sofá cama são muito confortáveis. Acomoda muito bem 4 pessoas. A Clarissa esteve disponível em todos os momentos que (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, voltaria a me hospedar.
Espaço muito gostoso para família  , ótima localização , perto da praia , restaurantes , padaria e muito mais , apartamento condizente  com todas as fotos! Excelente
Ap bem localizado, vizinhança tranquila, com tudo próximo. A Clarissa foi muito atenciosa, atendendo a algumas solicitações com presteza.  Recomendo o espaço.

O espaço é muito bem localizado com várias opções de compras e consumo bem próximos, além de ser muito perto da praia e com um custo de trânsito bem barato à alguns pontos turísticos. Os funcionários do prédio são muito educados e prestativos. Sentimos falta apenas de uma área de serviço, mas quanto a isto, tem a alternativa de várias lavanderias próximas ao prédio para quem preferir. Recomendo a estadia.
O apartamento estava extremamente limpo e totalmente fiel às fotos! Clarissa se mostrou uma ótima anfitriã, sendo rápida no atendimento e flexível quanto aos horários. Obrigado pela estadia Clarissa!
Localização excelente e espaço agradável com tudo que precisamos para uma boa estadia. Super indico!
Siamo stati in 4 amici per 13 notti nell'alloggio di Clarissa ed è stato comodissimo come posizione a due minuti dal mare e due minuti dalla metro.
Muy bueno. Recomendable 100%.

Beautiful apartment, tasteful decorations, very close to the beach, Resturant and shops. The host responded on my late request and I was able to check in. I would definitely  recommend this apartment.
Estadia ótima.

house_rules: GENERAL HOUSE RULES Saving Electricity: - Turn off your air-conditioner when you leave the house; - Turn off the common room air-conditioner (if you turned it on or are the last to leave the area) - Turn off lights/appliances once done using them (i.e. your bedroom lights, shower water heater, etc); - Use the washing machine for medium and large loads ONLY (single or few item washes can be done faster by hand and are highly wasteful in terms of energy and water). Bathroom Etiquette: - If you shower and find water on the bathroom floor, please kindly mop it up and leave the ventilation fan on (safety > incremental electricity cost); - Don’t forget to turn off the water heater after showering; - Keep the bathroom door closed at all times; - Flush after every use (preferably with toilet seat down). Humidity Management (April to October) - Do not leave windows open for extended periods of time and close all windows if you are the last to leave a room. - Turn on the Dehumidifier if the A/C

host.host_about: We are young professionals who enjoy the beautiful outdoor life Sydney has to offer.

reviews.comments: Great experience. Communication from beginning to end with Charles was faultless. Apartment was exactly as advertised. In a convienent location, close to a great cafe and a short stroll to a few good beaches (uphill a slog on the way home!). Flat was clean and tidy and everything worked like it should do. We would fully recommend a stay here.

I had such a wonderful stay at Charlie & Gioia's apartment. They gave me all the instructions I needed to get around the flat and even left a bottle of red wine. While it's a bit of a hike to get up there, Fairlight is beautiful and quiet and the walk to Manly and all the beautiful places to see around is totally worth it. The apartment is super clean and nicely decorated, I definitely felt at home. Thanks a lot for the warm welcome :)

We had a wonderful stay in Charles & Gioia´s very nice and convenient apartment. Cleanness at arrival and equipment as described made life easy, also in respect of near shops, restaurants and bus stops to reach Manly. Communication with Charles was easy too and we would highly recommend that flat, even if its actualized daily rates may appear to be slightly too high for Fairlight.
Perfectly located, nice, clean apartment - as described.

Charle & Gioia have a beautiful apartment in Fairlight, there were really helpful for the organisation of this trip, my mother and her friend who stayed there enjoy the location nearby the beach and the fact that the place was really quiet and sunny. I definitely recommend this place for travellers who like a place to settle for 1 week or more.. 
thanks :)
Erwan
Clean, good location, modern and has all the amenities. Double thumbs up
Good and comfortable apartment with everything you need for a pleasant stay. The hosts were responsive and caring. I would definitely recommend.

name: Manly Beach House
summary: Metres from the golden sands of Manly's iconic beachfront, this charming freestanding cosy home is a hidden retreat . Light and bright with a large outdoor deck which is perfect for sun-filled BBQs after a day at the beach
space: Located 200m from Manly's beachfront and tucked away from the street on a fully fenced level block in an exclusive 'Manly flat' location. Lead the ultimate beach lifestyle footsteps from shops, cafes, restaurants, bars, buses, city-bound ferries and pristine surf and harbour beaches. Light and bright with crisp Hampton-style interiors, this recently refreshed single-level home has an outdoor entertaining deck in an idyllic child friendly outdoor sanctuary.  Its centrally located with the Manly Corso & Ferry only 5minutes walk away.  The kitchen has all the essentials with a gas kitchen top & the convenience of an adjacent laundry. The 2 double bedrooms both have wardrobes and drawers for all your holiday storage while a neat and tidy bathroom with updated fixtures and fittings with a bath an overhead shower.  Additional features include reverse cycle air conditioning, a garden shed, recently landscaped gardens, timber floors, high ceilings, Foxtel (cable TV) and wireless internet.
description: Metres from the golden sands of Manly's iconic beachfront, this charming freestanding cosy home is a hidden retreat . Light and bright with a large outdoor deck which is perfect for sun-filled BBQs after a day at the beach Located 200m from Manly's beachfront and tucked away from the street on a fully fenced level block in an exclusive 'Manly flat' location. Lead the ultimate beach lifestyle footsteps from shops, cafes, restaurants, bars, buses, city-bound ferries and pristine surf and harbour beaches. Light and bright with crisp Hampton-style interiors, this recently refreshed single-level home has an outdoor entertaining deck in an idyllic child friendly outdoor sanctuary. The 2 double bedrooms both have wardrobes and drawers for all your holiday storage while a neat and tidy bathroom with updated fixtures an
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the Ocean Precinct at North Steyne just slightly out of the hustle & bustle of Manly but close enough to get amongst it.  We are closest to North Steyne Surf Club where you can learn to surf at Manly Surf School. This part of Manly is where most of the locals come to relax and get a spare piece of sand to themselves!
notes: All Linen and towels are included so you can enjoy a stress free weekend away.
transit: If you are travelling by car you are likely to park it & then never use it when you are here. We are so close to everything! The Fast ferry gets you into the city (Circular Quay) in 20mins.  The beach is 200m away and you can walk to some of Manly's best coves (Shelly Beach, Little Manly, Dewood Beach and Fairlight Pool) in minutes. The bus is right outside of Pittwater Rd (50m) away and can take you north all the way to Palm Beach (30mins), to the shopping mall (Westfield in Brookevale 5mins) or to the city in around 30mins.
access: Access to the property is via a side entrance down the side of a neighbouring house. It is a paved area with easy access. You will have access to the entire house besides from a locked shed at the back of the property.
interaction: We've lived in Manly and the Northern Beaches our whole lives so can help you with any tips & restaurant guides.
house_rules: All neighbours are lovely and friendly so please keep it this way.  No loud noise after 9pm and no parties. There is also a bunkhouse next door & these are the same rules they abide by.  No pets please or smoking inside.

host.host_about: In my thirties and like to travel the world & see cities like a local.  I live in Manly with my husband of 6 years a little Cavoodle called Charli. We love life by the sea and enjoy dinning out, music , entertainment and good laughs with with friends.

reviews.comments:

El mismo se encuentra tal cual se muestra en las fotos recientes (cuenta con WiFi, 2 TV, A-C en todos los ambientes, blanquería de sobra, shampoo y acondicionador de 1ra calidad, etc, etc, hasta frutas frescas!) IMPECABLE! Al igual que el edificio (de categoría), que cuenta con seguridad 24hs, en un barrio inmejorable para una estadía familiar (supermercados, shopping, comedores, lugar para estacionar en la puerta,etc.) y a solo 3 cuadras de la playa.
A Paola nunca la conocimos personalmente, pero igual siempre se mantuvo en contacto y a disposición para asegurarse que todo estuviese bien. Cabe destacar la simpatía y amabilidad de Caio -quien nos recibió y despidió- siempre atento hasta al mas mínimo detalle para nuestra comodidad. Si la estadía fue excelente, la atención fué aún mejor!
Muy recomendable y volveríamos, sin dudas! Muchas gracias y saludos!
Anfitrião muito atencioso, se preocupou com cada detalhe da nossa hospedagem. Apartamento muito bom em ótimo estado e em uma ótima localização!

A comunicação com a Paola foi ótima desde começo.  Ela é extremamente atenciosa. Não pude conhece-la pessoalmente , mas o Caio, que me recebeu, foi ótimo tb. Apartamento muito bem localizado, na região que mais gosto do RJ. Recomendo e espero voltar em breve

El apartamento es tal como se ve en las fotos, muy amplio y con buenas vistas. El barrio es muy tranquilo y seguro. Se puede ir caminando a la playa Leblon, al jardín botánico o a la Lagoa. 

En el apartamento se puede cocinar cómodamente y lavar ropa. Todos los servicio están cerca, también la zona de restaurantes más top de Río.

Caio es muy amable y está a la orden para solucionar todo. Muy recomendable!

Response to questions and e mails was all the time perfekt. Flat was well  and as shown in the picture. Location is great. Caio gave us a really warm welcome, i really had the feeling we can rely on him in case something goes wrong. Would most defintly book it again! Thank you!

O apartamento da Paola é demais. São três quartos espaçosos e todos os cômodos são limpos e confortáveis com ar condicionado e vários mimos para os hóspedes. O prédio é super bem localizado e seguro, num bairro tranquilo e numa rua próxima à praia e ótimos restaurantes. 
Embora não tenha conhecido a Paola pessoalmente, ela se mostrou preocupada e atenciosa com a nossa estadia e inclusive com um pequeno problema que tivemos com a fechadura. Caio nos recebeu super bem para o check in e check out, foi super atencioso também e isso fez toda a diferença para nós.
Recomendo de verdade e espero voltar.

Leticia was very accommodating and responsive to messages. We were able to extend our stay when travel plans changed at the last minute.
The apartment is as depicted by the photos and in a great location.
Excelente apartamento y muy buena ubicación, viaje con mi familia y nos hizo sentir como en casa.

Muy lindo departamento, piezas amplias cocina y living comedor impecables , cerca de supermercado, bares y playa.
Agua filtrada excelente!
Solo tuvimos un inconveniente con el baño pero se solicionó.
Recomendable
Mto bom apartamento, passei o final de semana com amigos e adoramos! A localização, bairro mto bom! Indico!!!
Otimo apartamento e localização!! Recomedarei a todos!
great place in a great location. would definitely stay here again!

Location, location! If you want to be close to the beach and also to supermarkets, restaurants and bars, Paola's place is really good!
It is great for couples or up to 5 friends. 
The kitchen has also everything if you need to cook - I was making breakfast at home almost everyday and found it very convenient. 
There is also AC in the rooms and living room, which was very good. 
Paola was great to, very responsive.

Ótimo apartamento, muito bem localizado no Leblon, próximo à bares e supermercado. Fomos em 6 pessoas e todos ficaram muito bem acomodados, o apartamento oferecia toda roupa de cama e banho, incluindo itens de higiene, me hospedaria novamente com certeza, sem contar que os anfitriões foram muito atenciosos, desde o primeiro contato com a Paola quanto a recepção pelo Caio.

Apartamento muito bom, tudo como nas fotos! A Paola é muito agradável e sempre dâ dicas etc.

Quando eu vou pro Rio novamente, escolheria esse apartamento de novo!
O apartamento é muito bem localizado, e a Paola e o Caio são super atenciosos. Ficamos em 6 pessoas confortavelmente bem hospedadas! Valeu a pena!
Todo o processo seguro e de confiança, facil comunicaçao. O apartamento eh incrivel, perto de tudo. O Caio q entregou as chaves eh mto simpatico e ajudou muito

O apto de Paola é muito bom: localização e estrutura muito bons. Além do Caio ser imensamente prestativo e me auxiliando sempre que necessário e de forma muito simpática, atenciosa e eficiente.
Recomendo!

We were recieved in the apartment, and told all about how things worked. We were 5 adults and we had space enough. The showers weren't very warm but that wasn't a big problem. The wifi worked very fine. We could have used som more cutlery.
The apartment is located in a very safe area, with supermarkets, shopping center  and restaurants close by. It takes about 10 minutes to walk to the Ipanema beach. 
We stayed 5 days in the apartment and would be happy to use it again, although I might prefer to be a little closer to post 9 on the beach, where there is more life - but that might be due to the low season

Estar nesse apartamento foi minha primeira experiência na comunidade Airbnb e foi simplemente SHOW!!! 
As fotos são exatas - quem alugar o apartamento não terá surpresas desagradáveis pelo contrário, todos os comodos são amplos, arrumados e limpos. Todos os eletrônicos funcionando perfeitamente.
A localização é sensacional, a pé você encontra mercados, bancos, o Leblon Shopping, Praia no Posto 11, a Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. No check in já recebemos todas as informações e orientações, fomos super bem recepcionadas, na saída também foi tudo certo. 
A Paola está sempre disponível no (Hidden by Airbnb) .
Realmente é um achado !!! Super recomendado a todos!!!!! Quando voltar ao RJ espero encontrar esse apartamento disponivel!! Abracos a todos.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, estava muito limpo e organizado assim como nas fotos do anúncio. Tivemos uma excelente hospedagem, roupas de cama e banho disponíveis e bem limpas. Voltaremos com certeza!
Excelente localizaçao!
L'appartement de Paolo est très bien situé. Bien organisé et fonctionnel pour 5 personnes. Nous avons apprécié notre séjour!
Tudo perfeito. Localização (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei.
Apartamento amplo, bem localizado e de fácil acesso, fomos em  5 pessoas e dormimos confortavelmente.

We were recieved from the gatekeeper and got the key from the apartment. We were 3 adults and we had space enough. The wifi worked very fine. The apartment is located in a very safe area, with supermarkets, shopping center and restaurants close by. It takes about 10 minutes to walk to the first class Ipanema beach. We stayed 8 days in the apartment during the first week of the olympia games and we would take the apartment again. 
All the brasilien people we met, has been very nice people!

O apartamento é ótimo, limpo e organizado! Tem de tudo! A Paola pensou em cada detalhe!!! 
A localização é muito boa, perto do supermercado, shopping, lojas, lanchonetes e restaurantes!
Recomendo pra todos!

Fiquei apenas um dia mas voltarei em uma próxima oportunidade, com certeza!

As fotos são bem condizentes com a realidade. A região é ótima: próximo à lagoa, a umas 6 quadras da praia, com todas as facilidades por perto e silensiosa.

Wifi funciona muito bem.

Havia uma pessoa nos esperando muito simpatica que nos mostrou todo o apto.
Otima localização!
Apto muito confortavel.
Ponto baixo foi os chuveiros nao poderem serem usados ao mm tempo, dificultando as saídas.
Tambem sentimos falta de um secador de cabelos, pois estava um pouco frio para sair à noite pós banho.
Voltariamos!

Foi ótimo, o apt é super bem localizado perto de tudo , super limpo  com boas acomodações super recomendo!! adorei conhecer o Caio ele é um barato e deixou tudo certinho para nossa chegada inclusive com vários guias e telefones de delivery! 
Com certeza quando voltar ao Rio vou ficar lá
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado e as instalações são ótimas. Apenas as cortinas dos quartos deixam passar um pouco de claridade.

Estadia ótima, tanto a anfitriã quando seu assistente Caio, sempre tiraram todas as nossas dúvidas antes da viagem!! 
O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, as camas são confortáveis e possui ar condicionado em todos os cômodos, inclusive na sala.
A localização é maravilhosa... primeiro que vc está no Leblon, bairro mais charmoso do Rio, segundo que vc tem supermercados, farmácias, bares, restaurantes e shopping a 1 quadra do prédio e terceiro que a praia é um pulo.. rs

Lugar muito bom

Excelente localização.
 
O apartamento e tudo que  diz no (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei
Localização excelente, perto de tudo. Apartamento super confortável e estruturado! Caio foi super atencioso, foi ótimo!
Tudo perfeito! Apartamento lindo e bem localizado! Atendimento excepcional! Amamos nossa estadia. Muito obrigado!
Ótima localização, o apartamento exatamente como as fotos e anfitrião atencioso.
Excelente estadia! Apartamento muito organizado, confortável, tudo funcionando e extremamente limpo. Além, é claro, da localização maravilhosa. Linda vista!
Apartamento muito aconchegante e bem localizado! Tive uma ótima estadia.
Ótimo apartamento!
