Apto muito bom. Anfitriã demais!!!
Todo perfecto
Ok tudo dentro do previsto
We had a smooth stay on Paola's apartment for a week. Everything works just fine. Great localization, quiet 3 bedroom apartment with pretty of space.

Olá Paola, a estadia foi ótima,  apartamento bem localizado,  Seguro e fomos muito bem recebidos pelos funcionários e o Caio. Sentimos por não ter grades nas janelas, para criança é muito perigoso . Custo benefício ótimo

Ótima hospedagem, bem localizado, perto da praia, Dias Ferreira, Gávea, etc. Na minha opinião a melhor localização do Rio de Janeiro. O apartamento estava impecável e tinha toda a estrurura necessária para nos receber. Ficarei em outra oportunidade, sem dúvidas.
Excelente localizacao e apartamento
Excelente localização! Perto da lagoa e da praia ao mesmo tempo. Arredores super tranquilos.
Ótimo apartamento e anfitriã muito simpática
Ótimo lugar, muito bem recebida.
Ótima localização, recomendo!!
ótimo apartamento e localização!!
Apto muito bem localizado e confortável. Ideal para quem gosta de estar em bairro tranquilo porém com opções de divertimento próximos.
O lugar é nota 10!

This 3 bedrooms flat is amazing! 
Super well located, close to everything of the cool neighbourhood of leblon bit still in a quiet and very safe street! 
Caio and Paola are super nice, always replying quick and ready to help! 
I would recommend to group of friends or family! 
Super clean, tidy and with all the utensils you need ! 
Thank you, me , my boyfriend and my family had an delightful time in Rio! 
We will be back!
Foi tudo ótimo.Localizacao perfeita, Wifi ótimo...kkkk. Tudo em perfeito estado. Indico e voltaremos com certeza.
Departamento recomendable!!
O apartamento é muito bem localizado. Paola foi muito flexível e atenciosa. Recomendo!

Apartamento amplo com vistas maravilhosas e bem organizado e limpo. Foi um final de semana encantador com várias opções de restaurantes, bairro tranquilo e próximo à praia. Adoramos a recepção super explicativa do Caio, o qual foi muito atencioso e super alto astral.
Excelente localização

O melhor do apartamento é a localização:  entre a praia e a Lagoa, numa região tranquila, perto de restaurantes e supermercado. O apartamento é confortável. Como fiquei vários dias, senti falta de alguns utensílios , como toalha de mesa, mais copos e cobertor. Tive um pouco de dificuldade de falar com a anfitriã, mas nada que comprometesse a estadia.
Recomendo a todos o apartamento, tudo limpo e completo, ótima localização.

O apartamento tem excelentes acomodações: sem luxo, mas funcional e contendo o necessário para 5 pessoas. A limpeza é muito boa, perfumado e com boa aparência. Claro e ensolarado. Os moveis antigos são muito bonitos e nos sentimos muito bem naquele clima retrô. Ah, recomendo à proprietária disponibilizar mais de uma chave de acesso ao apartamento. O fornecimento de uma única chave dificulta a mobilidade dos hóspedes.

A Paola foi bem atenciosa e flexível com checkin e checkout. Entramos às 8:30 e saímos às 17h e isso nos ajudou muitíssimo. A localização do apto é perfeita, com acesso fácil a serviços, praia e lagoa. Wifi ótimo, inclusive dos quartos. A casa é toda equipada. Fomos em 5 pessoas e não sentimos falta de nada. Notamos que as camas são de tamanho normal, mas isso não foi problema. Só a limpeza que pode melhorar um pouquinho.
Maravilloso departamento y muy bien ubicado!
Apartamento ótimo e super bem localizado! (:

Ótimo apartamento no coração do Leblon e perto de tudo. Anfitriã muito solícita e gentil, bem como os colaboradores do prédio. Perto da Praia, da Lagoa, do shopping Leblon, bem como do metrô e Ataulfo  (a rua do Leblon). E acordar todos os dias e ver o Redentor de braços abertos pra vc não tem preço!!!
Casa muito bem localizada, a uma quadra da praia e do metro e de mercado e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza iremos retornar.
Apartamento bem localizado, com bom custo benefício.

Este departamento esta muy bien ubicado, cerca de la playa, en un barrio que tiene de todo (comer, comprar, etc), y que es un agrado caminar en las tardes por este barrio (Leblon).
Existe transporte de buses y taxis a una cuadra, y el metro está a 6 cuadras, muy cómodo. 
Los conserjes del edificio son muy amables, y siempre disponibles para poder llegar a cualquier hora al departamento.
El departamento esta en un piso 15 y no tiene vistas destacables.  Caminado llegas en menos de 10 minutos a la playa a la altura del Puesto 12, que es muy tranquilo y entretenido si vas con niños.
Sin duda volveria a este departamento.
O apartamento é melhor do que parece nas fotos. A localização é excelente e segura. Voltando ao Rio pretendo me hospedar novamente no imóvel de Paola.
Localização muito boa, camas confortáveis, chuveiro ótimo! Tem uma obra no prédio ao lado, então durante a semana acordar cedo é "obrigatório", rs. Isso é temporário, então esta tudo certo :)

Nossa estadia foi boa. O único problema que tivemos foi com a TV da sala e a internet, que ficou sem sinal do segundo dia ate o ultimo. Segundo a Paola, problemas da NET... Isso foi bem ruim pq os pontos de TV e as avaliações da internet, foram quesitos importantes para minha escolha nesse apartamento. 

Tirando isso... localização perfeita! Bares padarias e etc tudo mto perto, supermercados, farmácias enfim TUDO! Tudo q vc precisa esta a alguns passos do apto! O local e otimo, arejado, mto organizado, mto limpo. Ar condicionado ok! Camas ok! Banheiro ok! Cozinha ok! Tudo de bom !!!
A Recepção tb foi ótima pelo Kaio. 
Obrigada

Bom apartamento no Leblon, perto do metro (500 m), perto da praia (700 m), supermercado do lado (100m), perto da rua Dias Ferreira (200m), super limpo e com todas as amenidades necessarias. Recepção excelente feita pelo Caio.
Ótima localização, garagem e portaria 24 horas. Ficaria denovo e indico!!!
Excelente localização e atendimento muito prestativo. Recomendo

Ótimo espaço, super limpo!
Próximo da praia, supermercado. Adoramos a estadia.

Super aconchegante, bem localizado e limpeza impecável! 
Voltaremos !!
O apartamento é bem localizado na área central do melhor bairro do Rio. Tudo muito organizado e limpo. Recomendo
Apartamento muito bem localizado e arrumado! Estadia foi excelente! Recomendo certamente!

O Apartamento é muito bem localizado, espaçoso, limpo e organizado. 
Paola e o Rafael sempre dispostos a ajudar. 
Recomendo muito a estadia. 
Obrigada. ❤️

É a segunda vez que alugo o apartamento da Paola, das suas vezes a experiência foi ótima, o ap tem tudo o que precisamos e a localização é maravilhosa. A atenção deles as nossas solicitações foram sempre atendidas com prontidão. Voltarei com certeza!

I’m front Rio, so I’d recommend the location. The place is a good cost benefit. Minutes (walking distance) from best shopping centers and from Leblon beach, area is also well served by great restaurants and bars, supermarkets, etc it is well connected in terms of public transportation. Clean, quality bed lines and towels, apartment is simple but has all the basic appliances. Raphael’s service (he works with Paola) was outstanding, very responsive, super kind person. Electric shower, not ideal but ok. High floor with no safety nets on the windows, so not recommended for small children. A great option to be in one of the best neighborhoods in town at an affordable price.
Apartamento com excelente localização, tudo muito organizado. Eu e minhas amigas amamos tudo, voltaremos com toda a certeza !!!!!
excelente apartamento, extremamente limpo, toalhas e roupa de campa limpas. A localização é ótimo, muito perto da praia. Fomos muito bem recebidas e sem nenhum atraso.

This is a big apartment I stayed in for 10 days. The location is great in a Leblon which is very safe and near the metro which takes you into central RJ, walking distance to the beaches of Leblon & Ipanema.  The block is getting on a bit but has 24-hour security/porter and you will need to give a copy of photo ID to them to access the block.

The apartment could do with updating but is comfortable and has a/c in every room. The washing machine/cooker works well and there are plenty of pots/pans/crockery etc. The things that dragged down my score overall is the lack of hot water anywhere but the showers. There is no kettle in the kitchen so making tea or/and boiling water to wash dishes needs to be done in a pan. The bedroom window needs repairing because it doesn't close and swings in the win, making noise. The fridge had a leak and the top shelf was covered in water each day. Though there is cable tv you will only get a handful of Brazilian channels (go out I guess). Finally check out is at 10 am which is just too early and though you can leave bags with the porters it would be better if checkout was 12.
Very good location. Apartment clean and modern. I recomend for others.

Localização excelente, próximo aos melhores restaurantes e bares do Leblon, supermercados, bancos, shopping, praia. Apartamento ventilado e espaçoso. a cama do quarto de casal é muito confortável. Uma pequena ressalva fica para o fato de o aparelho de ar-condicionado do segundo quarto de casal nao resfriar bem, e para o fato de o chuveiro estar com problema no botao que muda a temperatura da agua, estando sempre quente. Mas o resto foi perfeito! Super recomendo!!!!
It is a great apartment, great location and excellent personnel!
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Beautiful Place in the Middle of Manhattan
summary: Beautiful place only a couple blocks from main entrance of Central Park. Wishing walking distance to many attractions like Columbus Circle, Times Square, Met Museum, MOMA and many others. Great area with plenty of restaurants and shopping centers such as famous Bloomingdales. Subway stop only one avenue and one street away: N,Q,R,4,5,6 trains.
description: Beautiful place only a couple blocks from main entrance of Central Park. Wishing walking distance to many attractions like Columbus Circle, Times Square, Met Museum, MOMA and many others. Great area with plenty of restaurants and shopping centers such as famous Bloomingdales. Subway stop only one avenue and one street away: N,Q,R,4,5,6 trains. Central Park
neighborhood_overview: Central Park
house_rules: 1. NO smoking 2. NO outside guests 3. Please turn OFF air conditioning and light when you are not in a house 4. You are our FRIEND for everybody, not a guest from Airbnb. Thank you! 5. ENJOY YOUR STAY:)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: We are a married couple who loves to travel everywhere in the world. We love the outdoors and exploring unique places in our planet.

reviews.comments:
The apartment is way smaller than it looks in the photos and had a strong smell of cooking. 
The owners normally use it as their apartment so there is no wardrobe space etc. 
I didn't enjoy my time in the apartment.

We stayed here for 5 nights and really enjoyed our stay. Kate was our host, and she made sure that we felt very welcome and was available to answer any questions that we had. Checking  in and out was very easy. It has a great location and neighborhood.

The location of the apartment is fantastic but the space was even smaller than expected. Upon meeting the host, she was drinking water from a wine glass that she dumped out, did not clean, and oddly left on the counter. We also noticed that the wine glass was the only actual glass in the whole apartment aside from two mugs. Apart from the glasses issue, there was also no silverware. If we had decided to utilize the kitchen, we wouldn't have been able to do so. In addition, we were only given two towels for showering but no hand towels or washcloths. The internet didn't work all that well and we were told we could access Netflix, which we couldn't get running. All in all, if you are looking for a fairly inexpensive place to stay in a great neighborhood, this apartment is fine. In the end it was very bare bones and only provides a place to sleep.

Kate was really helpful when we arrived. It's very important to note that the place is small, which at the end didn't matter that much, but what really was something of big concern is that the place was not clean at all, there was no space for clothes, bathroom is super small, towels smell really bad. In summary it was a bad experience.

Great place and great people. 
Couldn't ask for anything more. 
Hospitality was great and we felt home. 
Thanks a lot and see you soon

Kate and Miguel were great from the beginning to the end. They responded to my emails promptly, Kate showed up when she said she would and didn't bother us when we were there. Very nice people! A+ The apartment is small just as they state in their listing and the bathroom is really tiny but if you just need a clean, safe place to sleep while in town it is perfect! Great for a get a way :)

This was our first booking with Airbnb and we were really pleased with how it all went. Kate was very welcoming and helpful and responded quickly if we had any queries during our stay. The apartment is very well located, clean, warm, cosy and comfortable. We felt it was very good value for money and it suited our purposes very well. It became a home from home for us.
Better than any hotel I have stayed at, very welcoming! Apartment was spotless. Kate was very helpful in places to eat and places to see that were near by.

Kate was super sweet and very accommodating. The location could not have been more amazing. There are quite a few restaurants and bodegas in the area, so it' easy to get things as needed. I was in town for a quick work trip, so I wasn't super concerned with space, which is limited, but the bedroom is a good size and comfortable. NY isn't exactly known for it's spacious living quarters. :)

All in all a great experience and would definitely stay again.
Un alojamiento estupendo,  muy bien ubicado, comodo y accesible para recorrer la ciudad. kate es muy amable y preocupada porque la estadía sea perfecta. Los mejores anfitriones

Miguel and kate's apartment is in a really good spot. quiet but close to transport. the apartment is small, smaller than it looks in the photo, but fine for the 2 of us. kate was easily contactable and prompt in responding to questions. I'd recommend their apartment to anyone looking for a cosy base to explore the city from.
Very comfortable, pleasant experience. I would definitely use this apartment again.

Its a very small place. 
Its not similar to the pictures that describe the apartment. 
Nice location.

Our host, Kate, was very responsive and thorough in her communication throughout our stay.  
The apartment was small but comfortable for 2 guests and very clean.  The building was quiet and secure.  The midtown location was very convenient and close to subway and bus transportation.
Great hosts, great location, affordable...highly recommend for a couple.

Muy buenos anfitriones, nos estaban esperando en el departamento apenas llegamos y nos explicaron todo. El departamento se encuentra muy bien ubicado, ya que al estar en el medio de NY, desde ahi se puede salir caminando o en subte para todo Manhattan. Un lugar para recomendar.

Miguel and his family were very nice and patient. My guest and I were behind schedule and missed check in. The space is small but cute.  More attention should be given to cleaning.  The fridge was dirty. The couch was dirty as well.  Underneath the couch cushions there was food crumbs and animal hair. The tv didnt work  either.

We greatly enjoyed our weekend stay at Miguel's apartment! Everything was clean and as it appears in the photos. The location is great - an easy walk to midtown, Central Park and numerous bars and restaurants. Miguel and Kate are very easy to communicate with so check in/out was very easy. Would recommend this apartment!

Perfect apartment for 2 people, me and my boyfriend spent an amazing time in NY and stayed at Miguel's apartment. AC in both rooms made a big difference. Quiet, clean, practical everything we needed!!

Tuvimos un contratiempo para llegar a horario y nos esperaron sin problemas para entregarnos las llaves. El departamento es tal cual como se describe en las fotos. Es ideal para dos personas. El baño es pequeño pero así es la generalidad en NY. En cuanto al barrio, la ubicación es muy buena, está cerca del subte que conecta todo NY, hay supermercados cerca, bares y la zona es segura.
Lovely little apartment, perfect for two people, location is great! Kate and Miguel are both lovely and really helpful, responded quickly to any questions, would definitely recommend, thanks!

Great Location and great place for couples or people traveling alone to NYC, it is 2 blocks to a subway station and there are a few places to eat on the corner.
There is a laundry like 2 blocks away in case you need it, also you can ask the host about anything and they will help you, they are very responsive

Miguel was incredibly accommodating and a really stellar host. Due to flight delays, we arrived in the city in the middle of the night. Miguel was flexible and stayed up so that we could get our keys at 2am. The apartment was clean and close to subway stops and Central Park - a fine jumping off pad for exploring the city. The bed was not particularly comfortable but we didn't come to New York to sleep. All in all, we were impressed by Miguel's commitment to providing a positive experience and for his excellent level of service and communication.
Kate and Miguel are great ! We checked in /out pretty late but Kate has done her best to suit us ! The flat is nice and clean ! we highly recommend !
They let us check in early. Kate was very nice and helpful. Apartment was as listed.

The apartement is at a great location. There are restaurants, shops and subway stations close by.
Everything was clean and neat. The bathroom is quite small, but works just fine. There even was a hairdryer to use.
Kate&Miguel are really nice and easy to get in touch with. They even gave us bad weather suggestions.
Definitely a recommendation if you look for a nice place to stay in NYC.
Very Nice flat for a few days in NY

Here in the center of the Upper East Side is a small, quiet apartment that offers privacy and easy access to UES life without the hassle of cabs and subways.  It is clean and had everything one needs to relax, rest up, and get out into the city.  The host Miguel and Kate treated me like and old friend giving me advice where to eat and helping me with my late arrival.  I really felt like I had the New York City experience staying in their home.  One last note: Their bedroom looks out on a courtyard, which allows tree-filtered light to flow into the apartment.  In addition, the courtyard provides a buffer so that it was so quiet that I almost overslept in the morning!  Thank you, Kate and Miguel.

Miguel and his wife were very accommodating with arrival and it was lovely little place, lovely bed and amenities. Area is midtown, safe and wonderful. Close to lots of food options and in the center of it all. Would highly recommend!

Superbe communication avec Kate & Miguel aussi bien avant le départ que pendant le séjour. Réponse quasi immédiate, ultra pratique lorsque l'on cherche quelque chose une fois sur NYC.
Accueil sur place un peu rapide ils semblaient pressés nous sommes arrivés vers 18h30, surement un peu tard. Par contre très arrangeants à l'arrivée comme au départ.
Confiance est le maître mot, et ça fait plaisir.
Appartement plutôt bien situé, à quelques pas de Central Park (5 à 10min à pieds), proche de toutes commodités (metro, taxis...). Un peu petit pour une famille je pense, nous étions 2. La salle de bain est très très petite, mais cela dit suffisante pour ce que nous avons à y faire. Pas de table de salle à manger nous avons dû improviser une table basse avec la table de chevet, plus pratique pour le petit déj'.
Appartement un peu vétuste à notre goût, propre mais il ne faut pas regarder dans la précision.
Ne comptez pas ranger vos vêtements dans les armoires elles sont pleines, comme si quelqu'un vivait vivait ici. Pas bien grave, pour 5 jours tout est resté dans les valises.
La chambre est grande et cosy, on s'y sent bien. Le lit est de bonne qualité.
Dans l'ensemble je recommanderais

Miguel's place was exactly what we wanted for our overnight stay in NYC! He and his wife were extremely communicative and accessible which made getting there a very smooth process. We ended up grabbing a bite at a place called The Jeffrey about a block away, it was a great gastropub. My wife and I absolutely recommend Miguel's place for your stay!

My fiance and I visited NYC for a few days and Miguel and Kate were very accommodating to our stay. Kate did a wonderful job welcoming us to the city and giving us recommendations on where to go and what to do. Miguel was quick to respond to my messages and was flexible on the checkout time. Great apartment that is close to central park and multiple subway stops. Highly recommend, and would stay here again!

The description of the place was very accurate. It is a cozy and clean apartment located in a nice area that is close to public transport, shops, and restaurants. Most significant was the exceptional kindness and hospitality of the hosts. They were extremely accommodating in my arrival and departure times. They also were very helpful in logistics, with great ideas on how to get around and feel at home in a city like New York. I will definitely stay there again when I return.

Miguel and Kate were great hosts who were very quick to answer questions and provided great recommendations for our visit! The cozy apartment was perfect for me and my mom. The bed was comfortable and the apartment was quiet. The neighborhood was in the perfect location for what we wanted to see/do. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone visiting NYC.
Perfect little apartment for a NYC getaway!

We loved staying @ Miguel and Kates apartment. Check in was a breeze. Communication was impeccable. They were both very kind and helped make our trip lovely. Miguel even mailed my jacket to me when my husband left it there by accident!

Мигель и Катя очень приветливые и дружелюбные ребята. В любое время ребята помогали нам советом,начиная от того где метро,как пройти до него,где купить продукты и где самые хорошие рестораны и магазины. Ребята встретили нас с шампанским! 
Квартира маленькая,но для Манхеттена это нормально. В туалете очень тесно,коленками упираешься в дверь. К вартире есть вся необходимая посуда и электроприборы. Нет обеденного стола. Нам приходилось кушать либо стоя,либо на пуфике. Нет стиральной машины. Соседи очень шумные. Звукоизоляции практически нет! Слышно всех. Постельное белье застиранное и пахнет. Было неприятно спать. Полотенце тоже не очень. Кровать не удобная.
В целом район спокойный,метро рядом,Катя очень отзывчивая и приветливая. Спасибо Вам.

Notre séjour chez Miguel s'est très bien passé. Nous nous sommes à peine croisés le soir de notre arrivée, mais sa compagne nous a attendu malgré notre retard. Le logement est confortable malgré la présence de bruit assez important dans la chambre. Il est également bien placé, nous le recommandons donc!

Location location location!!! Their place is central to everything!! I was able to get around New York very easily and Miguel and Kate were great host. They were flexible with my check in time and were very accommodating. Very cozy house and the main thing is that their place is so close and convenient to everything.

Miguel and Kate are very nice. Our flight was delayed around 1 hour to 11:00 pm, but they were still waiting for us to fetch the keys. And they allowed us to check out a couple of hours later for our convenience.
The apartment is cozy and warm. And the location is perfect. We'll definitely be here again in NY next time.
Miguel was great, very easy and fast communication with him. His home was cozy and clean.

The apt has everything you need, and it is very comfortable for 1-2 people. It's in a great location in the Upper East Side, close to basically anything you need or desire. Miguel was a wonderful host and answered all my questions. Overall it was an excellent experience.

Quaint space near Central Park and the river.  Close to many restaurants and close to the subway.  Clean place to stay and had mostly everything we needed.  Tiny bathroom but maybe that's expected in an NYC apt.  Overall, good experience!
I'd like to thank Miguel and his wife. Everything was great.
Perfect location for a week in NYC.  Close to everything.  Apartment was clean and perfect for 2 people to stay in.  Highly reccomend this place and the hosts were great!

Miguel was super communicative and check in was very smooth!
The room was a bit bigger and cleaner than I expected and the location was super super convenient and accessible to everywhere in Manhattan!

Miguel and Kate were wonderful hosts. They allowed us to check in early and check out late due to the given circumstances, and facilitated both in a very smooth manner. The apartment is exactly as you see it in the pictures, it is perfect for one or two people to stay for just the amount of time to endulge in all that New York City has to offer. Great location and good commodities. A slightly smaller bathroom than one would expect but it gets the job done. Would stay again and would recommend.
Great location.

Miguel y Kate fueron muy atentos y amables en todo momento, nos tocaron días fríos en NY y amablemente nos proporcionaron un pequeño calentador y una cobija extra. El departamento es pequeño pero con todo lo esencial, tal y como se ve en las fotos, a unos 5 min caminando se encuentran estaciones de metro, queda en una zona muy céntrica cerca de las principales atracciones de la ciudad.
We really enjoyed our stay at Miguel's. The location was perfect for all of our needs. Would recommend this and would stay again.
Great location, cozy placefor one or two people. Would stay again.

This was a typical New York apartment. The price was very reasonable for the excellent location. The best part about our stay was the location (can't be beat), and working with Miguel. He was very flexible with our arrival as our flight was delayed. He also was very quick with his response time to messages and concerns. The apartment itself was small, especially the bathroom. There was only room for one person to stand. The bathroom needed some freshening up of the space. A few cleaning items had been missed (dirty microwave that didn't appear to work, floors had not been swept and hair on the bed cover), but overall a nice basic place to sleep in a fantastic neighborhood.

Within walking distance from most of the great monuments and cityscapes of New York. Lovely location surrounded by great stores and restaurants, in a good neighbourhood. Flat was quaint, comfortable and well kept. Hosts kept in constant communication and were resourceful and welcoming. Overall a great find in the big city.

We (2 ppl) had a great stay at Miguel's apartment. The only reason I wouldn't give it 5 stars is because the bathroom is wayyyy smaller than described or the pictures showed. I expected it to be small with it being NYC, but most coat closets are more spacious than this bathroom. We ended up using the kitchen sink more than the bathroom sink. Luckily there were lots of mirrors so we could get ready outside of the bathroom. Other than that, it was very clean and quiet, and a short walk to the subway. The bed and pillows were very comfy, and Miguel was absolutely awesome with his communication. He accommodated a late check out that allowed us to explore more of the city before we left. If you are a solo traveler or a couple that wouldn't care about the bathroom, I would recommend this place!

Great compact holiday apartment on the fringe of Midtown/edge of Upper East side. Ideal base for those who want to be in Manhattan without being on Times Square! Miguel and his wife were great hosts and the apartment is clean and well presented. Would happily return. :)

Nice apartment. Hosts are friendly and flexible whenever possible (had to leave my luggage after check-out till my flight).
Had some street noise, so bring your ear plugs if you're a light sleeper, but I slept well.

This apartment is in a great location for those on a medium budget, who want to be close to Central Park, but away from the tourist traps of mid town. Plenty of restaurants and stores nearby, as well as reasonably (for NYC) priced parking garages.

The apartment itself is a typical NYC "1-bed" - tight, but functional. As two plus a baby we had enough space, but not much left over. The bathroom is particularly tight for people not used to NYC style living.

Miguel and his wife were exceptionally helpful and responsive both in advance and during our stay, including undertaking research re parking coupons.

The apartment is on a busy traffic (not fast traffic, but congested) street making access/egress by car slow, however there is space outside to stop and unload (at risk of a ticket, but we were quick and no problems).

Огромное спасибо Мигелю и особенно его жене Кате за радушный прием и прекрасную квартирку в отличном месте!!! Кстати Катя прекрасно говорит по- русски, что нам облегчило подготовку к поездке и прибывание в NYC!!! Thank You very much!!!
Excellent location, great communication and wonderful host.

This was exactly what my sister and I were looking for in our overnight trip to New York...we felt safe and comfortable. Miguel and his wife were great hosts - made sure we had everything we needed and even gave some guidance with using public transportation getting to/from.  Their space was affordable and adorable!  We would definitely travel this way again in the future :)
Good stay, small apartment but a good  and safe location

Place was absolutely practical and very well located. The bed is super comfortable and the peaceful view out the back bedroom windows makes for a great place to sleep. Just the right amount of city noise filters through. Bathroom is very small but had what we needed. Miguel was very attentive and available via text as needed. Woul love to stay again.

Miguel fue un gran anfitrión. Nuestro vuelo se atrasó mucho y no tuvo problemas para recibirnos fuera del horario pactado inicialmente. El apartamento es tal como muestran las fotos y estuvimos muy bien ahí. El baño es un poco chico, tal como se ve en las fotos. Por otro lado, hay que subir un piso por escaleras, que es un poco trabajoso con las valijas. En cuanto a la zona, está muy bien, cerca de la quinta avenida, de Central Park, etc. Resumiendo, es muy recomendable!
Miguel was very helpful in the entire process and made the entire stay more enjoyable!
Great location. Apartment as advertised - small, but very clean and well taken care of. My older mother stayed here alone for 2 nights and felt safe and comfortable.

It's a small apartment but I guess that's pretty standard for BYC. We did have everything we needed to spend one night. Walking distance to Central Park which is awesome! Parking could be expensive but again, it's NYC. We got lucky and found a spot on the street.

The apartment was very nice and convenient for our stay, great location and close to public transport to everywhere. Miguel and Kate were very nice and helpful. Perhaps the only  thing to mention is that the bathroom was smaller than expected, but it wasn't a problem. Thanks Miguel and Kate for receiving us!

My family and I had a great stay at Miguel's place. It was very clean and organized. The location is great, just few blocks from central park and 2 blocks of the subway station (yellow and green lines) so you could get around very easily. Miguel was an incredible host. It was very hot during my stay in NYC and he contacted me regarding the location of the AC. Also he was very accommodating in allowing me to leave my luggages on his place until later.
The place is small, as one can expect from NYC, but it is just perfect for those who want just to have a nice place to sleep. I'd definitely recommend his place and would come back again. Thanks a lot, Miguel!

Our time in NYC was very short so we could not talk face to face to Miguel. We spoke to his wife who helped us with everything we needed. They were very supportive (we could not check-in on the agreed time due to flight delay) and I am sure our stay in the city was much better because of them. The house is located in a nice place, about 10 minutes walking to Central Park. Thank you guys for everything.

Love staying here, it was a small lovely apartment very close to shops, diners, and a bit of night life places. Communication was super fast and very reliable. Miguel was very accommodating to changing my check in and check out time.

The location is excellent. The space is decent (size-wise), and clean.

Before booking, I informed the hosts that I have a foot injury the makes it very difficult for me to go down a staircase, so I asked if they could help me get my luggage down upon check out; they said it wouldn't be a problem.
Then the hosts and I had a miscommunication regarding check-out. I had to change the time a couple of times. I was told, in a somewhat defensive matter, that I wouldn't get help with my luggage anymore since the person who was gonna help me had been waiting around for me since earlier.
However, when I opened the door the person was coming up the stairs, so they were able to help me regardless. Everything turned out fine, but i was made to feel very uncomfortable by the prospect of getting my luggage downstairs alone, which would have been quite dangerous.

The apt is in a quiet neighbourhood very close to subway (just two blocks), all around there are restaurant, coffee shop, and retail brands like Sephora, Victoria Secret and much more. The apt is very clean and minimal, with an AC perfectly working, at second floor without elevator. Bathroom is very very small and this could be a problem for strong people like me :D
In general it was a great stay and Miguel replied to my questions very quickly, I recommend this place, absolutely.
Great little place to stay. The apartment was spotless and exactly as described. Miguel was extremely helpful and had great communication.
Amazing place with a great host. Very accommodating and responsive! Good location!

The hosts were extremely easy to work with and responded to us vey quickly when necessary.  Definitely a place to consider if you are planning a trip to New York.  They were able to help accommodate our special requests which was greatly appreciated.
Very comfortable and safe apartment in a great location.  Miguel is very personable and communicative, he answered all of my questions very quickly.  I hope to visit again soon!

Miguel's place is small but not really for NY standards.  It is very comfortable and clean. Location is great and for the price you can't beat it. I also asked for an extension upon check out for an extra hour and they happily accommodated us.

Miguel and Kate's place on the upper east side is the perfect location for getting around New York. It was walking distance to Central Park, Madison av, Park av, Bloomingdales and even Rockefeller if you felt like it (probably 45 mins or so). Subway and groceries at Whole Foods was convenient. 

The apartment is small but not knowing what to compare to in New York I assume it is fairly standard. It was safe and quiet even with construction out front. We had a 10month old with us and the floor boards were creaky which made it a little difficult to do anything without waking her up while asleep as in such close confines. Bench space and cupboard space in the kitchen were limited also but manageable. 

The hosts were easy to contact and let us leave our bags on check our day.
Miguel was a great host and went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable while staying at his place. He and his wife are great people. Highly recommended!
Very cute NY apt.  Location is great but there are stairs to climb.  No problem with noise and felt very safe.  We only stayed one night so the price and size were perfect for my husband and I.

My husband and I stayed at Miguel's apartment for 2 nights and we couldn't have been happier with our choice! The apartment was clean, in the perfect location (in my opinion), and was just the right size for two people. They also had an AC unit which we greatly appreciated! The building/street was quiet and it was easy to fall asleep at night. We were very comfortable here!  Also, the location was right where we wanted to be! We were so close to Central Park that we ran it every morning and it was also super convenient to be so close to the subway! Miguel and his wife also provided us with wonderful recommendations for restaurants and were always quick to respond to any questions we had. We enjoyed their apartment, hospitality, and would absolutely stay here again!

Miguel’s place is nice and clean. The location is great. We walked around neighborhood and visited some great restaurants. Miguel and his wife are easy to communicate and they responded quickly. I highly recommend this place if you are planning to visit NYC.
I had a great time staying at this apartment. It is very clean and the hosts are extremely friendly and helpful. A great area and easy to walk to the Subway and Central Park.
Close to Central Park and a river walk! Also close to public transportation and pharmacies/convenience stores. Fairly quiet neighborhood. Miguel always responded in a timely manner!

Miguel and his wife were very responsive via text, and was flexible to accommodate our schedule. The place was cozy but had everything you might need. We didn't spend much time there because it was perfectly located, about a 5 minute walk to multiple subway lines. Would definitely recommend Miguel's spot!

This was our first time using Air BnB and our stay at Miguels place was a good first experience. After a wander around the area, we found it felt very safe with plenty for restaurants, laundrettes and shops for amenities. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom was small but fine and Miguel and Kate were very helpful and responded quickly to messages. For us the location was it's greatest asset, it's just a short subway ride to everything touristy in Manhattan. We would definitely recommend Miguels place.
A cute small apartment in a excellent location!
The hower of migules avilibility very limited and the bathroom very very poor acept that averything o.k
Perfect for a short trip, since you don‘t spend a lot of time at the apartment. I would probably not stay there for more then 3 nights.
Fueron súper amables con nosotros. Se puede ir andando al Midtown de la ciudad y dispone de todos los servicios cerca. El apartamento es muy bonito.

Miguel's place was great for our quick stay in the city. Great neighborhood and convenient to the event we were attending as well. Communication with Miguel and his wife was excellent as well. Thank you!

Muy bien situado y muy práctico. Las fotos son exactamente iguales que las de las web. El apartamento en si, es pequeño pero más que suficiente para lo que es. 
Totalmente recomendable.

First of all: all communication with Miguel & Kate was fabulous. They answered quickly and were very attentive. I didn't get a chance to meet Miguel, but Kate was very nice, and even helped me get my suitcase upstairs. (Thank you!). Several reviews here are noting this apartment's proximity to Central Park, which ismisleading. If that is important to you, look at a map, you'll see it's not close to the Park. It was very clean and is situated in the back of the building, so was very quiet. It is closer to 2nd Ave. than 1st. Nearest Subway station is at 59th & 3rd. Cross-town bus @ 57th. There's a Whole Foods on 57th btn. 2nd & 3rd, and a Starbucks on 3rd btn. 60th & 61st. I have only 2 suggestions for the lovely hosts. #1: It would be nice if the kitchenette came equipped with a roll of paper towels. #2: I lived in NYC on and off for 20 years, so I know "the lay of the land, as it were. But if you do NOT, things can be a little confusing. It would be GREAT, if there was, for example, a binder with some orientation details....like where the nearest subway stops are, grocery stores, etc. The hosts do provide some maps and brochures, but those are somewhat haphazard. Something more detailed would, I think, be appreciated by anyone who really is new to NYC. Other than those 2 SMALL details, the stay was great! Thank you so much!
Thanks for a great stay, the bed is super comfortable and the location is amazing!

Great location to explore NYC! The space is fine for NY standards and Miguel was very responsive! The bathroom could be a bit cleaner, but we were supplied with fresh towels and linnen during our stay.

My wife and I stayed at Miguel's place this weekend and had a good overall experience.  Communication and check in were very easy.  Miguel was friendly. 
 The place was about as we expected - quite small, but clean.  Bed (& pillows) were quite comfortable and it was easy to sleep, as it's in a quiet section of the city.  Very convenient to nice restaurants, stores, and Central Park.  Also was walking distance to the conference I was attending at Mt. Sinai West.
Thanks Miguel!
It was a lovely place!

Perfect size, price, location, style and hosts!!  Loved it!  Will be back!!   
Leslie & Jamie  Nov. 2017

My wife and I had a wonderful time in New York while staying at Miguel's place! It was clean and walking distance to 5th Ave, Central Park, food, and nightlife! Miguel and his wife were great hosts that responded quickly to questions and even provided tips and suggestions during our stay. We would recommend to any couple traveling to the Big Apple!

Apartamento muy bien ubicado,cerca de central Park.
Muchos restaurantes y bares alrededor del apartamento

Miguel's place was spot on! Small apartment just a block or so away from Central Park and 5th avenue! If you're looking for a place good for value and close to everything this is it! Miguel was quick to respond and was there to greet on arrival. Great location in the upper east side
Miguel was a wonderful host and went out of his way to make sure our stay was enjoyable!
Very clean comfortable apartment. Host good with communication. Great places to eat nearby highly recommend Mediterrano.
Great location and great place.

Miguel is a great host. Very helpful, with quick answers, solutions and always very kind. 
Him and his wife made us feel very welcomed.
The apartment is very clean and in a great location, close to many stores, restaurants and the subway.
Excellent location with a very friendly and responsive host.  Very private.

Miguel's place is really good value for money, especially for an apartment within DC. It is well located, with easy access to the metro. Miguel was easy to communicate with and I would definitely recommend staying at this place.

Miguel and Kate were quick to respond to our inquiries and checkin and checkout was very easy.  They accommodated us at checkout letting us leave our luggage a few extra hours as our flight left later. Their place is tidy and close to the subway. The bed is comfortable but only a double size.  WholeFoods is near by and it is about a 10 minute walk to Central Park.
Amazing Placea with wonderful Owners!
A fantastic place to stay for a short trip in NYC. Great location with everything you need. Miguel is a great host.
Miguel's place is clean, well located and perfect for a short trip to New York. He and wife are excellent hosts and arevery easy to communicate with.

El departamento es súper chico, pero más que suficiente, teniendo en cuenta que es Manhattan( uno de los mts2 más caros del mundo). El edificio no es moderno, pero está muy bien. La gente del edificio es muy amable. Esta muy bien ubicado. La zona es tranquila. Llegas a todos lados rápido a pie o en el metro.  Miguel siempre estuvo atento a nuestras necesidades y haciéndonos recomendaciones. Siempre tuvo una rápida respuesta. Volveríamos una y mil veces.
This is an AWESOME place in NYC! Soak in everything that the city has to offer while enjoying the comfort of a quiet and secluded apartment in the UES for sleeping. Would highly recommend!
Miguel and his wife were wonderful hosts! Friendly and quick to respond. The location was great. A few blocks from Central Park and walking distance to fun restaurants

My daughter and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Miguel's place. Though not as quiet as our residential home, by NYC standards it was quiet and the neighborhood was very safe. They were very flexible with our arrival time. It is about a 5-10 minute walk to a couple of subway lines. Great value.
Nice apartment for 1-2 persons with great access to subways and local hospitals. Hosts very kind and accommodating.

This apartment is in a great location. Miguel and Katrina were super-responsive and the apartment, while small, was perfect for our stay. Most important to me - it was clean and well kept! Would definitely stay again.
Great place for two people to spend 3 nights while exploring the city during the day!
My boyfriend and I had a great stay at Miguel’s place! Super convenient location and friendly, hospitable hosts - what more can you ask for?
It was a great place! Miguel has a beautiful home! In such a great area and great restaurants around it!

Great place overall: within walking distance to central park, 5th Avenue, and to midtown Manhattan in general. Many bars and restaurants around (especially 2nd Ave at 70's). Furthermore, the place is really comfortable and clean, and Miguel is always willing to help in anything, be it local tips or with "practical" information. As we said, great overall!!

Great location, great hosts. Clean simple apartment.

Like most AIRBNB's in Manhattan, the apartment was very small, but that is to be expected for the price which is hard to beat.

We'd go back there next time we're in NYC.

This was our first time visiting NYC. Miguel and his wife are seriously the best! We were so delayed traveling from Arizona to NY, and attempting to navigate public transportation in the city as first-timers unfortunately caused us to be much later than anticipated. Miguel’s wife stayed there (for like 2 hours!!) to let us in and show us around, and we were so grateful for that! They gave great recommendations! The apartment was so comfortable and felt very homey. I highly recommend this spot if you are looking to be centrally located and wanting a friendly comfortable vibe! Thanks y’all! We’ll be back!
Great location to and from the airport. Close to two subway stations and lots of restaurants.  10 minute walk to Central Park.
Loved Miguel's place! Very clean and great location. Miguel and his wife were super responsive with any questions I had.  Would stay here again!
Great little apartment. Miguel was very helpful to us. Highly recommend.

We had such a lovely stay here in New York. Flat was clean and in a great location - right near the metro and walking distance to some great bars. Communication was clear and quick - couldn't have asked for more. We'll be back

Miguel and Katerina are very helpful and responsive. There apartment is right in the heart of the lower eastside and close to most things in Manhattan! If you want the New York experience this is the apartment for no more than 2 people!
Great little place to stay in NYC. Very central with lots of bars, restaurants and shops nearby. Miguel and his wife were great hosts and checking in was easy.

A compact apartment in a great area of Manhattan. If you just need a place to sleep, this is fine place, but do not expect to be able to eat in, if you have any mobility issues, you will struggle to use the shower. No lift and this is up one floor and steps up from street level.

We were so pleased with our stay at Miguel's place.  He was so helpful with tips around the neighborhood and answered any questions very quickly.  The location was fantastic and so close to the subway.  We were truly thrilled with our stay.  It's very cozy, but just what we needed as a landing place for our busy two weeks in NYC.
Miguel was great—easy check-in and easy communication. Great location and comfy apartment—we enjoyed our stay!

The appartement is located very good in the south part of the upper east side. Several subway lines are located nearby. The bathroom (especially the shower) is small. All in all it is a very good New York appartement.
Miguel’s place was perfect for a weekend trip for two! Thank you!

My mom and I stayed at Miguel's to celebrate her 60th birthday in NYC. My mom has limited Airbnb experience so its always nice when it exceeds her expectations (its my travel lodging preference). It was in a great location - close to public transport, easy to get around and felt safe while walking later in the evening. Miguel's place was exactly as described. Thank you Miguel for your hospitality, quick communication and helpful tips!

Miguel was a great host. He had various local tips to better our stay and overall trip. The location of his place was nearly perfect and it was a safe, friendly, and clean stay. I would highly recommend.
Great location and helpful host!
Thanks Miguel for a wonderful experience in New York, happy to be able to return in another opportunity as we loved everything.

Good place and value for the city, but hosts could do a little more to fulfill the expectations as far as cleanliness. I wouldn't say dirty, but "lived in" (Clothes, stuff, and dirty shower curtain). It was good not great.
Miguel was great host. Check-in and check-out were easy. Apartment location was great - a few blocks away from subway.

We had a great stay in Miguel’s apartment. It’s in a great location with lots of restaurants on the doorstep and walking distance to some of the major sights. The apartment was clean and the bedroom and living area were spacious, however the bathroom is on the small side. Miguel kindly met us at check in and sent through some local restaurant/sightseeing tips which was very helpful. Overall the apartment was ideal for our short break in NYC. Thanks again Miguel!

Miguel's comfortable  apartment is very well situated near central park halfway between 30rock and the museum mile.

Miguel gave us some good recommendations and was very reactive answering messages.
Phenomenal location on the upper east side, close to Central Park, bars, restaurants and only 2 blocks from the subway to enjoy the entire city!

Miguel's place have a really good location. Around 15min walk from Central Park. Since the booking, Miguel have an extremely good communication. The check-in was really easy and he waited for us to welcome us (we had delayed flight but Miguel waited to show his place-thank you)  He give us good tips and the wifi work really well. The appartment was really functional for 2 persons. There are also soap and shampoo. I will definitely coming back again. Thank you!
Awesome place!
Clean place. Very responsive!
Great host and a place to stay!
Cool little apartment with a very comfy bed and a chill atmosphere! Very close to Central Park and Times Square, literally within walking distance:)

Miguel is a friendly and responsive host. The place is basic, clean, and well located for the East River, Central Park, MOMA etc. The apartment is up two short flights of stairs. It's a quiet apartment block and I felt safe.  There are lots of good bars and restaurants nearby (I particularly liked the Upper East Cafe on 3rd near E.62nd). The place is pretty reasonable value for money in terms of space, compared with a budget hotel. There were some kitchen basics missing  but Miguel supplied some of them the following day (though it was a creative challenge to eat breakfast yoghurt with no spoon!). There's a homey leather sofa in the living space, and a large screen TV with Netflix etc. Be prepared: the shower room is tiny and pretty shabby but it is clean, and the water pressure is good.  I think this would be a good crash pad for a weekend  in NYC, when you are eating out etc. I needed to use the place also to work - and it didn't really work out for me as the work space wasn't very well thought-through or adequate. With hindsight I should have asked for clarification, as this was important for me. If you are going in Summer, it would be worth asking Miguel for a fan for the bedroom, as the air con unit serves the living space and doesn't make much of an impact on the temperature in the bedroom.
Great stay!
Great stay! Miguel’s place was clean, comfortable, and in a fantastic part of town. As a host, Miguel was very responsive and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.

Great location and excellent communication from the host. The apartment is smaller than  the photos depict, especially the bathroom/toilet which has very little movement room. However despite this the apartment had all we needed. There are great transport connections nearby, it's close to Central Park, and please try of cafes, restaurants, bars, laundromats within a few mins walk. 
The bed is also quite short, most people would be fine but anyone nearing 5'10" might have some dangling feet.

Miguel's place was great. Very convenient and comfortable for exploring Manhattan. The location was amazing and Miguel was great to communicate with and gave us some amazing tips on where to eat and drink in the neighborhood. If you're looking for a clean and comfortable space to explore the city from, this is a great option.
Place was in a great location and the response time from Miguel was so great. Our train into the city arrived late and he made sure to accommodate us. Perfect place was a night in the city.
Alles is aanwezig in het tweekamerappartement, een goede basis om de stad in te gaan, maar de ruimte zelf maakt niet vrolijk.
Miguel offers accommodations in a terrific locations.   He and his wife were quick to communicate to our questions.
Just as described- great location and fantastic quick communication from Miguel to all my questions! Many thanks
A nice place for a great time in NY. The Bathroom ist really small, but it is not a problem for a citytrip. The communication with Miguel was suoer super friendly!!

We only stayed here for a little under 24 hours, but it was the perfect price point for what we needed! We were greeted by a friend of the family, and he was super nice and welcoming. Loved the tips the hosts sent; we did check out the shops and restaurants in the Plaza Hotel. Everything was easy and we were close to some cool places!

Miguel was very responsive and provided me with lots of insight of the area.  Place was very clean and had all the amenities of a home.  Location of this place is perfect for what I was here for.. NYM.  Thank you again for the great hospitality.

Miguel is a friendly and responsive host. The place is basic, clean, and well located. He accommodated the check-in time to fit in my schedule. Easy check out as well. The apartment is located on the 2nd floor with no elevator.

New York itself the apartments are going to be small. Miguel's place wasn't bad. its a good enough space for no more than 2 people. I wish it was cleaner. the check in process wasn't that great. I had to meet the cleaning lady and she changed the address 3-4 times and it took us forever to get to the apartment because of that.
Miguel is highly responsive and we really enjoyed our time in Manhattan!
Miguel's place was great- very convenient location, and he was very responsive!

In general our stay was perfect. Miguel was responding quick and was flexible with check-in and check-out times. We stayed only for 1 night and location was great. The only minus was that we couldn’t make TV and coffee machine work.

The place was great and exactly as described. Quick walk to the 59/Lex subway stop. A couple cool bars in the area: Milk and Hop Ramen Bar and the The Jeffrey have great beer selections and a 24hr Duane Reade is 2 blocks away. Bathroom was small and shower super tight but that's what you get with a NYC apartment.

We spent a night at Miguel's Airbnb for our short honeymoon in NYC this past weekend. The only thing I regret is that we didn't stay more nights! We already plan to book again for our first wedding anniversary and both my husband and I were extremely pleased with the accommodations, efforts to satisfy, and extra helpful and informative tips provided by Miguel!

The space is much smaller and older than the photos, but still very nice. It's a great location and quiet building.  Miguel was great with communication and very flexible with us when it came to checking in and running behind. He gave us helpful tips for nearby places and some hot spots if we wanted. I would definitely recommend the space.

Our stay was amazing! Miguel responded quickly to every response we had as well as sent us tips and his favorite places around the city. I would definitely stay here again the value and location are both awesome.
A small but good location for New York. Good for couples visiting nyc.

Miguel was a great host, super helpful and responded very quickly. The apartment is great for the location and exactly as described. Great place to stay in UES. Close to great cafés, bars and restaurants and neighborhood was safe. Would recommend.
Beautiful spot close to public transportation and great bagels
Great place in great location for experiencing Upper Manhatten. Miguel’s hospitality is way and beyond, and he replies very quickly. Safe and trouble free! Will book again in NYC!

Great location and Miguel is excellent - full of tips and useful advice.

The apartment is perfect for a couple. As other reviews mention the bathroom is on the small side but that’s clear up front and we didn’t see it as an issue.

Would recommend to friends!
very good hosts, good and quick communication, excellent location and good size for NY. Would be good to have at least a small table and a chair. Bathroom extremely tiny.
Miguel and Ekaterina were very welcoming and helpful! Their place is lovely, very big for a NY apartment, and convenient to everywhere on the East Side.
Very nice loft. Very clean. Hosts were extremely accommodating. Highly recommend.
Great location - private - quiet. Just steps away from the hustle and bustle you’ll certainly enjoy your stay and the extra mile from these great hosts!
A great place to stay!

name: Quarry Bay fully furnished studio C
summary: Newly renovated studio flat with full furniture.
description: Newly renovated studio flat with full furniture.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 就是日用品不齐其他没有任何问题

Cat is a great host and will reply as soon as she can. Communication was very easy.

The room I stayed in was a bit smaller than I thought but was really all I needed. Metro station is very close by and the location is very secure. The building itself is old but I loved it.
Cat was very helpful for our arrival and stay.
The building itself is old and the room is hard to find, but very good communication and good value considering the new year season!

name: Duplex com vista para o J. Botanico
summary: O apartamento é amplo e localizado em rua tranquila na Zona Sul do Rio e vista para o verde. A 3 quarteirões da Lagoa e a 20 minutos a pé da praia do Leblon. Tem terraço amplo com churrasqueira portátil e chuveirão perfeitos para os dias de verão.
space: O apartamento fica em prédio antigo e é muito silencioso. Tem porteiro durante o dia e o bairro é muito seguro. Ao lado de varios pontos turisticos como o Jardim botanico, Parque lage, Lagoa e vista chinesa. Além das lindas cachoeiras do Horto.
description: O apartamento é amplo e localizado em rua tranquila na Zona Sul do Rio e vista para o verde. A 3 quarteirões da Lagoa e a 20 minutos a pé da praia do Leblon. Tem terraço amplo com churrasqueira portátil e chuveirão perfeitos para os dias de verão. O apartamento fica em prédio antigo e é muito silencioso. Tem porteiro durante o dia e o bairro é muito seguro. Ao lado de varios pontos turisticos como o Jardim botanico, Parque lage, Lagoa e vista chinesa. Além das lindas cachoeiras do Horto. Muito silencioso e iluminado. A cozinha é perfeitamente equipada. O banheiro da suite principal tem chuveiro duplo. Infelizmente estarei viajando mas deixarei um telefone de uma pessoa que poderá ajudar caso haja algum problema. A rua tem restaurantes e lojas descoladas e de luxo. Virando a esquina encontra-se a movimentada Av Jardim Botânico com farmácia 24 hrs, mercados e bancos. Além de ponto de onibus do metrô. Na rua ao lado está o Parque Jardim Botânico  e a 3 quadras a Lagoa. Eu amo esse bairro.
neighborhood_overview: A rua tem restaurantes e lojas descoladas e de luxo. Virando a esquina encontra-se a movimentada Av Jardim Botânico com farmácia 24 hrs, mercados e bancos. Além de ponto de onibus do metrô. Na rua ao lado está o Parque Jardim Botânico  e a 3 quadras a Lagoa. Eu amo esse bairro.
notes: Temos 2 suites com cama de casal, um sofá cama de casal e dois colchões.
access: Muito silencioso e iluminado. A cozinha é perfeitamente equipada. O banheiro da suite principal tem chuveiro duplo.
interaction: Infelizmente estarei viajando mas deixarei um telefone de uma pessoa que poderá ajudar caso haja algum problema.
house_rules: Proibido festas. Meu terraço tem plantas, e elas precisam muito de agua a noite por causa do verão. Se não for um transtorno, agradeço a quem puder rega-las.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Tudo ocorreu perfeitamente! Desde a negociação dos dias de estadia até o momento da entrega das chaves. A anfitriã sempre esteve à disposição para tirar todas as dúvidas, a localização é muito agradável. O duplex é muito espaçoso, a suíte principal é bem grande e confortável. Enfim, recomendo à todos que estiverem procurando uma estadia no RJ que procurem a Mah.

name: Brand New Luxury Downtown Studio
summary: Perfectly located on the very famous Crescent street in the heart of the city, this brand new, luxurious and modern studio on the 9th floor of a style building is luminous, very pleasant, safe, quiet and clean.
space: Perfectly located on the very famous Crescent street in the heart of the city, this brand new and luxury studio on the 9th floor of a style building is luminous, very pleasant, safe, quiet and clean. Modern furnishing, 1 room with a queen size bed, open kitchen and a bathroom. Washer and dryer in the studio. Small balcony. Gym in the building. At the corner of St Catherine street with all the stores, boutiques, cafés, bars and restaurants you can imagine. 2 minute walk from Montreal most famous Museum: Montreal Museum of Fine Arts, Apple Store, Starbucks, Zara, etc. Walking distance from 2 metro stations (Peel and Lucien-L’Allier) and buses stations. Close from Bell Centre. Perfect for a couple or one person.
description: Perfectly located on the very famous Crescent street in the heart of the city, this brand new, luxurious and modern studio on the 9th floor of a style building is luminous, very pleasant, safe, quiet and clean. Perfectly located on the very famous Crescent street in the heart of the city, this brand new and luxury studio on the 9th floor of a style building is luminous, very pleasant, safe, quiet and clean. Modern furnishing, 1 room with a queen size bed, open kitchen and a bathroom. Washer and dryer in the studio. Small balcony. Gym in the building. At the corner of St Catherine street with all the stores, boutiques, cafés, bars and restaurants you can imagine. 2 minute walk from Montreal most famous Museum: Montreal Museum of Fine Arts, Apple Store, Starbucks, Zara, etc. Walking distance from 2 metro stations (Peel and Lucien-L’Allier) and buses stations. Close from Bell Centre. Perfect for a couple or one person.
house_rules: Respectful of the place, the furniture and the neighbors.

reviews.comments: Benjamin was very hospitable. He met my girlfriend and I when we arrived, and he was easy to communicate with while finding parking. He provided great suggestions for things to do and see in the city. This place is very cozy, centrally located, and the perfect spot for a great stay in Montreal! Thanks!

Benjamin was a lovely host. This was my first time instant booking and I have to admit I was a little nervous initially because I didn't get a reply until the third day after initial message. But it turns out it was a minor miscommunication, and communication onwards was pretty good. The fiancé and I had stayed 3 days/ 2 nights & enjoyed ourselves. The apartment was easily commutable from the airport, conveniently located for shopping and food, modern and well stocked with supplies. We had arrived earlier then our check in time and Benjamin met up with us to take our bags until it was time to check in, very nice gesture and saved us from lugging our bags in the snow! Would definitely stay here again. Thanks again Benjamin!!!

Ben was great. Was patient even when I was late and quick to respond to any text messages.

The unit was awesome. Very clean and spacious and little amenities (like coffee) were at my disposal as well.
Nosso anfitrião Benjamin foi perfeito , cumprindo tudo o que havíamos acordado , dos horários de check-in e check-out às detalhadas explicações sobre o apartamento.

Great experience over all! Benjamin was super nice and helpful with everything.  He made great suggestions on places to check out in the area which was nice. The place was super cozy and awesome, the listening is very accurate and I would recommend anyone looking to check out downtown Montreal to stay here!

We use Airbnb often, but our stay at Benjamin's apartment is one of our best experiences. The unit is clean, beautiful and well equipped. The bed is very comfortable. The shower is fantastic. It is in a very nice building in a convenient part of downtown Montreal. Benjamin is the perfect host, very accommodating.

This is a perfect location, right near the Bell Centre! Ben was waiting for us upon arrival and showed us to the unit. The unit had everything we needed and our stay couldn't have been better. Thanks for everything!

I stayed at this lovely studio with my best friend for 6 days! We absolutely loved it! It was very  clean and had a nice kitchenette, saving us a LOT of money because we were able to cook some delicious meals and eat out less. On another yummy note, there are a bunch of coffee shops, pubs, bars, and outlet stores all with in a couples blocks of this studio's location on rue Crescent. We enjoyed getting a morning crepe or croissant from Paris Crepe right down at the end of the block once or twice! It's also a cheap cab ride away for rue saint Laurent if your looking to take part in Montréal's vibrant night life. My friend and I both like to walk so we did walked to both Old Montréal and Mount Royal on two separate days. However, if you're less keen on walking a couple miles for some good and fun exercise and get to know the city a bit, the metro station is just a block or two away. It's super easy to get around the city via public transportation especially from this apartment! I'd recommend this listing to anyone who's looking for a good central location to explore Montréal! C'est manifique!
Très joli appartement, très confortable et bien situé, très propre, conforme aux photos.  Benjamin a été très accueillant et sympathique.
Benjamin's home was beautiful and he was very accommodating! A convenient location and refreshing apartment made for a lovely experience.

Ben was an excellent host. He was very easy to communicate from the beginning of my book, and answered all the questions I had promptly. Ben welcomed me at the property, walked through the place, and recommended several places to visit in Montreal. 

Property is very clean and well maintained. It's located in downtown and served as a great access points to all the places I visited. A great experience and I would not hesitate to book again with Ben.

The listing was accurate, the host was kind and accommodating, the space clean & modern. The location of this property is central to the downtown core and near all required amenities (Starbucks, pharmacy, metro, restaurants, shopping, nightlife, pub). Highly recommend.

Outstanding experience! The apartment is very well located,  close to nice restaurants, Starbucks, shops, pubs and public transport. The apartment is great, very well equipped, beautiful space, nice kitchen, beautiful bathroom with rainshower. We would highly recommend this apartment to everyone!

We had an excellent visit at Benjamin's studio apartment! Benjamin was very friendly and easy to deal with and met us as soon as we arrived to the studio. The studio was exactly as pictured, beautiful, clean and in a great location. I would recommend this to anyone visiting Montreal!

Our first Airbnb experience was fantastic. This apartment is everything you see in the pictures: simple, modern and functional! 

The location is also awesome. Close to so many restaurants and shopping. All forms of transportation are at your doorstep as well. (PS check out the Burger Bar! Best burger ever!)

Benjamin was accommodating with flexible check in and check out times, which was uber convenient. He is also a super nice person and made the experience very comfortable. 

Highly recommend this accommodation!

I spent two weeks in Benjamin's loft style condo. It was in a perfect location to all the shopping, many restaurants, Old Montreal and Mount Royal.  It is located between two metro stops on the green line and close to a metro stop on the orange line.  
We had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.  Cooking utensils, a few condiment basics and coffee/maker.
Everything in the loft was clean and well organized.  Washer/dryer and iron/ironing board came in handy.
I would not hesitate to stay here again and would highly recommend it to anyone coming to Montreal.
Benjamin was quick to respond and very accommodating.  Thanks for a wonderful stay in Montreal!

Benjamin was a phenomenal host! He was very flexible with our schedule to meet us upon arrival as well as check out. His place is pristine! Exactly as pictured and a great location. 10/10 would absolutely stay here again.

Benjamin is an amazing host, very flexible with our schedule, always attentive and considerate, being very helpful on our first time using Airbnb and making our stay in Montreal very pleasant and enjoyable. The condo is just what we wanted for our trip, great location, close to 2 metro stations and walking distance to many restaurants and shops. In summary, an outstanding experience, totally recommended!!

Awesome place in an awesome city. The apartment was immaculate. The building is brand new. It was a spacious studio that was very comfortable for my fiancé and I. It came stocked with most of the normal living amenities from laundry detergent and trash bags to paper towels and olive oil. There was even a little coffee maker that I used every morning. Although there is an outstanding coffee spot Cafe Myriade just a couple blocks over that I highly recommend. Ben was great, always responsive and very out of the picture. It felt very much like a hotel experience (which is what we were looking for) at a fraction of the price.

The area felt extremely safe even late at night. It is at the intersection of a street of bars/pubs/clubs and the most high foot traffic shopping street in the city. It is central to everything. The 2 main subway lines are just a few blocks away. This is the ideal location for your first time in Montreal. Walking distance from Mount Royal.

Benjamin's apartment was the perfect location in relation to the center of downtown Montreal. It was just far enough up the block that the business of the downtown streets didn't cause noise and close enough to walk EVERYWHERE! His apartment was immaculate and well stocked, and the bed was super comfortable. Wifi was easily accessible and the t.v. was very straight forward. The bathroom had everything you would need for a couple nights stay.

Benjamin was a great host, he meet us there  exactly when he said he would,  and communicated and checked up on us ( text) throughout our stay making sure we didn't need anything else. he was a great host and if ever back in Montreal we will definitely stay here again
Beautiful place and terrific host.

Benjamin nous a accueilli le jour de notre arrivée pour nous présenter le studio qui est conforme aux photos, de plus il est très bien situé dans Montréal. Je recommande vivement Benjamin et son studio. Équipements au top, et impeccable niveau propreté.

Benjamin's place was perfect! The apartment was clean, well-equipped with everything we needed, and super close to great restaurants and shopping. The balcony was a nice feature as well. The gym downstairs is also very clean and was easy to access. If you are driving into Montréal, there is a parking lot a few steps away from the apartment, but it can get a bit expensive if you leave the car for more than an hour or so. Benjamin was a great host and was very flexible about check-in and check-out times. I would definitely rent from him again.

Benjamin was a great host! He was very flexible with our schedule and meeting times. The apartment is exactly as shown in pictures which is great. It was very clean, comfortable, and everything we needed. It's located right beside Ste Catherine St which is great for walking and exploring Montreal. We really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend it to everyone.

L'appartement de Benjamin est absolument fantastique et je le recommande sans aucune réserve. Il est extrêmement bien situé (en plein coeur de Montréal: vous pourrez aller partout à pieds ou en vélo), il est aussi décoré avec beaucoup de goût et est très propre (ce qui est d'une importance capitale). Son appartement est également plus grand en vrai qu'il ne paraît sur les photos: d'une taille idéale pour deux personnes. Tout est neuf et l'appartement dispose de tous les équipements qui faciliteront votre séjour (que ce soit dans la cuisine ou dans la salle de bain ou encore la connexion internet). Son appartement a largement contribué à rendre notre séjour agréable. Je le remercie également pour sa grande disponibilité lors de notre arrivée puis lors du séjour. Enfin, l'appartement est d'un rapport qualité/prix imbattable. Ne cherchez pas plus et réservez le: c'est comme un hôtel en bien mieux!
For english speakers, in one word: fantastic. Do not hesitate to book it, benjamin's apartment is absolutely marvelous. 
Encore un grand merci à Benjamin!

Benjamin's place was exactly as described through AirBnB and in his pictures.  Benjamin gave us great tips of things to see in the city, which was very walkable if you are up for a nice stroll.  Even the rainy weather couldn't prevent us from having a great stay.  I would highly recommend staying here and would do so again when I make it back to Montreal.  Thanks Benjamin!

9th floor modern and new appartment! Everything was very clean and it is excellent located!
Benjamin came quite late to check us in! Very nice!!

Excellent apartment, right in the middle of downtown and within easy reach of so many different neighbourhoods and districts. The balcony was especially great for a stay during the summer.

Communication with Benjamin was excellent and he made everything very easy.

Would recommend host an the apartment.

Would definitely stay here again and recommend Benjamin's place. He was was very accommodating when we needed to store our luggage for a few extra hours as the second place we were checking into couldn't get us in earlier. It was such a relief to be able to store our stuff and then enjoy the day without lugging our suitcases. He went above and beyond by being so accommodating with both our check in time and check out times. He was always prompt with returning any messages as well. Overall an amazing experience for our first Airbnb.
We had an excellent two night stay; the condo was very modern, clean, and centrally located :)

Benjamin's place is simply excellent. Helpful and accommodating host, very easy to communicate with. The studio is lovely, very comfortable and clean. Well situated close to plenty of shops, bars, restaurants and cafes around Saint Catherine Street. I wish we had been able to spend more time here and I would definitely recommend to any future guests.

Nous avons adoré notre séjour dans ce studio. Tout est neuf et très propre. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Benjamin, c'est Carole qui nous fait faire le tour du studio. Nous avons eu un très bon accueil. Le batiment est à une minute de marche de la rue St-Catherine et à 5 minutes de marche de la station de metro Lucien-Lallier. La cuisine est complète il est donc facile de s'y faire à manger. La rue Crescent peut sembler bruillante, mais une fois la porte patio fermée on entend plus rien. Je recommande ce Airbnb absolument!

The studio is superb. Very clean, tidy, well-decorated and has almost everything one needs. It is also incredibly well located and even though it is on crescent street which is full of bars, you are on the 9th floor and you don't hear it much especially with the double glazing. The place is very spacious. The host was very welcoming, helpful and available when needed. I would definitely stay there again if I had to visit.

This brand new appartment was perfect for our week of exploring Montreal. It is conveniently located, well-equipped with everything you need and communication with Benjamin's friend Carole was excellent. Highly recommendable!

Le logement était parfait, conforme aux photos et à la description de l'annonce.
Il se trouve à un emplacement idéal au centre ville et très bien insonorisé.
Le communication s'est très bien passée avec Benjamin.
Great location, amazing space! Benjamin was very helpfull and easy to reach if we needed! I would love to rent again next time I'm in Montreal!

Host tried to contact us but our cell phone was not working when we arrived. After we waited at the address, he did show up, so it all worked out OK. 
The neighborhood seems quite safe and is ideally located near many restaurants, shopping.We were able to walk to the major attractions in central Montreal.
We had a great stay in Benjamin's apartment. The apartment is modern, clean, well furnished and great located for a trip to Montreal.

Very responsive - met us on arrival  - apartment very neat and tidy just like the pictures.
Apt in great location - walkable to many attractions & close to Metro
Parking a little tough - but we managed.
Thanks Benjamin

Super brand new condo, steps from St Catherine Street with tons of shopping, restaurants and music.  Also steps to bus, metro VIA and airport transit.

Benjamin was prompt and accommodating.

Highly recommended.

If I could give this place and Benjamin six stars I would!  Benjamin was an excellent host and was quite flexible with check in and check out times which helped me out tremendously.  The place was top notch, clean and is in a fantastic location.  I would definitely stay here again!
La descripción es perfecta, la zona céntrica y con mucho movimiento, y el departamento tiene todo lo que puedas necesitar.

Benjamin's apartment was very accurate to the pictures he posted. It was very clean and organized. He gave us good recommendations of things to do/eat while in Montreal. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks for everything Benjamin!

Loved it! Very clean and the location could not have been better. Super close to the metro and all the downtown spots. Benjamin was friendly and helpful.
