Stayed here with my boyfriend and he loved it as well! The place was just perfect for the two of us. It had plenty of space with all of the modern amenities. Loved that there was a washer and dryer. Merci Benjamin for the excellent accommodations!

Great location, the apartment is in top condition, everything is new. 
Benjamin was very easy to communicate with and very accommodating with check-in and check-out times.
The photos are very accurate and the building is great too. Elevator, great washer, dryer and amenities were a big bonus.

Location is absolutely perfect for the downtown life 

Very easily accessible as everything is in walking distance. 

Great restaurants and grocery stores very close by as well

When my boyfriend and I arrived in Montreal Benjamin made it easy and convenient to pick up the keys. There was NOTHING inconvenient about staying at Benjamin's condo. It is in a clean, modern building steps away from St. Catherine's. There are many thoughtful things around the condo that we were grateful to find; including an umbrella large enough to cover two people. 

I was pleasantly surpised by the overall experience that the condo provided us... but the biggest surprise was when my boyfriend proposed to me on the balcony!! The fact that he chose that spot to pop the question should speak for itself.
Very central location in Montreal-- Benjamin takes great care of the place (it is very clean!) and is super-responsive. Full kitchen and very comfortable bed. I highly recommend it.

Benjamin's place was perfect!  Very comfortable, modern and clean.  And the location was perfect .  He was a fantastic host too!  Very responsive, helpful and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again.

Ben's place made a great hub for our trip to Montreal.  His condo is perfectly located very close to many shops, restaurants, and bars. The Bell Centre is just a few blocks away and the public transportation was easy to use from our condo. Ben was waiting for us outside as we arrived and is very responsive when we contacted him at the airport. The condo has all the amenities of a nice hotel, and you will feel at home here while visiting Montreal. Highly recommend staying here while visiting this beautiful city. Thanks Ben!
Benjamin's studio is new, modern, clean and situated in central downtown close to shopping and Metro. Perfect place to stay for couples or single people new to the area. Thanks Benjamin!

We spent 4 wintry days in Montreal and the comfort of Benjamin's place made it that much more magical. We truly felt at home and couldn't have asked for more from his accomadations and from him. Even after we had checked in, he was still available to answer questions about the city and things we could do! We'll definitely be back!
The stay was great!  Prompt communications and location was central to every major attraction in Montreal.  Highly recommended!

If you want to be in the heart of the city, this is the spot. One minute walk to St. Catherine St. 5 min walk to Bell Centre. 
Everything was perfect!
Benjamin met us promptly, showed us the condo and answered any questions I had immediately. 
We will be back!!
Thank you Benjamin!

name: Large double room in Bondi
summary: A bright large double room is available in a beautiful beachy apartment for two weeks from the end of May. The apartment is conveniently located between the iconic Bondi beach and many shops and amenities at Bondi Junction.
description: A bright large double room is available in a beautiful beachy apartment for two weeks from the end of May. The apartment is conveniently located between the iconic Bondi beach and many shops and amenities at Bondi Junction. Guests will have access to the full residence, shared with my flatmate who lives in the second bedroom. The space includes a complete kitchen with many appliances, including an espresso machine and various blenders, a private internal laundry (washer and dryer), full bathroom (including bathtub), wireless internet throughout and a large SmartTV. I will be spending the whole of the Easter period away with family but my flatmate will still be there during the break. I will be available via email or mobile if you have any questions or require any advice. The flat is exactly half way between the shops at Bondi Junction and the iconic Bondi Beach - a 10 minute walk in either direction. A minute's walk away is Bondi Road, which provides excellent access to public transpor
transit: The flat is exactly half way between the shops at Bondi Junction and the iconic Bondi Beach - a 10 minute walk in either direction. A minute's walk away is Bondi Road, which provides excellent access to public transport - any of the buses, which go to Bondi Junction or through to Sydney CBD within 15 minutes or hop in one of the plenty of taxis driving by. You can truly walk to anywhere in Bondi from here!
access: Guests will have access to the full residence, shared with my flatmate who lives in the second bedroom. The space includes a complete kitchen with many appliances, including an espresso machine and various blenders, a private internal laundry (washer and dryer), full bathroom (including bathtub), wireless internet throughout and a large SmartTV.
interaction: I will be spending the whole of the Easter period away with family but my flatmate will still be there during the break. I will be available via email or mobile if you have any questions or require any advice.
house_rules: We like to keep the flat clean and tidy so would appreciate it if guests do the same. Strictly no smoking or parties.

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia

name: Family friendly beach house
summary: Only 400 metres to the beach,2 x carparks,close to everything,very clean and tidy semi with backyard great for lazy afternoons,3 good sized bedrooms,Jonathan Adler furniture
description: Only 400 metres to the beach,2 x carparks,close to everything,very clean and tidy semi with backyard great for lazy afternoons,3 good sized bedrooms,Jonathan Adler furniture

name: StayIN Oporto Música - Apartment
summary: Acabamos de decorar-lo para receber os primeiros hospedes na passagem de ano. Seja o primeiro a ficar neste magnifico apartamento. Stayin Oporto Musica Guest Apartment é uma propriedade localizada no coração do centro de Porto cujo tema é a música.
description: Acabamos de decorar-lo para receber os primeiros hospedes na passagem de ano. Seja o primeiro a ficar neste magnifico apartamento. Stayin Oporto Musica Guest Apartment é uma propriedade localizada no coração do centro de Porto cujo tema é a música.

host.host_about: From Porto

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: L'appartement est simplement incroyable !!
For a group of scientists I booked Manuel's apartment. Communication was excellent. The apartment was clean and tidy. Guests indicated that the apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures.

Excellent apartment which we took as a whole. Really clean with everything we needed for a large group holiday (at Primavera festival). All pictures very accurate. Arrival very easy and checkout too. Would definitely recommend for large group
A great space with 7 very decent rooms and great communal spaces.
MUY MAL MANUEL. ME LLAMO EL DIA ANTES A LAS DOCE DE LA NOCHE PARA DECIRME QUE SE LE HABIA ROTO UNA TUBERIA. (COSA QUE DUDO) MALAS EXPLICACIONES. NO SE LO RECOMIENDO A NADIE.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a massive apartment with a huge amount of space for a lot of people. It is in a brilliant location (although the road itself not so picturesque) and was perfect for what we needed as a group of 16. It was incredibly comfortable and practical as well as being immaculately clean and functional. We had the best time and would recommend this apartment for anyone staying in Porto in big groups.

For a group visiting Porto I cannot recommend high enough. Great, large clean rooms. The Apartment has some style. Loads of space. Amazing powerful showers. The location is great for going out and exploring Porto and close to the Metro. Value for money yes. Chris.

As seven couples the apartment was a great space so that we were not on top of each other but could be together in the lounges . It was quite noisy from the street and as it was up from town it kept us fit but taxis,are cheap so it all worked well for our group .

Hem estat allotjats un grup de 16 persones. L'apartament és gran, amb habitacions molt amples i suficients banys. Espais comuns de gran tamany per poder compartir. Entrada a l'apartament fàcil, còmoda sense necessitat de claus. Ubicació molt bona i prop de transport públic. Algun petit inconvenient ha estat que hi havia una dutxa inutilitzable (faltava manguera) i el menage de la cuina és just per 16 persones. Però hem estat molt confortables, ideal per grups grans i repetiríem estància si hi tornéssim.
Big and very comfortable flat !

Logement agréable, propre et spacieux.
Situé près d’un métro et des commerces
Mais la cuisine n’était pas équipée pour permettre de faire de la cuisine pour 17 : toutes petites poêles et casseroles, pas de four traditionnel ni même un cafetière pouvant faire plus de 2 tasses...
Manuel a réagi rapidement pour nous permettre de cuisiner un minimum
El piso es muy amplio para un grupo grande incluso. Muy bien ubicado para visitar y moverse por el centro de Oporto. Una vez ahí nos han dado todo facilidades y han sido muy amables con nosotros

Great place to stay, with a very responsive and accomodating host. We stayed here as part of a software developer summit. 8 good sized double bedrooms, large communal areas and 4 bathrooms. When we come back, we will try to stay here.

A really spacious apartment with lots of room for a big group including four bathrooms. It works really well for a large group of friends. Lovely high ceilings and double beds in each room. Great for exploring Porto!
Appartement très propre avec beaucoup de style. Complètement conforme aux photos et à la description. Je recommande!
Très bel appartement, je le recommande vivement pour les personnes nombreuses
Really nice and convenient appartment for big group of people. We were 15. The localization is also perfect to visit the city. I recommend That place.
Appartement agréable, propre et proche de toutes commodités. Je recommande.
great place and location. we had a big group and rented the whole place had plenty of room to hang out with everyone.

name: Alugo Apartamento na Tijuca
summary: Apartamento amplo que acomoda 6 pessoas. Um quarto com sofá cama de casal com armários, ventilador de teto e ar-condicionado. Sala com um sofá cama de casal, com ventilador de teto e climatizador. Dois banheiros, cozinha completa e área.

name: Frida's Centric&Stylish Studio Apt.
summary: Unique loft apartment with a Frida Kahlo decoration, perfect for a couple, in the center of Barcelona, next to Cataluna Square but in a quiet street with no traffic, on the 3rd floor of an antique building without lift. Minimum stay: 31 nights.
space: If you want to feel like a local in a charming, recently refurbished apartment in the center of Barcelona, this is your place! Located only 30 seconds away from the city's center: Plaça Catalunya, the best area of Barcelona full of shops, bars, restaurants, night life and a walking distance many touristic attractions and arts. There are many bus, subway and train lines and the aerobus stop is one minute walking from the flat.  Being so central, it's very quiet because it's located in the small, narrow, quiet street with no traffic on the 3rd floor of an antique building without lift. The apartment has been completely renovated and decorated in June 2016 to offer our guests a comfortable and pleasant stay, providing everything needed to live in Barcelona and have an unforgettable time as if you were at home.  The flat is fully furnished and equipped; it has a double bed and a big sofa which turns into a double bed (for both we provide bed linens) and a high bar table with 4 stools. The
description: Unique loft apartment with a Frida Kahlo decoration, perfect for a couple, in the center of Barcelona, next to Cataluna Square but in a quiet street with no traffic, on the 3rd floor of an antique building without lift. Minimum stay: 31 nights. If you want to feel like a local in a charming, recently refurbished apartment in the center of Barcelona, this is your place! Located only 30 seconds away from the city's center: Plaça Catalunya, the best area of Barcelona full of shops, bars, restaurants, night life and a walking distance many touristic attractions and arts. There are many bus, subway and train lines and the aerobus stop is one minute walking from the flat.  Being so central, it's very quiet because it's located in the small, narrow, quiet street with no traffic on the 3rd floor of an antique building without lift. The apartment has been completely renovated and decorated in June 2016 to offer our guests a comfortable and pleasant stay, providing everything needed to live in B
neighborhood_overview: One minute walking from Catalonia Square, that is generally considered to be both its city centre and the place where the old city (see Barri Gòtic and Raval, in Ciutat Vella) and the 19th century-built Eixample meet. Some of the city's most important streets and avenues meet at Plaça Catalunya: Passeig de Gràcia, Rambla de Catalunya, La Rambla or Portal de l'Àngel, in addition to Ronda de Sant Pere, Carrer de Vergara or Carrer de Pelai. The plaza is especially known for its fountains and statues, its proximity to some of Barcelona's most popular attractions, and for the flocks of pigeons that gather in the centre. Very well connected with all the city, during the day and night, and from the El Prat airport by Aerobus.
notes: All the supplies are included in the price up to 200€ per month so we ask you to switch off the air conditioning and heating every time you leave the flat. Thank you. We want to highlight that our apartment is located on the 3rd floor of an antique building without lift.
access: The weekly cleaning (with changing linens and towels) is included in the price. Besides, the guests have access to a laundry room located in the same building. There are 3 washing machines, a dryer, 2 irons and ironing boards. In front of the laudry room there is a terrace to hang the clothes.
interaction: We are at your disposal from Monday to Friday 10am - 9pm. Outside of this schedule, in case of serious emergency, we will do our best to help you.
house_rules: Our standard check-in time is from 2 pm but we always try to adapt to our guests if we don't have another group of people checking-out the same day. One of us will be waiting for you in the flat at the time previously agreed to give  you the keys and help you with anything you may need. There is no 24 hours reception so it's very important for us to know your exact arrival time and your flight number. There is an extra fee for late check-in: from 9 pm to 11 pm - 20€, after 11 pm - 50€ to be paid when you arrive to the apartment. The check-out time should be before 12 pm. You don't have to wait for us, just leave the keys on the table and shut the door, that's all. All the supplies are included in the price up to 200€ per month so we ask you to switch off the air conditioning and heating every time you leave the flat. Thank you. At least one person of the group should be of legal age (over 18). Don't worry if you break something or lose the key (we know accidents can happen and for that

host.host_about:
I was born in Barcelona and I have been lucky to live in this beautiful city all my life. I am married with children and we both love meeting people from all around the world. We love food and cooking, traveling... we enjoy sharing experiences with people and help you with everything you could need in Barcelona.

We started hosting on Airbnb about 3 years ago and the experience has been amazing. Its great to have the opportunity to meet new people every week and help them have a perfect stay. That have been incredible years!

As we have young children and sometimes it is difficult to manage everything with a baby at home, our friend Ewa is giving us a hand! She is from Poland and has been living in Barcelona for many years, so she is also happy to meet a lot of people from all around the world and give you some tips about our great city!

reviews.comments:
Pau & Ewa's Frida-themed apartment was absolutely amazing! It's in a fantastic location in Barcelona right near the Catalunya metro stop, near the largest grocery store and department store in the city, as well as numerous restaurants. Most notably, the decor of this apartment is stylish and unique and worth booking just to see how great it looks.

They were very welcoming hosts, super nice and with lots of helpful information on places to go in Barcelona. I absolutely would stay here again!

I was very excited to find this lovely central kitch designed apartment. As a solo traveller it was perfect and perfect for couples also. Love the interior design.
Was made very welcome by Ewa who was extremely helpful and prompt with any questions. 
Central gothic location 2 min walk to La Ramblas. 
Highly recommended and will one day definitely return, Muchas Gracias xx

Frida's Centric & Stylish Studio is with its beautiful colors and decoration is a warm, friendly and fun environment which atmosphere  will complement your stay in Barcelona! The hosts have really made an effort to make your stay a special experience! It is exactly as you see in the pictures. Kitchen and bathroom are equipped  with all you need and it is very clean! The studio is located first rank, all Barcelona's features are within walking distance or to reach by a several minutes metro ride. Host Ewa was very friendly and helpful! Anytime we had a small question, we could contact her!   We definitely recommend both this studio as these wonderful hosts!

Very lovely apartment and very located nearbthe centre..!
Enjoyed the stay..had good espresso coffee :)..! very nice bed, was sooo comfirtable..
Enough space to keep your stuff.. Xou have options to cook and very nice spanish looking room!!
Thank you paul and und ewa..!

Nagyon kedves leveleket váltottunk, bár személyesen nem találkoztunk. A környék kitűnő helyen, abszolút a központban van, a lakás szuper volt, új és gyönyörű, kifogástalan.
A ház egy kicsit hangos, gyakran ébredtünk éjjel a szomszédok hangoskodására-

Ewa was very kindly and helpfull with us. 
We stayed for three days and we were three girls and we really enjoyed our stay in this pretty flat, it was all clean and equipped of everything like in the description. 
The position is perfect if you want to move by public transport and the apartament is also really near Playa Catalunya and Las Ramblas. 
We really recommend  it.
Great place to stay in Barcelona!  Pau and Ewa were incredible hosts and helped make the most of my trip.

The apartment is absoultely beautiful,nice and very clean.
The locating is perfect,right in the center of the city.walking distance to everywhere.
Great hosts!!!

Ewe was waiting for us in the apartment even if we arrived late at night. She has been very helpful. She explained us everything about the apartment and gave us advice on Barcelona. The apartment was very clean and the bathroom is simple and essential, especially the shower was super. We appreciated a lot the Nespresso machine with capsules and the maps she left us. The apartment is 1 minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and you can visit a big part of the city on foot. Ewe has been very obliging during our stay. I suggest this apartment to everyone who wants to visit Barcellona, relax and have some fun. The only defect was the sofa bed which was quite hard, especially if you sleep on it for some nights.

The flat was absolutely perfect in every way. Perfect location to restaurants and to all public transport to the main sites, although most were walkable from the flat. Check in and Check out very easy and host was very helpful and friendly on our welcome. They even sent us a pack of information on restaurant recommendations and sites etc before we left and that was extremely helpful to plan our stay.The interior is exactly as shown in the photos. Couldn't recommend this flat more, simply stunning.

I loved Pau and Ewa's flat!  It could not be in a more convenient for those wishing to visit Barcelona.  It is close to public transport (<5 min walk to the Aerobus stop and Metro stations) yet set away on a relatively quiet street so at night I did not experience any outside noise.  I found the apartment to be perfectly situated between all the parts of town I hoped to visit during my trip, equally close to El Born, the Eixample, and of course it is right in El Gotic, a few minutes to the Rambla.

Other than the fantastic location, the flat was very well appointed, with a comfortable couch, comfortable bed, fully equipped kitchen, and (compared to what I have experience in similarly-sized European flats) an uncramped bathroom/shower.  

The apartment was very clean when I arrived, and Ewa was very welcoming and friendly.  If I come back to Barcelona with my wife, I will definitely try to stay here again!  Highly recommended!

This is an awesome place to stay. The location is excellent and super easy to get to from the airport with the Aerobus. Ewa is an excellent host and was waiting for us when we arrived at the apartment. She explained everything very clearly and recommended a nearby restaurant to satisfy our overwhelming tapas craving. Also, the shower is great, very good water pressure. Would definitely stay here again!
The apartment was quaint and looked exactly like the pictures.  Perfect location

The host was lovely! Ewa explained how to get to the tourist spots, showed us how to use the facilities, and responded to messages for help immediately. There were four of us renting the flat and the size of the flat was perfect for us. The flat is exactly like the pictures, and it was really comfortable and clean to stay in! We were very very happy with the flat. We hardly used the metro as most of the tourist spots were of short walking distance from the flat. That helped us save time and money. If I were to visit Barcelona again, I would rent this flat!

We absolutely loved the Frida house. The space was charming and warm. The location was perfect, just minutes to La Rambla and La Boqueria and lovely walks to many Gaudi buildings as well as the SEA!!!  Pau and Ewa were lovely hosts. They responded quickly to every communication and sent detailed information with local recommendations for food and sightseeing. Ewa was also so kind to send suggestions for a day trip to the Costa Brava.  Many thanks!!!!

Wir hatten einen fantastischen Aufenthalt bei Pau & Ewa. Ewa hat uns bei unserer Ankunft empfangen und uns alles Wichtige erklärt.Das Apartment war genau so wie beschrieben und die Lage ist perfekt, wenn man Barcelona zu Fuss erkunden will. Wir werden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen!

The appartment is exactly like the photos and is well located.
Ewa is very sympatic and avalaible if we need help.
Thank you very much

La estancia en la casa ha sido genial!!!

Mejor imposible, muy cómoda y la casa decorada al detalle.
Estuvimos 4 personas, es chiquitita pero perfecta para un fin de semana. Todo muy bien equipado.

En pleno centro de Barcelona. La única pega que podría sacarle es que no tiene ascensor y para subir es bastante estrecha la escalera, pero es un segundo piso, así que no hubo problema.

Ewa antes de que fueramos a Barcelona se interesó mucho de a que hora llegaríamos y de que todo fuera fenomenal.

Repetiríamos sin duda.
We enjoyed our stay here. The apartment is very well located and it has everything you need. It was also very clean and exactly how it looks on the photos

The room is quite small as described, but as they are up front about this from the beginning it shouldn't be a problem, we had two young children with us and they loved the place. The shower was amazing, the beds comfy and the location is the best, we were able to walk all over and find plenty of food and attractions nearby. If we ever have the pleasure of coming back to Barcelona I wouldn't hesitate to see if this apartment was available again! It had everything we were looking for and more!

This listing is actually better than it is listed. It is totally updated with the latest furnishings and appliances and looks like it was recently remodeled, it even comes with a Nespresso Machine and drink pods! The apartment is spotless! The bed is very comfortable and the pull out couch is more than sufficient for a third person. Ewa met us promptly at the apartment and explained all the features. She was quick with the initial correspondence and kept us informed at all times, even checking in with us while we were there.  We were emailed a detailed package about everything a tourist could need including how to get there, restaurants in the area and highlights to visit. The location is superb! It was an easy walk to La Rambla, grocery stores, the beach, the Metro, El Born area and tour buses which all seem to leave from Catalunya circle. This is the apartment we would come back to again and again and you would be fortunate to rent it if available. This is the ultimate rental! Thank you Ewa for making this a great holiday.

We had a fantastic time in Barcelona. Ewa gave us a warm and friendly welcome and she was happy to answer all questions. The flat was exactly as described and had an absolutely superb location. We would book the flat again without any hesitations.

Overall, my 2 friends and I really enjoyed our stay here. The best part about this flat is the location. We could walk almost anywhere! It also felt recently updated and had a really nice bathroom. We also loved the colorful decor. Before booking Ewa said it was small for some groups of 3, but we found it to be a great size for us.

Ewa was always very quick to respond and greeted us at the flat when we arrived. About 30min after she left we accidentally blew out the power, and she was back in 5 min to turn it back on.

The one negative part for us -- there is very loud construction RIGHT across the street that began every day at 8am, even on weekends. It was pretty difficult not to be woken up by the noise. Also, the A/C didn't seem to work very well for us, but in May that wasn't a huge deal. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others, but would want to be warned about the construction in advance.

Myself and my 2 friends had a great stay here and loved Barcelona! Ewa was very accommodating and friendly. The apartment was beautifully decorated and had everything we needed for the trip. The location was absolutely perfect and you can get to pretty much anywhere you need on foot! Would definitely recommend. Thank you Pau & Ewa!

Pau and Ewa's apartment couldn't have been a more perfect place to stay at in Barcelona.
There were four of us and although the apartment is not big but it was enough room for us. The atmosphere of it made it very cosy and lovely. 
It was exactly as it is in the photographs, very clean, tidy and perfectly prepared for the visitors and it immediately created a very nice impression of the apartment. All of the dishes were clean, the shower was also perfectly clean, there were no dirty towels or sheets. The apartment had all of its listings. 
Although Ewa couldn't welcome us herself but we were kindly welcomed by her job mate as soon as we came. We were told everything that we needed to know as well as got a prepared book with many suggested restaurants and in general places to visit in Barcelona. And since our flight back was in the evening it was really lovely that we were allowed to stay longer in the apartment and check out later.
The location of the apartment is perfect. It is nearby to the Plaça de Catalunya, a few minutes walk to La Rambla and about as much to the Passeig de Gràcia, the shopping street. The beach is around 2km from the apartment however it is easy and pleasant to walk since the surroundings are very lovely and the centre of the city is always full of people. 
Unfortunately, we didn't get a chance to meet the owners but I have an impression that they are very lovely, organised and look at everything seriously. Ewa made sure that we were comfortable and inquired if we were OK. I am sure that the hosts would help with anything you need.
Staying in Pau and Ewa's apartment made the visit to Barcelona even more better. We couldn't have imagined a better place. Thank you!

I stayed with my mom, sister and my 1 year old baby. We all loved our stay in Pau & Ewa's apartment! 
Before booking, Ewa explained that the studio could be quite small for all of us but we found it didn't really matter since the flat was really cozy, tidy and beautifully decorated. As I'm a big fan of Frida and we could really feel Frida :)
First of all, Ewa was really nice and helpful. She replied me back so quickly whenever I sent a message to her before my trip. Also, I arrived in BCN very late at night around 11, but Ewa was there for me with a warm and friendly welcome. 
Not only that, its location was the best! it's just off the plaza catalunya which could be the center of the city. Literally we could walk everywhere. Big shopping center is right in the front and metro station as well as bus stations.
Great host, beautiful apartment with superb location. I would absolutely recommend this place to my friends who want to visit BCN! 
Thanks again Ewa :)

We loved our stay in Frida's Centric and Stylish Studio!  It is located in the Barri Gotic but also very close to La Rivera, another wonderful neighborhood, so we could walk everywhere. It is only steps from Plaça de Catalunya with access to transportation anywhere in the city which made it easy to stop by the apartment in the middle of the day as well (Website hidden by Airbnb) 
     The apartment itself was beautiful and comfortable. My daughter and I were traveling together.   The pull out sofa was different from the standard American kind that requires the mattress to fold three times and instead was a far more comfortable full thickness cushion. Then it was very easy to turn it back into a sofa for the day. Everything we needed was provided. 
   Ewa communicated very clearly in advance and in person so that all arrangements proceeded with perfect smoothness. Also they provided a wonderful booklet explaining information about the apartment and issues such as how to travel to the apartment from various forms of transportation, suggestions for restaurants in the neighborhood and things to see.  I would definitely stay here again and would give my highest recommendation!

This was our best Airbnb experience yet! Ewa was so kind and helpful during our stay and we really felt at home in this apartment. It was beautifully decorated, incredibly clean,  and very comfortable. We felt very safe and secure and the location couldn't have been better. It was walking distance to many of the main attractions and there were lots of great restaurants nearby. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will recommend this apartment to anyone traveling to Barcelona.
Our trip to Barcelona was fantastic.  The location of our apartment was awesome as we were close to all of the local sites in the Gothic District.

Leiligheten var fantastisk og stod 100 % til forventningene. Veldig sentral, men fortsatt plassert i en rolig gate, med gangavstand til alt! Vi trengte ikke ta en eneste buss eller metro på turen. 
Vi følte oss som hjemme selv om vi bare bodde her i en uke. Alle nødvendigheter, som kaffe, te, toalettpapir, sjampo, osv, var tilgjengelig i leiligheten da vi kom, det var veldig rent og ryddig, og vi fikk masse informasjon rundt hvilke steder vi burde besøke, attraksjoner vi burde se og restauranter vi burde spise på. Vi hadde en fantastisk uke i Barcelona og vil anbefale både byen og denne leiligheten til alle!
Ideal location for a city break, close by to shops and places of interest. The apartment was clean and well furnished with everything you need- with the added bonus of a coffee machine!

One of the best airbnbs I've ever stayed in. The location was amazing, the decor was amazing, the amenities were amazing and the hosts were amazing. Definitely recommend this place. I unfortunately dislocated my knee while staying here so I got to spend a lot of time enjoying the decor- very comfortable bed and couch bed, all the necessary kitchen supplies, fast wifi, WONDERFUL shower! The ac worked very well too, which is not always the case. We were greeted by Ewa the first day, and she gave us an entire personal guide book which we used the whole time and were very impressed by all the recommendations. You should definitely try to stay here when you visit Barcelona!
I spent five nights here with two friends of mine, and we felt like at home! The apartment is super central and super nice, and Ewa is really kind! :) Can't wait to come back soon!!!

The flat is in a great location - really central and close to a major metro station. Ewa warned us beforehand that the flat might be small for the four of us but it fitted our needs perfectly. We had a great stay and would definitely come stay again. 

Only down side was that the walls of the flat are quite thin and so we could hear the neighbours (especially when there were parties going on). However, this did not bother us much.

Super séjour. 
The apartment is very well placed in the center of Barcelona. It is practical oriented. We were 2 adults and 2 children and the apartment was big enough for us. 
The contact with Ewa was very good.

Nous avons passé un séjour parfait au studio Frida ! Un endroit atypique et plein de charme. Nous étions 4 amies et nous ne nous sommes pas senties à l'étroit. L'appartement est très propre, parfaitement équipé, et l'emplacement vraiment central pour visiter. Un petit guide laissé pour les locataires vous aiguille aux alentours. Ewa et sa femme de ménage nous ont même permis de check-in et check-out en fonction de nos heures de vol, par chance ! Une véritable pépite. Merci, on reviendra !

Myself and my partner sent 5 nights in this apartment and thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The space is very well laid out, comfortable and has everything you would need. The bed is comfortable, and the area is relatively quite at night. The shower is perfect, a nice size and always hot water to meet our demands. The only caution I would raise is that you need to climb a number of flights of stairs that are quite steep and narrow to get to the apartment, this is not a major issue unless you have heavy luggage or limited mobility. 

The location of the apartment is perfect, and within walking distance to both La Rambla and the Gothic Quarter. Metro stations are very close for access to airport and all other routes. 

The host was very pleasant and helpful, providing us with a detailed list of useful information before we arrived. They where very contactable and made sure we where comfortable during our stay.

I would highly recommend this space, and will definitely return in the near future.
We (3 Austrian guys) had a great time in Barcelona and really enjoyed our stay in the loft of Pau & Ewa! Everything worked out well!
The apartment was in a great central location. Someone met us at the apartment when we arrived and made us feel very welcome.

Barcelona is such an awesome city! Their place is in a great spot literally right in the center of everything. So cute. Some kitchen essentials were provided which was great. Communication was great and check in was seamless!! Thank you!!
Great clean and neat spot in the center of town!

Cute and modern little apartment in a great location.
A little noisy at night with neighbours and street noise but this is to be expected in a city like Barcelona.
Apartment was clean and host left us with a booklet full of great recommendations. 
Would definitely stay here again

This apartment was beautifully decorated and clean when we arrived. The location was great as it's near the aerobus drop off point. The shower was great, the kitchen well equipped and the bed was very comfortable. The air-con was a bonus. 
Overall this place is lovely, it just can be a little noisy so maybe pack your ear plugs.

Ewa and Pau's flat was lovely, super well located with bars, shops, restaurants, markets and the gothic district on your doorstep. The flat itself was very modern and clean and perfect for what we needed. Ewa was kind enough to meet us at the flat making the whole experience very easy. Highly recommend this place!

This was our first time using Air B&B and it was fantastic! Ewa was an amazing host and really made us feel welcome. The apartment is decorated to a very high standard and was spotlessly clean. Really comfortable bed, amazing shower and lovely fresh, clean towels. We felt very cared for due to little touches like the guest info back bursting with recommendations, a coffee machine and hair dryer etc. Super location! Would love to stay again if we are lucky enough to get back to Barcalona anytime soon!

Lovely welcome even though we arrived earlier than expected. 
Narrow stairs to the apartment so was glad only had small cases.
Perfect location although noisy but to be expected in the centre of the city.
Lovely and clean, everything we wanted

Apartment: Clean and nicely decorated. Although an intimate space, it was comfortable for our group of three. It is a third floor walk up, so be ready for a workout and a good sense of humor to bring your bags up and down.

Location: Optimal for its proximity to the Catalunya metro station, buses, and taxis at all hours. It's also right next to La Rambla - an always bustling tourist district.

Hosts: Top, great, singing their praises. Ewa prepared the apartment and met us early since we had an afternoon FCB game to attend, despite another guest having checked out that same morning. But what really makes these hosts stand out is that on our first night (a Saturday), we got locked out of the apartment. We contacted the hosts via the numbers they provided and Ewa was there in 20 minutes - on a Saturday night after 22:00! She got us in quickly and took control of and calmed a potentially stressful situation - she couldn't have handled it better. We're very grateful for her impressive hospitality and quick problem-solving in an unexpected situation. Rain or shine, these are hosts you can rely on.

This place was amazing !!
I recommend this place, it is so beautifull house and the neighborhood.
Ewa is so kind and helpful.
Thank you for a beautiful vacation in Barcelona

Ewa and Pau were absolutely amazing hosts, and we could not have felt more at home in their flat in Barcelona. They gave us a detailed packet with all the information that we could need regarding the flat, the neighborhood, sites to see, and restaurants to visit. Ewa was incredibly responsive when we ended up arriving earlier than planned, and showed us around the flat. The flat itself was very cute, great amenities, and awesome location near the Placa Catalunya. This was our first time in Barcelona (and in Spain) and we really felt at home by the time we left!

Pau is a great host
Excellent conversation and the flat is just as described 
Easy to find and in very good location
Unfortunately in the house had a major construction and after Pau kindly asked them to start and finish the work in more sensible time in the house opposite work just started the next day...
The first impression of the house isn't the best but the flat is very comfortable and clean

Estuvimos 5 días con mi señora y nuestro hijo de 2 años.. La ubicación excepcional! A mts de Plaza Cataluña. El dto es tal cual se ve en las fotos, chiquito pero hermoso...  y nos estaban esperando ni bien llegamos...

Ewa felt us feel really at home when we arrived. She gave various tips for our visit to be the best, which was really cool. The apartment is situated in a very good location and the neighborhood was very calm.  I will come back!
We enjoyed the charming clean room with good facilities including a kitchen and balcony.

The flat is in a prime location, which was perfect to discover all areas of Barca. Beautifully decorated, and the wallpaper and artwork looks better than the pictures even! The handy little pack of suggestions came in very useful! We would definitely stay here again! Gràsies, Diolch, thanks!
This place was well located, in a quiet street right in the middle of everything. clean, styly, and as showed on the pictures. Great experience. I recommend !
Being so close to the Airbus terminal and so central made our stay in Barcelona very enjoyable. The Freda Kallo theme added to the charm of the apartment.

A really cute little flat in an ideal area of Barcelona. We could easily get about by accessing the centrally located Metro, but there was also a lot to do within 20 minutes, including museums, excellent shoppings, and eclectic dining experiences. The place is very clean and well-cared for, and our experience would best recommend it for the active city goer.

Our family of 3 had a wonderful stay at Ewa&Pau's place. Love the location so much, it is close to every where, we went all the places we wanted to go just by walking. The room is clean, small but well equipped.

We spent 2 days here on an extended layover on the way home from South Africa. The apartment was clean and exactly as pictured. The location is fantastic! Really, everything you need is right around you or within a short walk. We even walked to La Sagrada (20 min) because the weather was nice. We would stay here again without question.
Perfect location, beautiful cozy apartment. I would absolutely recommend and come back to Pau & Ewa's flat. The communication was smooth and friendly. Thank you for a great stay!

Muy bonito piso con todo para cocinar ! Magnifica decoración ! Muy cómodo y limpio !!

Super studio très bien équipé, très propre, à deux pas de la place de la Catalogne et de Urquinaona, parfait pour découvrir la ville !! 

Very cosy and beautiful studio, with everything inside. Really closed to plaza de Catanuya and Urquinaona. I recommand it !!

The apartment was wonderful, Ewa was wonderful, and the location was wonderful! The check-in was extremely easy, the hosts were very quick in responding and extremely accommodating. Saved us big time as we were a bit last minute with booking. Great experience, great time!

Un appartement où il fait bon vivre! On se sent chez soit en plein Barcelone ! Les quartiers à voir sont proches de l'appartement ! Ce dernier est très propres et fonctionnel! 
Les propriétaires sont très gentils et font tout leur possible pour nous arranger!
Je recommande sans hésiter
Nice beautiful place! Excellent location!
.The apartment is lovely and the location is perfect. Ewa is very nice and gives good advice. Love the restaurants she recommends.
Flat was beautiful and clean. Ewa was so friendly and gave us loads of useful information on Barcelona before our stay. Couldn't ask for a better location. Would definitely stay again.

Excellent location, clean well kept apartment. 
Very friendly and helpful hosts. 
Not extremely well lit with windows that look directly into an office so I kept them closed most of the time for privacy. 
No TV if that's important to you. 
Nespresso machine with capsules provided which was important for me.  
Great wifi

This apartment was absolutely perfect. The location is great: walking distance to both the beach and the city center. The apartment is spotless. We were a group of 4 so we were concerned it would be too small, but everyone had more than enough space and the sofa bed is very comfortable! Ewa is informative and so sweet. We really loved our stay and I wouldn't stay anywhere else in Barcelona! I highly recommend this!!!

This studio apartment was absolutely perfect for a week-long stay in Barcelona! Ewa was an incredible host and very responsive if we had any questions. She provided a comprehensive guide to the apartment and city. The guide was so well put together it felt like we had our own hotel concierge. The apartment is a small studio that is extremely central in the city - so much so that we walked everywhere, including to La Sagrada Familia and Park Guell because of the beauty of the city and due to our location, we could! The apartment is clean and compact and included everything we needed on our stay. It has a fun Frieda Kahlo theme and was beautifully decorated and modern. Great shower!
Best Place and best host in town. I am very grateful to Ewa and Pau

Excelent appartment! Ewa was very nice welcoming us to the appartment 
the place is less than a minute walk to plaza catalunia.
we had a great time !

위치, 시설 다 좋았어요 
다만 4층이고 24인치 이상 케리어를 들고가기가 어려워요 ㅠㅠ 아니 힘들어요

Wir kommen jederzeit gerne wieder  
Die zentrale Lage ist einfach unschlagbar. Vom/zum Airportbus sind es gerade mal 250 m zu laufen. Die meisten Attraktionen wie Ramblas, Altstadt, Strand etc. alle fussläufig erreichbar. Ansonsten ist ist die Metro nur ein paar Schritte entfernt oder ein Fahrradverleih direkt nebenan.
Dennoch liegt das Appartement für spanische Verhältnisse sehr ruhig in einer Seitengasse ohne Straßenverkehr. 
Als Ausgangspunkt für einen Barcelona-Städtetrip zu Zweit einfach ideal

It was a beautiful, fun and tidy apartment that easily fit three of us (two in the bed, one on the impressively comfortable fold-out couch). Perfect location for first-timers to Barcelona who want to be in the thick of the action. The noise from the stairwell could be a little loud at times, as could the noise from the street if you wanted to leave a window open overnight -- but that could be mitigated by the fact it was air conditioned. All up, a wonderful stay.

It's a comfortable place, and the location is in the center of the city. However, there was some noise outside even in the midnight. To conclude, it is a cozy place but if you need a quite place it might not suitable for you.
Excelente ubicación y acceso a transporte público.
Je recommande vivement cette adresse

We were 4 girls staying in this apartment. The bed and sofa bed were a perfect size. The cleanliness of the apartment and the hospitality of the hosts was exceptional, and we could not have asked for a better location... it was right next to plaça catalunya and very close to the airport bus and the taxi lines. Had a great time overall and would definitely come here again!

Ewa and Pau were very communicative throughout the entire booking process through check in. The apartment is in a PERFECT location - walking distance to everything you need; metro, shops, plazas, food, etc.
Brilliant location right in the heart of Barcelona.  Ewa & Pau's apartment was ideal for a city break.
Great location, clean apartment and a friendly host!
Centrally located and well-appointed. I would stay here again.

El estúdio es perfecto para quienes desean estar cerca de los mejores y más famosos lugares de Barcelona. Muy central y al mismo tiempo muy tranquilo para relajar depués de un dia perfecto por la ciudad. Recomiendo a todos!
Everything was great, but just a little small for three people. Very good location.

Absolutely loved staying at this beautiful apartment perfectly located for those wanting access to the city with a local feel. Completely walkable and extremely close to public transit, Ewa and Pau were accommodating, communicative, and our week stay in Barcelona was wonderful. :)
Un apartamento en una excelente ubicación, muy amables y estuvieron muy pendientes de lo que necesitáramos.
Appartement et hôte fantastique

This apartment was ideal for our stay in Barcelona. Perfect location with easy access to transport and sights - right in the center of everything. It was a 30 minute walk to the beach - but 5-10 minutes on the metro which is very close to the apartment. There are many restaurants and shops nearby as well as sights such as the Barcelon Cathedral, markets and some Gaudi architecture! It was super cleanly and tidy and supplies you with everything required - the hosts were lovely and super helpful with everything we needed. It was the perfect place for us! :)
Det var en super lejlighed med go beliggenhed, indretning og værtsskab

I am very satisfied with this apartment. Our host Vincent speaks English fluently so it was easy to communicate and has detailed manual in the room with map and information of the site. The room is beautifuly decorated and this room has everything you need! Vey cozy bed, sofa bed, closet, coffee machine etc and even pizza cutting device! The best thing of the apartment was its location It is very close from La Rambla, boquería mercado, architecture of Gaudi, plaza y estación. Finally our host was really kind. Thanks to this apartment we could spend wonderful days in Barcelona!Thank you :)
Un appartement très bien localisé, à quelques stations de métro des endroits touristiques de la ville ou même de la plage. Les hôtes ont été très accueillants. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour.

Absolutely fantastic central location right in the heart of the shopping district and with many great restaurants and bars nearby. Ewa was a fantastic host and allowed us to checkin earlier - which was hugely appreciated after 36 hours of travelling with young children. The apartment itself was well-maintained and we loved having a nespresso each morning. The only downside was that it was noisy in the building staircase and the street below well into the early hours of the morning, waking the kids often throughout the night. All in all, we thoroughly enjoyed our time in Barcelona and our stay in Ewa's apartment.
The apartment has a perfect location. Everything i expected. The host is also a very nice person.

Le studio est très bien équipé et conforme aux photos. L'immeuble par contre nous a un peu déçu.  Escalier étroit avec une forte odeur, présence de cafards.  C'est dommage car le studio est très charmant et l'emplacement est parfait pour faire beaucoup de choses à pied.
De plus Ewa est accueillante et son guide pour ses hôtes et bien pratique.
Beautiful little apartment in a great location. Comfortable, very clean, well equipped and very cool design. Thank you.
Lovely studio, great restaurant recommendations, wonderful host.
Fantastic location. Very clean. Everything we needed.

Ewa and Pau's apartment is located in the perfect place if you are new to Barcelona and want to be walking distance to the Rambles and the Gothic Quarter. There's a number of supermarkets nearby and the bus to the airport is about a block away.

The apartment is as cute as the photos suggest. There is AC which was great and once you close the windows, you can't hear the street traffic. It's very clean and there are all the things you need to make a stay in Barcelona comfortable. 

Ewa was great in accommodating our arrival times. We were both coming in from races in different parts of Spain so only had rough estimates of when we thought we would get there. She was responsive and was there waiting for us when we got there.
Excellent location on a street that quiet down nicely at night. Lots of hot water, great air conditioning, and speedy Internet!

Fantastic apartment & wonderful hosts! Central, safe, clean & charming apartment with everything we needed to enjoy our time in Barcelona. Ewa & Pau were fantastic hosts providing excellent overviews & recommendations and support during our stay. We will definitely stay again next time we are in Barcelona!

This was our most enjoyable stay! Location is super! For every reason..clean cosy and beautiful place..very positive atmosphere.Thank you Ewa for being such a perfect host!! It was really very nice to meet you!

Great location for us 4 girls who love to go shopping! For us it was not small at all! But then again we are very good friends. Would maybe not recommend it to two couples, only friends or a couple. It was a great stay! Cozy!

But we do have some tips: a large mirror to see your beautiful outfit :), basic things like a sponge, handtowels, dishcloth, more glasses and plates, scissors.

Ewa and Pau's place was (Website hidden by Airbnb) was very clean and in a great location. Ewa and Pau were very helpful on how to get there and place to go. We would definitely use their place again.

Everything was perfect. Ewa is a great host who took time to check on us during our stay. 
Their book of recommendations is very handy to find great restaurants and bars
Central but quiet, we slept in until 11 without getting woken by the city noice once. Remarcable since the appatment is just next to plaza catalunya

Ewa & Pau’s place is a very cool apartment, just as the pictures show.
The location can not be more perfect than this, a short walk from Catalonia square and La Rambla.

Besides the apartment was super colorful, we received it very clean.
The apartment has a great wifi and air conditioner that performs well the work.

Ewa was very nice and kind and so we thank you very much.
We enjoyed our stay in this apartment and therefore we recommend to anyone who comes to Barcelona - do not hesitate to go for this perfect apartment!
Appartement central proche de toutes les commodités.
Incredible, cozy apartment. Perfect location. Great attitude. Always ready to help. Easy communication. I love this place.

We spent beautiful 2 days in barcelona and thanks to this lovely apartment we enjoy it more than we wished. 

Thank you for all Ewa

This apartment is perfect for those wanting to stay in the center of Barcelona. Located in the Plaza Catalunya, you are seconds away from restaurants, bars and shopping. The place is exactly as advertised and perfect for 1-4 people (could be right with 4 but definitely doable). The hosts are very easy to communicate with. I️ highly recommend this property.

Este alojamiento es uno de los mejores que alojé en mi viaje a Europa, es muy acogedor, muy bien ubicado, bonito y tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días. Ewa fue muy buena anfitriona, nos mostró los lugares de interés y aclaró todas las dudas nuestras, tenía hasta un libro con sugerencias para actividades en BCN. Volvería a este lugar sin duda.

l' appartamentino è bello come si vede nelle foto ed è vicinissimo a plaza catalunia ed era proprio quello che cercavamo. Se proprio devo trovare dei difetti sono: il letto in ferro molto rumoroso, i vicini che si sentono se fanno le scale o parlano e l edificio di fronte è quello di mediaword e ti possono vedere e bisogna tenere gli scuri delle finestre sempre chiusi. 
Per il resto tutto bello, comodo e pulito e siamo stati accolti con molta precisione e gentilezza
The Apartment was clean and very central. We felt very much at home.

We loved Barcelona! Such a thriving and beautiful city. The location of Ewa and Pau's apartment was excellent. On a side street off main roads. Easy access to bus and metro stops in all directions. Cafes and shops just steps away. The apartment was as pictured. It was cozy, but we had expected that. We had a thorough walk through with their assistant who showed us everything we needed to know. There was also a notebook with tips on favorite spots and things to do. Ewa and Pau also graciously helped us out with an extra night accommodation in a different apartment when we realized that I had erred on our departure date. We definitely would recommend a stay here!

La casa tiene un encanto especial, la decoración me gustó mucho rodeada de la atmósfera de Frida khalo y la situación de la casa es increíble!!!! Se puede ir a todos los lugares, museos etc etc caminando. Merece la pena
El piso está muy bien, muy limpio, la ubicación está genial, descansas sin ruido y a un paso del centro. La climatización del piso esta genial, no pasamos nada de frío. Seguro repetiremos.
De locatie was perfect, overal vlakbij! We hebben met 3 vriendinnen een super leuk weekend gehad in de studio.
Good

Appartement très agréable, très proche de la rambla. Accueil parfait, très content de cet appartement je recommande fortement. Espace agréable pour 3 personnes. Wifi fonctionne parfaitement. Merci beaucoup!!!!
Parfait, rien à ajouter.
Apartamento muy céntrico ideal para dos personas.
Muy bien ubicado!

Everything is just so good. It's lovely place at the heart of Barcelona and you can easily get to the airport or train station by bus or metro. There is only one thing I would like to say that the bed is not so friendly to couples because when they papapa and the bed gagaga. 
Anyway, if I have chance I will be very likely to choose this lovely apartment again and really appreciated the friendly help and quick response from Ewa and Pau.

Ewa and Pau were absolutely brilliant in helping us. The location was perfect just minutes walk away from local attractions and the space was amazing. The room was divine and we would love to stay again

Ewa and Pau's place was so centrally located that it made our first couple of nights in Barcelona a real treat!  The guide prepared was awesome, particularly since she sent it to us ahead of time so we could learn our way around.  Wonderful expresso available, WiFi, and so on!

The place was exactly as described. It was so stylish on the inside and the house was immaculate. Being that it was our first few days in Barcelona, it was perfectly centrally located to help us get our barrings of the city.  Metro stations were right outside the door practically. I had a mix up with dates but Ewa was kind and made sure to follow up and work with me best she could. We loved our stay!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Ewa. Ewa est une personne prévenante. L'appartement était conforme à l'annonce et bien situé (proche de station de métro et de commerces). Les indications laissées  par Ewa nous ont bien servies (petit livret papier+document PDF). L'appartement est propre et la décoration est vraiment sympa ! 
Il y a seulement deux choses qui nous ont un peu dérangées : la montée d'escalier très sonore, et le lit qui grinçait un peu.

Location cannot be any better! Walkable to anywhere. Situated in a good street , quiet but not secluded, great to be able to have a good sleep. Trains are very near. Aerobus and el corte ingles just across the street which is convenient.  Taxi stands numerous around the area.  Communication and response was good, i never needed to worry.  Thank you , i will definitely come back!

Loved staying at Ewa and Pau's, perfect for three adults traveling through Barcelona. It's incredibly close to La Rambla, and transit. Ewa was incredibly helpful. Would definitely recommend this place!
Recomendable 100% si volvemos a Barcelona repetiremos, el piso muy céntrico y barato. Ewa muy amable.

Stayed here for 2 months. Nice, neat apartment. Very functional for 1-2 people. Location can’t be much better -  easy access to L’Eixample and Born, and somewhat removed from the Rambla crowd. Ewa and Pau are great hosts - very responsive.

I have enjoyed staying Ewa & Pau’s flat! The location is perfect, close to everywhere! The flat is cleaned every week. On the negative side, the natural light & wifi connection are not that good. But, I think those are normal in Barcelona city centre.

Everything went as espected. The apartment is in a 3rd floor, but is easly reachable. Very central, probably the best location possible. Is in an old building as most of the houses, you can hear some noise from the sr
street and other apartments but i didn't have any trouble sleeping. Any request that i made was rapidly attended by the owners.

name: Sanctuary Bundeena
summary: Relax and revitalise in our spacious, self-contained studio apartment, with lush private garden. Bundeena's four beautiful beaches, the magnificent Coast Walk and the shops, cafes and artists studios of Bundeena village are just a short stroll away.
space: Sanctuary is a large, self-contained apartment in the downstairs area of our two story home, with views of the Royal National Park to the south and opening onto a lush garden and angophera forest to the north. It includes a spacious living area with lounge suite, television, DVD player and stereo system. An extensive in-house DVD lending library is also available. The sleeping area contains an extra long and wonderfully comfortable Queen bed with fluffy doona and luxurious pillows. All linen and towels are provided. There is a small kitchenette which includes a refrigerator, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities. A complimentary continental style breakfast is provided to get you started and a gas BBQ is available. The large combined bathroom/laundry includes a shower, a bath for luxuriating in, and a washing machine and clothes dryer.
description: Relax and revitalise in our spacious, self-contained studio apartment, with lush private garden. Bundeena's four beautiful beaches, the magnificent Coast Walk and the shops, cafes and artists studios of Bundeena village are just a short stroll away. It includes a spacious living area with lounge suite, television, DVD player and stereo system. An extensive in-house DVD lending library is also available. A complimentary continental style breakfast is provided to get you started and a gas BBQ is available. The large combine
neighborhood_overview: Sanctuary is tucked away in the quietest corner of Bundeena, close to the shops, beaches and the magnificent Royal National Park. Our native garden attracts plenty of birds, possums and other wildlife.
transit: Bundeena is accessible by private car (through the Royal National Park) or a 20 minute ferry trip from Cronulla. If you would like to walk some of the more distant areas of the national park we can arrange to drop you off and/or pick you up.
access: Sanctuary is private, self-contained and has its own separate entrance.
interaction: We are very happy to help you with advice on local attractions and transport to and from various parts of the national park.

reviews.comments:
Lovely cosy place, perfect as a start point to the Coastal Walk. Scott was extremely friendly and helpful.

Private accommodation, with a separate entrance and great independent back garden.

name: Quarto Legal
summary: Meu espaço é perto de Cristo Redentor, Copacabana, Lagoa, Centro, Apoteose, Praça Mauá. Meu espaço é bom para aventuras individuais.
space: Sala, cozinha, áreas comuns do prédio. Caso o hóspede traga atestado médico poderá frequentar a piscina.
description: Meu espaço é perto de Cristo Redentor, Copacabana, Lagoa, Centro, Apoteose, Praça Mauá. Meu espaço é bom para aventuras individuais. Sala, cozinha, áreas comuns do prédio. Caso o hóspede traga atestado médico poderá frequentar a piscina. Podem usar a sala , cozinha , banheiro e a academia do condomínio. Nossa disponibilidade sempre foi e será total, visto que adoramos receber as pessoas. Sempre haverá alguém que poderá tirar as dúvidas. Gosto de morar aqui, e tranquilo ,tem acesso a transporte público que leva a vários bairros , de fácil comércio . Os hóspedes podem se locomover de ônibus, metrô , táxi e Uber. No nossa condomínio possuímos sala de jogos sênior, lanhouse , jogos teens, espaço kids, parquinho

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Um bairro tranquilo, de facil acesso para outros bairros. Temos o metro perto da nossa casa.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Realmente te hacen sentir como en tu casa. No recuerdo otro anfitrion que haya estado tan al tanto de que todo te parezca bien. Muy buena ubicacion con restaurantes, farmacias y todo lo que uno pudiera necesitar. Transporte publico disponible.

name: Central, Modern, University, Metro
summary: Welcome to this completely new apartment and fully equiped. Enjoy the city center surrounded by shops, restaurants and cafes. 2 min from a Metro station that takes you fast to the historical center (5min), beaches, Boavista... Central heated.
description: Welcome to this completely new apartment and fully equiped. Enjoy the city center surrounded by shops, restaurants and cafes. 2 min from a Metro station that takes you fast to the historical center (5min), beaches, Boavista... Central heated.

host.host_about:
Hi, 
We are Daniel and Alexandra, 2 brothers of 37 and 33 years old.
We are two easygoing persons who love to travel, visit and explore new cities and places aroun the world, from Asia to America, Europe to Africa. Meet new people, know new traditions, host other people from around the worls, offer the hospitality of our city.
Daniel work as Economist, and Alex is Science Researcher.
If we can help you with anything, please just contact us.
Best Regards,
Daniel
Alex

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Hi,
 We had an amazing time staying at Daniel. The location is perfect, very close to the city center (8 min walking) and 2 minutes away from the metro station. The apartment was impeccable, it had all the things we needed for a long stay (we stayed for 10 days in Porto).  Daniel was very welcoming, he told us about things to do in Porto and he was available for help when we called him. 

Thank you!

Daniel was an excellent host. He was very prompt with responding to messages and ensured someone was there to meet us right on time for both our arrival and departure. The apartment is extremely clean and has everything you would need for a comfortable stay, short or long term. Being situated right across the street from the metro made getting around Porto effortless :)!

La ciudad de Porto es una ciudad muy bonita, histórica y turística, con muchos rincones donde perderse. 
Daniel y María se mostraron amables a mi llegada y solicitos a hacer mi estancia lo más agradable posible.
Mi estancia fue de más de 20 días, y estuve como en casa. Dispone de todos los electrodomésticos necesarios como lavadora, nevera, microondas. Muy limpia y confortable.
Una buena señal de wifi, muy importante si tu estancia es por trabajo.
Está muy bien situada, en una calle céntrica, a 10-15 minutos caminando se llega a una de las arterias comerciales de Porto, donde se pueden encontrar tiendas y restaurantes. Y a unos 100 metros del metro. 
Si tengo la oportunidad de volver a Porto, me gustaría repetir mi estancia en casa de Daniel y Maria

Não pude conhecer o Daniel e a Maria pessoalmente, mas fomos extremamente bem recebidos por seu pai que nos mostrou todo o apartamento e nos ajudou com nossas dúvidas. 
O apartamento é um sonho, totalmente equipado. Depois que fomos embora para continuar nossa viagem em Lisboa, ficamos com vontade de mudar nosso roteiro para ficar mais dias lá, pois amamos MESMO aquele espaço. Nos sentimos como se estivéssemos em casa.
ottima accoglienza, la casa è moderna e ben acessoriata, in centro e vicino alla metro e ai taxi, ottima scelta! consiglio vivamente!! mattia

Ce fût un excellent séjour à Porto, grâce au beau temps , mais aussi pour passer une semaine dans un très joli appartement avec des propriétaire très gentils.
L'appartement était propre, dans une résidence propre avec ascenseur et place de parking en souterrain. Tout ce qu'il faut pour le centre de Porto . 
L'appartement est très bien équipé pour y passer une semaine.
Il est situé en haut d'une rue qui descend jusqu'au centre historique de la ville . Environ 20 minutes jusqu'au quais . Et le métro à deux minutes de l'appartement qui peux vous amener partout . 
Première expérience pour nous AirBnB très réussi dans cet appartement . 
Je vous le recommande sans hésiter .
Apartamento e donos 5 estrelas. Limpo, organizado e funcional. Localização 5 estrelas. Recomendo!

O apartamento atendeu integralmente as nossas expectativas, os anfitriões ofertaram tudo o que era anunciado. Equipamentos e instalações em perfeito funcionamento, as informações de localização e acesso estavam corretas. A estadia foi muito bem sucedida, com certeza pensaríamos com prioridade em voltar a alugar este apartamento. 
O apartamento tem localização e acesso muito fácil, conhecida e bem servida por metrô e ônibus (autocarros). Tem acesso a supermercado, restaurantes de preços variados, locais de lazer próximos e de boas condições de uso e acesso. 
Agradecemos ao Daniel e à Maria pelas informações, providências e pela excelente hospedagem na ótima cidade do Porto.

I spend 10 days in Daniel's appartment. The appartment is well located : 2 min walk from the metro station Marques and 15 min from the main historic places of Porto. The appartment was extremely clean and well furnished.

Эта квартира просто идеальна для комфортного отдыха. Что больше всего нас поразило - это безупречная чистота, новая мебель, новые белоснежные полотенца, постельное белье, посуда. Есть все необходимое для приготовления пищи, в спальне большая удобная кровать, скоростной вай-фай, что мне было очень важно для работы. Квартира удобно расположена на главной пешеходной улице, до центра можно дойти пешком всего за 10 минут. Единственное трудно потом возвращаться домой, потому что улица под гору, но это специфический для Португалии ландшафт и мы были к этому готовы. Если не хотите идти пешком, то за 200 метров от дома есть станция метро. Внизу дома - кафе, где за 60 центов варят замечательный ароматный кофе! Мы остались очень довольны пребыванием у Даниэля и Марии. Однозначно рекомендую эту квартиру даже для педантичных и привередливых туристов - недостатков нет!

A estadia no Porto foi fantástica. Bela cidade, povo hospitaleiro, tudo foi ótimo! O apartamento é ótimo, lindo, arrumado, limpo, tem de tudo. Só tenho elogios ao apartamento e aos anfitriões que não mediram esforços para ajudar e orientar no que foi preciso. Obrigado Daniel e sr. Manuel!

La casa de Daniel y María es muy acogedora y está limpia.
Que tenga aparcamiento privado es muy cómodo en esta ciudad.
Se encuentra situada en un barrio tranquilo con muy buenas comunicaciones, metro y autobuses al lado, aunque ir al centro andando es un paseo muy agradable.
La próxima vez que vayamos a Oporto, sin duda intentaremos volver a este alojamiento.
Muchas gracias Daniel y un saludo especial a tu padre que fue muy atento al recibirnos.

This apartment appeared to be recently renovated and was exactly as shown in the pictures.  It was well equipped throughout, with all the little touches you could need during your stay, including extra towels.  The apartment was clean and toiletries were abundant.  You can tell they put a lot of thought into setting up this apartment.   We didn't meet Daniel, but his mother met us there.  She was very nice and showed us all the features around the apartment.  The furniture was newer and comfortable.  It was nice to have covered secured parking, but it was a little tricky getting in and out since it is on a very busy street and it is a narrow steep drive to come up from the underground parking.  

Really the only negative of this apartment is the street it is on.  Due to the traffic light about 100 meters away, the traffic was VERY heavy from about 07:00 to 09:00 and then again from 16:00 to 19:00 with a lot of honking......   And then at about 23:00 until 03:00 (or 04:30 on weekends) the "ladies of the night" came out and hung out at the cafe across the street, talking and laughing loudly while drumming up business.  It made it difficult to sleep due to the noise.
O apartamento conseguiu superar as expectativas. É ótimo, bem localizado, confortável... Não tenho o que reclamar. Foi um mês incrível, sem qualquer problema. Recomendo!

We really enjoyed our stay at Daniel’s apartment. The unit is conveniently located off Marquês square and Metro stop – just a short ride to Porto’s attractions. The apartment is bright, spacious, clean, comfortable and offers all the needed amenities for a wonderful stay. Daniel is a gracious and responsive host. Obrigado Daniel e até a próxima!

Logement très bien situé près de la vieille ville, pour visites à pied, commodités toutes proches, garage pratique et sorties de ville facile !
On le recommande fortement !
Louise et André
It was clean and well equiped

The flat is very modern and has big bedroom and good size lounge.  The bathroom is very clean and modern with  rain and smaller movable shower heads. Kitchen not large, but although no oven, very well fitted. 

Basket of useful leaflets on Porto and surrounding areas. Andante (metro) and train tickets available to recharge during your stay very useful.Great having Free WiFi, internet TV with US, ES,FR and UK BBC world channels as well as PT channels.

Didn't meet Daniel and Maria, but Daniels dad met me and gave me brief tour of flat. Daniel rang to make sure all ok and and advise re water boiler.

Two lifts to this 2nd floor flat. Busy road, but only one way road and traffic worst in evening rush hour. Some noise from traffic, if you have windows open. Did find nice to open windows when very hot. Blinds help keep rooms cool.

Marques metro 2 mins walk and this gives easy access to centre, just 5 stops euro 1.20 to Sao Bento near cathedral, main square and railway. Marques also has good bus connections including Serralves art gallery and Foz on coast.

There are several cafes around Marques square and I enjoyed Fumeiro for tasty fresh fruit juices inc strawberry, peach and cakes.  Celeste bakery for breakfast bread, toast and cakes and evening pizzas (also take away).

Pingo Doce supermarket 5 mins walk from appartment, butchers and fruit shop 1 min. The other end of Rua St Catarina is main shopping street, approx 30 mins walk downhill from flat.

I really enjoyed the flat and it's area and felt very much like a local, but able to do the tourist sites easily.
Casa muy agradable, igual que en las fotos. Muy bien ubicada, al lado del metro. Ideal para una pareja.

Appartement spacieux et agréable à vivre (toutefois la rue pourra être considérée comme bruyante pour certains et vivante pour d'autres!)! Situé dans la rue Santa Catarina, il faut juste descendre la rue pour être en centre ville. Parfait pour découvrir Porto ! Et pour ne rien gâcher nous avons pu garer notre voiture dans le parking souterrain de la résidence!

I stayed here with my husband for 5 nights. It's very clean and spacious for two people. Supermarket and metro station is nearby and it takes about 20 minutes to walk to the historic center(not too far, but on the way back home, it feels a bit tiring..)  Daniel always tries to help me with any trouble. We enjoyed the stay. :)

Apartment fully met our expectations, well equipped kitchen, washing machine, fast WiFi. The apartment was well equipped with all the amenities and conveniences that allowed for a comfortable and pleasant week long stay in Porto. Additional advantage of this large apartment in our case was an underground parking place. Located close to the center of Porto, near the metro station and shops. The only downside was the poor sound insulation of the sliding windows, but this was a characteristic of the whole building.
Apartment Daniel & Maria is a good offer and worth recommending to visitors to the city of Porto and surroundings.
Regards, Christopher

Très bel appartement très propre, lumineux, et spacieux. Possibilité de stationner la voiture dans un parking souterrain sécurisé. Bien situé en haut d'une rue commerçante menant au centre de Porto. Excellent accueil de Daniel et Maria. Rien à redire. Je recommande sans problème cet appartement.

L'appartement est très bien localisé. Vous êtes à deux minutes de la station Marques, et à deux stations de Trindade qui vous permettra de prendre n'importe quelle ligne, et donc de vous rendre à peu près partout dans la ville.
L'appartement n'est pas dans la partie la plus touristique de la ville, et vous pouvez donc profiter sur place des tarifs locaux, et donc d'un coût de la vie plutôt intéressant dans le cadre de votre visite touristique. Un pingo doce (petit magasin pour faire vos courses) se trouve à 5 minutes.
En revanche, l'appartement donne sur une rue à fort passage, et un bar/boite de nuit se trouve à quelques mètres. Sachez que les lois sur le bruit ne sont clairement pas les mêmes qu'en France, et qu'il pourra donc vous arriver de reconnaître depuis votre lit la musique qui passe, lorsque par exemple des clients oublient de fermer les portes de l'établissement. Malgré le fait que l'appartement ait été refait à neuf, le bâtiment en lui même n'est pas bien isolé pour le bruit extérieur, et cela peut parfois se faire sentir.
Je dirais que le problème de la musique s'est fait particulièrement ressentir lors d'une nuit. Si vous recherchez un silence absolu, passez votre chemin, mais un bon emplacement en ville et le calme plat se trouvent difficilement en un même lieu, donc rien de rédhibitoire à ce niveau là, je tenais juste à l'écrire pour qu'il n'y ait pas de mauvaise surprise.

Concernant l'appartement en lui même, il a vraiment été bien refait. La cuisine est plutôt bien équipée, il ne manque qu'un lave vaisselle (de par la présence d'une machine à laver) et un four. On notera par contre que la quantité de vaisselle pourrait être limitée si vous venez à 4.  Le salon est agréable, et la télé connectée vous permettra de vous occuper sur netflix ou youtube en rentrant de vos promenades le soir. La salle de bain avec sa baignoire était parfaite. Pour terminer, concernant la chambre, la literie était de bonne qualité même si le lit avait tendance à un peu grincer.

L'appartement était très propre à notre arrivée, et la semaine que nous avons passé sur place a vraiment été agréable. Daniel a su être disponible lorsque nous avions besoin de lui, même très tôt le matin lorsque nous sommes reparti.

Pour conclure, et suite à ma mésaventure, je me permettrais de vous donner le conseil suivant : au moment de rendre l'appartement, et donc de laisser les clés à l'intérieur pour ensuite claquer la porte, vérifiez au préalable que la porte du hall n'a pas été fermée à double tour. Cela vous évitera de devoir réveiller un voisin à 4h du matin pendant que le taxi vous attend.

O apartamento é ótimo. Nós adoramos. Tem um quarto grande e ensolarado com armários e sacada. Na sala um sofá cama que pode ser até para duas pessoas. A cozinha equipada e o banheiro bem espaçoso. A localização é ótima uma quadra da praça do marquês onde está o metro para a baixa. Perto também tem supermercado Pingo Doce.

Clean and fully equipped apartment close to underground station. 2.5 km from Luís I Bridge (nice walk on the famous Santa Catarina Street).

Small disadvantage- not well soundproof windows (every evening excluded weekend around 11pm we heard garbage truck). Although, I would recommend this apartment for families with children.

Obrigado!

Local excelente, com boa estrutura física e com um toque de cuidado e carinho. A estadia superou as minhas expectativas, pois além de estar muito próximo da estação do metro, há mercados, talhos, confeitarias, farmácias e outros por perto. O apartamento também está bem equipado e possui toda a estrutura necessária para passar bons momentos.
Tudo perfeito: otimo apartamento, boa localização, muito limpo e com tudo que é necessário.  Daniel e seus pais foram extremamente atenciosos.   Muito Obrigada.

Ótimo apartamento, organizado,bonito, estiloso  e limpo. Instalações novas. Fui recebida com muito carinho. 
Próximo ao metrô, restaurantes e bus.
Amei o local

Appartement très bien situé, 30 minutes de marche et on est rendu au Pont San Luis. De plus à moins de 5 minutes de marche du métro c'est un gros plus.
