Par contre la rue est très passante donc très bruyant de jour comme de nuit. Il y a plusieurs commerces restos à proximité. À part le bruit le seul commentaire négatif est que pour cuisiner l'équipement est rudimentaire.

Excelentes anfitriões e um apartamento maravilhoso. Muito bem equipado, confortável, limpo, moderno e com uma localização excelente. Para quem for a cidade do Porto, é uma ótima opção devido ao custo x benefício x localização.

We stayed for one month at Daniel & Maria's place, the apartment is perfect for short and long stays. It is equipped with everything you need to survive in a new city. 
Location is good, close to Marques metro station. In the area there are several shops, supermarkets and restaurants.
Ao lado do metrô, com elevador e totalmente bem montado e equipado. Sensacional!

Logement de taille correcte, très propre. Aménagé avec goût. Cependant, la rue est extrêmement bruyante, beaucoup de circulation même la nuit et des prostituées très proches parlent très fort jusqu'à tard dans la nuit.

The flat was really spacious, modern and clean, and in an apartment block with some lovely neighbours who helped us out when we needed it.  It's in a good location, a couple of minute walk from the metro and the supermarket, or a 20 minute walk into the centre of town - it's uphill on the way back so a bit longer!

Si vous avez la chance que l'on vous propose cet appartement n'hésitez pas. il est très propre, et très bien équipé. Vous y êtes comme chez vous..
Le métro n'est qu'à 300 m et une supérette à 500 m.
De plus, les propriétaire parlent Français.

L’appartement est beau, lumineux, très fonctionnel, bien équipé, la télé connectée est un vrai plus. 
Comme mentionné dans d’autres commentaires l’isolation des fenêtres n’est pas optimale mais la rue est calme, sur une semaine nous n’avons pas entendu de musique ou de bruits dérangeants. 
Il y a un grand supermarché Pingo Doce à 2 pas. 
L’appartement est à distance de l’agitation du centre ville, mais toute la ville reste très accessible, à 2 stations de Trindade où se recoupent toutes les lignes de métro,  4 stations de la gare de Sao Bento en plein centre historique, et par laquelle vous pouvez partir dans toute la région. 
Je recommande l’appartement de Daniel et Maria pour un séjour à Porto

The apartment was in a great location, and the private parking spot was a bonus even though there was street parking right in front it’s good to have a safe guaranteed space underground. The apartment was spacious and had everything we’d need for our stay. Couch was large and comfortable, the bed was comfortable. There was tv with many channels and wifi worked great. The washing machine was good to have but European washers are hard to understand so I’d ask Daniel or Maria how to use it before you use it! There’s a decent size terrace in the bedroom where you can hang your washed clothes. On the weekends it can get noisy outside as it’s so close to downtown but you quickly get over it. We did run out of toilet paper being there for 8 days, and we had to buy our own replacement, which is fair enough just a little inconvenient but overall a great experience it had everything we needed, would not hesitate to stay in their place again :)

A estadia foi muito agradável.  O apartamento é bem localizado, próximo à estação do metro,  com supermercado, farmácia e panificadora próximos.  O apartamento é amplo e muito confortável, exatamente como é demonstrado nas fotos,  com tudo que se precisa para uma estadia perfeita. O contato com os anfitriões sempre foi rápido,  com muita compreensão para os problemas de (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, quando retornar a Portugal,  vou solicitar o apartamento de Daniel e Maria.
Totalmente recomendable

Daniel & Maria's apartment is very sell situated not far from the city centre, coffee shops, bars, restaurants and metro.
The apartment is fully furnished, very clean and everything works well.
Since it is close to a main road, there is lots of movement during the rush time but otherwise we found the place very agreeable.
Relax and enjoy this home away from home.

Beautiful apartment, nice bed. The neighbors in the building are very quiet. Area feels very safe. Corner fruit/wine vendor is friendly. Get a 10 ticket Metro pass and it's so easy to get around, it covers the buses too. All of Porto is reachable in 15-20 minutes.

summary: Located at the heart of Kowloon, our unit is set on the residential side of bustling Mongkok and yet just a step away from a colorful, lively neighborhood surrounded by traditional shop and connected by public transports.
description: Located at the heart of Kowloon, our unit is set on the residential side of bustling Mongkok and yet just a step away from a colorful, lively neighborhood surrounded by traditional shop and connected by public transports.

name: Economy 2-beds room (308)
summary: A simple room equipped with a bunk bed, a short cabinet and chair. It is wonderful and economy for back packers to stay.  We are located exactly the centre of whole Hong Kong. It is accessible from HK Airport and all tourist spots. It is convenience.
description: A simple room equipped with a bunk bed, a short cabinet and chair. It is wonderful and economy for back packers to stay.  We are located exactly the centre of whole Hong Kong. It is accessible from HK Airport and all tourist spots. It is convenience.

host.host_about: Out-going and positive. Happy to talk to guests and exchange our difference in culture.

reviews.comments: This room was not available and he gave me another room in another place with a higher price. But the Another room is quite noisy and freezing.
房东很好,很热情,并且会说点普通话还是好沟通的｡地方位置也不错旁边就是地铁站,房间在香港不算小啦,我们2个人住箱子都可以打开,总之很划算性价比很高啦｡
感谢房主的热情招待,很愉快的香港之旅

name: Cozy apartment downtown Porto
summary: Renovated, fully equipped, within walking distance from monuments, art galleries, restaurants and bars Cedofeita is a pedestrian street full of small shops Supermarkets, bakery and pharmacy close Double bed room, 2px sofa
space: Very confortable apartment. Ideal for a long weekend to have a look to the Porto city. Very well located 5 minutes walk from restaurants, art galleries, churches, monuments (Torre dos Clérigos, Lello bookseller, Palácio de Cristal etc). You are in the center of the city in an area where you have a lot of things.
description: Renovated, fully equipped, within walking distance from monuments, art galleries, restaurants and bars Cedofeita is a pedestrian street full of small shops Supermarkets, bakery and pharmacy close Double bed room, 2px sofa Very confortable apartment. Ideal for a long weekend to have a look to the Porto city. Very well located 5 minutes walk from restaurants, art galleries, churches, monuments (Torre dos Clérigos, Lello bookseller, Palácio de Cristal etc). You are in the center of the city in an area where you have a lot of things. The whole apartment. You can contact me by email or phone. Just in the street 50 meters from the apartment Rua Miguel Bombarda where you find art galleries and some special stores. In the Cedofeita Street you have a lot of vintage shops, together with other more modern type of stores. Walking left the entry of the building you have Praça Carlos Alberto where on the weekends there is a small fair and you have several restaurants there. Walking through you have
neighborhood_overview: Just in the street 50 meters from the apartment Rua Miguel Bombarda where you find art galleries and some special stores. In the Cedofeita Street you have a lot of vintage shops, together with other more modern type of stores. Walking left the entry of the building you have Praça Carlos Alberto where on the weekends there is a small fair and you have several restaurants there. Walking through you have Praça dos Leões and Praça Lisboa where you have a lot of bars and restaurants. Quite near you have Torre dos Clérigos and Lello bookseller. If you want to explore more places you can visit the site: (URL HIDDEN)
notes: The apartment is in the 2nd floor without elevator...
transit: You have the metro nearby (Lapa Station) the walking way is flatter or(Estação da Trindade)  You have buses in Praça dos Leoes and Praça Lisboa (5 minutes walk) You have trains Estação São Bento (very nice with a lot of beautiful tiles)(15 minutes walk) Also for Taxis you have near Praça dos Leoes (in front of the churches)
access: The whole apartment.
interaction: You can contact me by email or phone.
house_rules: Non smoking.  The hosts are supposed to leave Studio as they found it  (clean and in good  order). No garbage inside. If anything  was broken  should be noticed  and  paid.

host.host_about: Não poderia viver sem sol, boas amizades e dormir bem

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Ana and her flat are just greatly located and furnished. Very bright and spacious with a nice balcony on the court yard, this is a dream flat to discover the delicious city of Porto. We had the beginning of New Year's Eve at the flat and it was just perfect for a cosy party!! 
Also Rua de Cedofeita is a very nice street down town and all amenities and great bars and restaurants are around (especially at Clerigos and around the Tower, Lelló bookshop and all).
To people who think Porto is quite small and with not a lot to see, I would say it is untrue and at least a week or two are necessary to fully enjoy Porto, which is why Ana can count us on very soon to taste Porto, its wines, food and life.
Obrigado por tudo Ana!

The apartment was wonderful, clean, bright, quite and cosy. It has everything you need. It is also placed in a great location, central but not too busy. Shops and Restaurants are nearby and the public transports are only minutes away. Most of the major spots are also within walking distance. All in all it is a fantastic starting point to explore this wonderful city. Ana is an outstanding host, very helpful and nice! We felt very welcome from the beginning on and had a wonderful time. Thank you very much Ana!
Bonne communication, bon appartement mais très bruyant de plus le wifi de l'appartement se partage avec tous l'immeuble (!!!), donc ne pas éteindre la box sous peine de se faire réveiller !

We stayed in the apartment for three nights and it was perfect. Its next to the city center. Ana was very helpful and the apartment was clean and cosy. Also there is a nice bakery next to the apartment. Thank you Ana, if we come to Porto again we would stay there again.
Highly recommended! Beautiful flat, even better than pictures. Very well located and Ana was very kind with us. Five stars! Thank you
Ana est une hôte très arrangeante et prévenante. Elle nous a accueilli dans un appartement charmant et calme que je vous recommande vivement.

Séjour très agréable dans l'appartement d'Ana, que nous n'avons pas pu hélas rencontrer mais avec qui nous étions en contact permanent, avant et pendant le séjour.
L'appartement est très agréable, très soigné et très bien situé. Nous avons pu tout visiter à pieds et profiter des petits restos des rues voisines.
Nous y reviendrons en famille!
Appartement très bien localisé, dans une rue commerçante très agréable. Le logement est propre et très confortable. Un excellent accueil de la part d'Ana. À réserver les yeux fermés !!

Ana nos acogió muy bien y tuvo mucha paciencia con nuestro cambio de horario de llegada. Es una señora adorable y además habla inglés y francés sin problema.

La localización del piso, idónea. Todo puede visitarse a pie.

Es una segunda planta en un edificio antiguo pero bien conservado. El piso está renovado con materiales y electrodomésticos de calidad en baño y cocina. La decoración está hecha con gusto y hace que uno se sienta en casa en seguida.

Mención especial para la cama, extremadamente cómoda, y la ropa de cama, pulcra y muy agradable. Además la limpieza, impecable.

Muy recomendable.
Foi uma experiência incrível! O apartamento da Ana é lindo, tal qual as fotos, muito luminosos e aconchegante! Voltaremos com toda certeza!

We had a great stay in Ana's flat. She is a great host and the flat had everything we needed. It is in a lovely part of town, within walking distance of everything but away from the main drag of Porto old town on a really nice pedestrianised street. The flat is gorgeous - even better than it looks on the photos. We had a great time here and would stay again if we make a return visit.

Ana est une hôte très sympathique et très arrangeante, elle nous a attendu malgré un retard d'une heure lors de notre arrivée! Son appartement est vraiment identique aux photos, il est très bien équipé et très bien situé. Le quartier est vraiment agréable et un bon point de départ pour arpenter la ville. Porto est une ville magnifique, une belle découverte!
Ana is a great host. She helped us a lot during our stay. The flat is really nice, clean and quiet, very close to local amenities and  would recommend it to anyone. Thank you Ana!

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, tranquilo da a un patio muy verde...y está en un barrio muy concurrido. Limpio, equipado y con una decoración muy bonita... Ana ha sido muy amable y nos explicó "cositas"...gracias!

We had a great stay in Ana's flat. When we checked-in, we got a key from her friend because Ana had an other appointment. But she also explained about her house by friend's phone.  However after day she came to house for welcoming us by person. She is very sweet and thoughtful.
Her house is really nice more than photos. It is very well equipped. 
The neighbor's atmosphere is so nice to look around. There are good restaurant, cafe, hand-craft shop and so on. We enjoyed a lot. Thank you so much Ana!( And Happy birthday!)

On vient de passer 3 magnifiques jours à Porto et ceci en partie grâce au super logement qu'Ana nous a offert. Son appartement est parfait,  mieux que sur les photos et à 2 pas du centre historique de Porto. On recommencera l'appartement d'Ana à tous nos amis qui aimeraient visiter un jour cette ville de rêves.

Mieux ? C'est pas possible !
Ana est une personne très gentille est vraiment attentionnée.
Tout a été parfait. Son appartement, du jamais vu pour moi. Top, propre, grand, refait à neuf, salle de bain nickel. Merci Ana pour nous avoir hébergés. Ah oui, j'allais oublier, il est idéalement situé, proche de tout à pieds.
Une adresse en or !!!
Merci Ana.

Ana was a fantastic host, she picked us up from the Airport and was helpful throughout our stay.

Ana's flat is in a great location, walking distance to the city and all the main tourist attractions and sights. The flat itself was perfect for what we wanted, clean and with everything you could need for a visit to Porto. 

The flat was a great place to chill out after wandering around Porto for the day.

100% recommend at stay here and if we go back to Porto we would be looking up Ana again.

We had a wonderful stay at Ana's apartment for four nights. She made us feel very welcome and it was just as beautiful as the pictures suggest. We particularly loved the balcony, it was really sunny in the mornings and great to have breakfast on. Location is great, no more than a 10 minute walk from any of the main sites in Porto and very easy to get to from the airport. Also has a mini supermarket and a drugstore on the same road which was very helpful. Wish we could have stayed longer!

Ana met us at the apartment and waited for us when we had a transport delay and was very friendly.
The apartment was beautiful - the pictures, whilst nice, don't do it justice, with its lovely high ceilings.
The location is great, 10 minutes walk from the metro that runs directly to the airport, and a short walk from all of the sights in the centre of town.

First time visiting Porto, we were wondering where to stay. We decided to stay in the center and contacted Ana.  Ana made us feel very welcome and she was genuinely an amazing host. We had planned to arrive in the afternoon from UK but our flight was delayed for more than 2 hours. Not only she planned our way to and from the airport but she made sure I would have a lovely time for my birthday. The flat is incredible and really cosy, with a balcony.  We will visit Porto and Ana again! I definitely recommend this flat and host, as well as this town for the amazing sunset, the friendly  smiling people and the great food.

Bonjour,
Nous avons passés un agréable séjour à Porto dans l'appartement d'Ana. 
Il est très bien situé, l'acceuil fût sympathique et Ana à notre écoute lors de petits problèmes.
L'appartement est plaisant et le balcon est un réel plus.
Encore merci à elle.

Une expérience unique dans un quartier agréable ! Un appartement très bien situé, proche du centre de Porto ! Parfait pour les courts séjours ! 
Ana est très gentille et nous a aiguillé tout au long de notre voyage !

Wir waren zum ersten Mal in Porto und wurden gleich zu Beginn sehr herzlich von Ana empfangen. Sie hat uns tolle Tipps zum Einkaufen, Essen gehen und praktische Infos gegeben. Außerdem war sie immer gut erreichbar und hat uns auch kurzfristig weitergeholfen, bspw. mit Strandtüchern. Sie ist wirklich eine perfekte Gastgeberin! Wir haben uns auch dank ihr sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist außerdem super gemütlich und für 2 Personen perfekt von der Größe her! Wir haben 8 Nächte in Ana's Wohnung verbracht und wären gerne länger geblieben. Die Lage ist wirklich unschlagbar. Man ist eher im "Künstlerviertel" als auf der Touristenmeile und trotzdem ist alles fußläufig erreichbar. Schön ist auch, dass die Wohnung sich in einer Fußgängerzone befindet und gleich vor der Tür schöne Cafés sind. Das einzige kleine Manko ist, dass man Nachts häufig den Lärm der feiernden Meute hört. Schlafen mit offenem Fenster ist also eher schwierig und bei uns war es sehr heiß in Porto. Wir würden trotzdem wiederkommen und waren sicherlich nicht zum letzten Mal in Porto!
Great to stay in Ana's appartment. We feld us really welcome.

One of the best airbnb-experiences!

Thanks to Ana we had a beautiful time in Porto. It started with her friendly welcome and she was very easy to communicate with,  before /during our stay. She answered quickly if there were questions. We had a very comfortable stay in Anas apartment. You can find there  everything you need-  it's very well equipped and close to the metro, shops or bars in this area. Our expectations were topped - highly recommended!
Appartement tres agréable et bien situé. Le canapé convertible est confortable. Ana nous a très bien accueilli.

Ana's apartment is spacious, elegant and comfortable.  Ana is a great host.  Her place is in a nice neighborhood on a pleasant street with just pedestrian traffic.  We had a very nice time visiting Porto.

We had a great time in Porto and really enjoyed our stay in Ana's appartement ! Lovely place, well equiped and very clean. Easy to come, easy to leave with her organisation. We also appreciated the good location and the little tips.
Thanks for that :)

Très bel appartement, fidèle aux photos, et très bien équipé, parfait pour notre séjour d'une semaine à Porto. Ana a été très accueillante et soucieuse de savoir si tout allait bien au cours du séjour.

The apartment was beautiful, in a really great position, in a street full of life.
We had the best dinners in the table outside! It's really the perfect stay in summer even for a long period of time!

Ana is available for everything you need, and she was available also to have the house cleaned in the middle of the stay.

Really perfect!
Anaはとても親切で､良い人です｡ｱﾊﾟｰﾄは清潔で､すごく居心地が良いです｡町の中心から遠くない場所で､夜に出かけてもすぐに帰ってこられます｡中心に近いですが､静かで良い場所です｡周囲にｽｰﾊﾟｰﾏｰｹｯﾄはあまりたくさんありません｡周囲にはﾊﾟﾝ屋さん､小さな服屋さん､ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝがあります｡ただ､週末は多くの人が夜遅くまで歩いていて､ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝを探すのは少し難しいです｡
We had a really nice stay at Ana´a apartment - we had everything we needed! Thank you a lot Ana!! :-) Best wishes , Alan & Christina

Ana was very helpful.  The building was quiet and we were not disturbed by any of the other occupants.  We liked the neighbourhood and found the apartment most convenient for shopping and the metro connection to the airport.

Die Unterkunft war sehr gepflegt, sauber und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. 
Eine Flasche Wasser stand bei unserer Ankunft bereit und auch sonst war Ana sehr freundlich und auch beim Checkout zeitlich flexibel. Die Wohnung ist ideal für 2 Personen, ginge aber auch für 4. Der kleine Balkon war gemütlicher als gedacht und hatte Morgensonne für den 1. Tee. Für die sehr zentrale Lage war es ausgesprochen ruhig. Wenn die Fenster geschlossen waren, war sogar gar nichts zu hören. Insgesamt haben wir uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden die Wohnung jederzeit wieder buchen. Alles in allem ein wunderbarer Aufenthalt!
A awsome flat which is clean, calm and very well located.

We very much enjoyed our stay at Ana`s Airbnb! Having some rainy days in Porto, we were lucky to have found such a cosy apartment where we could hang around during the afternoon to hide from the October weather. 

The neighborhood was perfect for getting to know Porto and some drinks and good food in the evening.

Ana is really kind and available.
The apartment is greater than on the pictures, sunny and calm.
Location is perfect.
Highly recommanded !

We spent a really great time at Ana's house. The apartment was really clean, nice and cozy; the situation is excellent and Ana is an amazing owner. We love her, her house and Oporto; hope to come back soon.

The location was AMAZING and quite central. You literally walk outside and are on a street with shopping and restaurants. The neighborhood was happening, yet quiet. Communication with the host was easy and she is quite pleasant. The apartment is as described and spacious.
Appartement idéal pour séjourner à Porto, propre et confortable, bien situé pour tout  visiter à pied. Excellents conseils de la part d'Ana. Je vous le recommande sans hésiter.

L'appartement d'Ana est idéalement situé, très agréable, spacieux, propre, bien équipé. Nous avons beaucoup aimé la rencontre avec Ana et sa décoration très personnelle. Nous étions heureux de partir découvrir la ville mais aussi enchantés de rentrer retrouver le confort cocoon de l'appartement. Nous nous sentions comme chez nous.

The locations was just great. The apartment has everything you need and was very clean. 
Everything is close by, good restaurants, nice bars, city center. If I come back to Porto I would definitely stay here again.

Vietimme mukavat kaksiviikkoa Anan huoneistossa maaliskuussa 2017. Huoneisto oli oikein viihtyisä ja käytännöllinen. Keittiö oli hyvin varusteltu. Asunnosta oli helppo kävellä kaikkiin paikallisiin nähtävyyksiin. Suosittelen.
Belle endroit pour profiter de Porto. Nous y avons passé un séjour très agréable. L'hôte est avenant et à l'écoute. Merci pour tout.
Excellent logement : clean, pratique, mignon, bien situé. Ana est très sympa.

The best place to stay in Porto! Walking distance to main atractions, (train station 10 min). We took one day trip to Aveiro - must, if you heve spare day.
Good wifi. 
Very nice, clean and elegant apartament. 
Very quite. 
Very good nightlife, mixed ages. 
I would definately stay there again:)

Bel appartement ancien, très bien rénové, clair, agrémenté d'une petite terrasse et très calme (les pièces donnent sur l'arrière de la rue piétonne). Le centre historique est à deux pas, de nombreux commerces et sites touristiques sont accessibles à pied. Communication facile et agréable avec Ana qui a répondu rapidement à chacune de nos interrogations. A recommander vivement !
Great place, everything there you need and a balcony for sunny breakfasts! Location coudn`t be more central, check out bar 77 for a drink (just around the corner)
El apartamento está ubicado en la mejor zona. Sobre una peatonal, es silencioso y está impecable. La cordialidad insuperable.

Appartement idéalement situé,
À la fois calme et animé.
Très bien décoré et fonctionnel.
Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine à Porto et ses alentours ; vallée du Douro, Aveiro...
A recommander.
Très agréable appartement joliment décoré  bien situé à proximité des principaux centres d'intérêts de Porto.A recommander.

The apartment is luminous, spacious and clean ! The balcony all along the apartment offer a peacefull view to gardens ! 
The location of the apartment is perfect, nearby every touristic place by foot as Miragaia, Bolhao, Ribeiro district. 
Ana was a really welcoming person, receptive to any questions. 
We had a great time with our family in Porto !!! 
Edwin

Ana's apartment was lovely and light filled, exactly as described and photographed. It's very centrally located on a pedestrianised shopping street with excellent cafes, restaurants and bars. The shutters and French doors provide great noise insulation, however, so we weren't disturbed by sounds outside the apartment. As we were a group it was helpful that the kitchen, bathroom and terrace can all be separately accessed without needing to walk through the lounge. We very much enjoyed the sunny terrace and letting the light flood through the apartment in the mornings.

Absolutely terrific! Perfect location. Neighbourhood was the best place to stay in Porto for us: very much alive but still quite calm and everything is nearby. The apartment is in an immaculate state. Beautiful, comfortable, clean, well-equipped. Lovely little balcony. Ana was very helpful and kind.

My girlfriend and I had a wonderful two week stay in Porto. Ana's apartment was centrally located with an easy walk to anywhere of interest in town. The apartment was very spacious and comfortable. The porch was fantastic, looking over a peaceful setting, very quiet at night. Restaurants and shops were just outside the front of the apartment building. Communication was great before and during our stay, with professional maid service available for our long stay. Highly recommend, Porto is a beautiful city.

L'appartement est très agréable. Il est situé dans un quartier vivant, mais son orientation garantit le calme. Il a a aussi l'avantage d'être proche des principaux sites à visiter. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour ! A recommander.

Opinion conforme à toutes les précédentes ! Appartement idéalement situé, très agréable, spacieux, propre, bien équipé. Surtout donnant sur cour et donc très calme (à part les bruits éloignés d'une rue très animée vers l'arrière le samedi soir). La petite terrasse à l'arrière et la vision vers des arbres un peu au loin donnent encore plus d'ouverture à l'appartement. Nous étions heureux de rentrer retrouver le confort cosy de l'appartement après nos déambulations dans Porto ou même à tout moment de la journée. Pas pu rencontrer notre hôte car hospitalisée, mais elle était quand même disponible au téléphone. Bref, un sans faute !

Ana's apartment is superb to discover Porto: very well located central but still quiet to the back Near good Cafés and restaurants 
Well equipped and very clean
Communication with Ana was very nice and efficient She also has prepared a sheet of paper with recommendations WLAN was working very good
Only parking is not the easiest... and i am still not sure if the recommended parking garage for 12,4€ per day is the only option
Still: Ana's place is very much to recommend!

El apartamento es excepcional . Precioso , no le falta detalle alguno . Y lo mejor la situación . Al lado del centro de Oporto y de la estación de San Bento que a nosotros particularmente nos ha venido de maravilla para visitar los pueblos de alrededores .
Muchas gracias por vuestra amabilidad . Si volvemos a Oporto repetiremos sin pensar . 
Saludos 
Flores y Rafa
Muchas gracias por todo la casa preciosa y el lugar perfecto para ir a todos sitios a pie. Y las recomendaciones de Ana todo un detalle, nos ha encantado volveríamos a repetir!!
We had a great time in Porto staying 5 nights at Ana's place. The flat is very nice and looks excactly as described. Plus there are plenty of restaurants close by. Highly recommended!
The apartment ist very well and central located, but unfortunately there is a bar nearby, that is quite loud at night. Luckily we went out late ourselves, so it wasn't too bad. ;-)

Ana's apartment is well located, organized and clean. Although we hadn't met Ana in person , but the whole contact with her was all quick responded and helpful. She has also left a piece of paper for useful Infos and restaurants!
Ana's place is great! Photos are accurate and the location of the apartment makes this a brilliant place to stay

Very fresh and nice small apartment, well located on a pedestrian street close to the center. All communication with the host was smooth. The only issue was that it was a bit noisy outside, mainly due to some close-by bar. Would stay there again.

The apartment was great, spotlessly clean. Its location is perfect, on a pedestrianised street right in the heart of Porto. Ana is a great host, welcoming and friendly. Would heartily recommend this accommodation.

We loved this apartment. Right in the middle of a happening pedestrian street, but remarkably quiet, as it faces the back. Lots of natural light, full of character, and very spacious, with everything you need to feel at home. In fact, I could see myself living here! Obrigada, Ana, for making our stay in Porto such a wonderful one ... we'll be back!
Very! nice apartment close to the heart of Porto!
Beautiful apartment in a perfect location. Couldn't have asked for better! Thank you :)
La casa de Ana tiene muchísimo encanto. Tanto el edificio, como el barrio y la propia casa. Super bien situado. Está cuidado hasta el último detalle y Ana nos atendió fenomenal. Gracias
This is a wonderful place for visiting Porto. The apartment is very quiet, beautiful, well equipped, with views on gardens; quite a paradise.
Nice apartment, centrally located, river Douro about 15 min. walking distance. Ana is a fast communicator and helpful if anything comes up.
La casa es ideal, estaba todo muy limpio y la ubicación muy buena

The apartment is in the center,you can get almost everywhere by foot. The house is older but everything is renovated and the equipment in the kitchen and bathroom is clean and modern. It is very spacious for two people, nicely decorated and we felt at home right away. My wife and I will definitely consider Ana's apartment again if we travel to Porto in the future.
An amazing apartment. So quiet and a great location. Perfect for walking to all the major attractions. Ana and Guilherme were great hosts and communication was brilliant. We would definitely return.
Clean and bright space in a great part of town which is close to all the main sights but slightly off the tourist trail so we could enjoy some of the more local haunts and interesting places.
El apartamento muy comodo, bien ubicado. Y la atencion genial! Los que nos recogieron Muy amables y simpáticos y atentos. Lo recomendamos sin duda!
Great host, great location great fun!

Super appartement op een top locatie! Het appartement is erg compleet. Het heeft een fijne slaapkamer en badkamer en de keuken is voorzien van alle gemakken. Koffie/thee etc. is aanwezig bij aankomst zodat je al lekker even kan 'thuiskomen' als je s'avonds aankomt. De communicatie met Ana en Guilherme verliep erg soepel, ze zijn erg vriendelijk en gastvrij. Ook de tips die ze gaven waren erg leuk en zeer welkom. Kortom een top plek voor een mooie prijs.

Such a brilliant apartment, centrally located yet very quiet. All very clean and comfortable. Guilherme was an excellent host so that arrival and departure were very easy- great communication too.
Highly recommended!

A lovely, sunny, peaceful flat in a great location. Great parks, cafes and bars nearby and easy walking distance to the rest of Porto. Ana, Guilherme and Francisca couldn't have been more helpful . Thanks very much!!

Ana's apartment was in an ideal location, easy to get to from the airport and back to from all the different parts of town with lovely bakeries and restaurants nearby. It was clean, comfy and quiet. Thanks so much!

Appartement idéalement situé, à 10 minutes à pied du centre et très très calme. Le petit balcon permet de prendre les petits déjeuner dehors. L'appartement est très bien équipé et très propre. Guihlerme nous a accueillis, très ponctuel et nous a donné tous les renseignements nécessaires. Un seul mot: parfait!

Un appartement très confortable et lumineux où il ne manquait de rien, non loin des quartiers à voir.
Ana et Guilherme savent accueillir et vous mettre à l’aise. 
Nous y reviendrions avec grand plaisir.

Die Wohnung hat eine ganz tolle Lage, sehr zentral, in der direkten Nähe von Restaurants, Bäckereien, Apotheken, etc. Es ist sehr ruhig im Appartment und die Ausstattung lässt ebenfalls nichts zu wünschen übrig. Die Kommunikation klappte ebenfalls bestens. Vielen Dank, wir würden jederzeit wieder bei Ihnen einchecken!

Ana's apartment is perfect.  It is situated on a really cool street with lots of cafes and other shops.  You can walk to all the attractions (although it is a bit of a hill coming back but nothing too bad).  The apartment is  beautifully decorated and very clean.  It was really quiet at night.  If you get the chance to go to Tapabento for a meal then do.  You need to book but it was a really lovely meal.

Thank you Ana and  Guilherme for being such great hosts.

Logement très bien placé au centre de porto, dans un quartier calme, bien équipé 
Isolation phonique imparfaite mais les voisins sont silencieux 
Idéal pour visiter la ville

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour. L'endroit est calme et idéalement situé. Depuis l'appartement, il est possible de visiter Porto à pied. Proximité des commerces, restos et transports. Je recommande vivement. De plus, la communication avec Ana et son mari est très aisé. Si je retourne à Porto, je choisirai ce logement sans hésitation.

The apartment from Ana was very nice and cozy. We stayed in 2nd floor and it was quite with closed windows. Anyways it was not noise as same are mentioned in their reviews. It is in the near from all sightseeing places and you can walk to them. And in the middle of a small shopping street. Also a lot of restaurants are in the area and pubs. We enjoyed our stay there and her son was also very kind and supportive. Thanks again for the great place. We enjoyed our stay...

Perfect location for exploring Porto! Right on top of a pedestrianised street with lots of lovely restaurants and cafes. Would highly recommend as the apartment is 5 minutes walk into the main part town and then a bit further to the river. Very helpful hosts who went out of their way to ensure our comfort! Thank you we will definitely be back to visit!
Beautiful spacious apartment in an unbeatable location. Charming and very clean from the moment you enter the building. Balcony - a nice treat to look out onto green space in the middle of the city!
Très bel appartement, avec beaucoup de charme. Il est très bien situé, toutes les visites peuvent se faire facilement à pied. Merci à Ana pour son accueil. Nous reviendrons
Every thing was perfect. Muy Obrigado to you Ana, It is a very good place to have a good time in Porto!!

Ana's apartment was really wonderful, on a lovely pedestrian street and very close to great cafes, restaurants, bars -- though a bit outside of the main tourist areas which we really appreciated. We were able to walk to most everything we wanted to see in the city. There was lots of beautiful light in the living room and bedroom and it was nice to be able to open up the big doors for a breeze. Guilherme greeted us and was so welcoming and helpful. Great communication with both Ana and Guilherme. Would recommend.

Lovely apartment and really friendly hosts. The apartment was clean, tidy, airy and was a really nice place to stay. The location is perfect - near shops, restaurants and bars - but the rooms were nice and quiet. It was great to be central but still have somewhere quiet and relaxing to be.  Guilherme was really helpful with check-in etc and gave us some great recommendations of nearby places. His two vegetarian restaurant suggestions were great - we tried both of them and they were lovely! 
Really nice place to stay, nicely decorated and spacious, clean and in a nice part of town with plenty of things to do on the doorstep. Our favourite things locally were Ó! Galeria  (Small Art Gallery/Shop) and Sabores do Sebouh (Syrian Restaurant). Lovely place to stay!

Logement à recommander sans modération : confortable,  charmant , très bien situé , calme avec en plus une petite terrasse en plein centre ville ...
Nous gardons cette (Website hidden by Airbnb) nous la recommanderons .
A beautiful, clean and brilliantly located flat in Porto. Ana and Guilherme are accommodating and very helpful. We had a wonderful time.

Appartement bien situé (mis à part le bruit la nuit), près de Sao Bento. Appartement mignon et bien divisé. J'ai apprécié le balcon pour y prendre le déjeuner. Toutefois, il fait un peu chaud et le fait de ne pas avoir de climatisation oblige à dormir les fenêtres ouvertes. Le ventilateur a permis de limiter le bruit venant de la petite rue à proximité (jeunes faisant la fête jusqu'aux aurores) . Merci Ana pour votre accueil.
Such a lovely airbnb. So beautiful and spacious. Ana and Guilherme were so friendly and helpful and really helped to make our trip so wonderful. wouldn't hesitate to stay again!
The location is good, very convenient to go everywhere. Highly recommend.

The house is very beautifully designed and in nice location, walking distance to all the main sights in Porto. Ana was quick to respond to all emails. We had a great stay in the house. Would definitely recommend it to others.
매우 깨끗하게 관리되고 있는 집이에요. 역과는 약간 거리가 있지만 도시 자체가 작아서 다니기 좋았어요. 마지막 날 짐 보관이 안된다는 사실때문에 고생 하긴 했지만 호스트 분이 나름 열심히 신경 써주셨어요.
A great base for exploring Porto on foot. Comfortable spacious accommodation with strong Wifi. Would happily stay here again

We had a great time in Porto in Ana's lovely apartment which was very well located,  clean and quiet.  A well designed  space to relax in with a nice view after sightseeing. Communicating with  Guilherme was easy,  he was very welcoming and happy to be available should we need anything.  Would highly recommend anyone to stay here.
Sehr zentral gelegen . Sehr ruhig .
Je vous le recommande pour la dimension de l'appartement et la localisation. Tres bien situé pour le TOUT Porto.

name: Kadıköy-Altıyol
summary: Kadıköy merkezde 2+1 dairem vardır.Çok kalabalık olmadığı takdirde 2 kişiden fazla da kalınabilir.
description: Kadıköy merkezde 2+1 dairem vardır.Çok kalabalık olmadığı takdirde 2 kişiden fazla da kalınabilir.

name: The best suite in Copacabana (total privacy)
summary: Excellent private suite with bathroom at the Apart Hotel Real Residence, very close to Copacabana beach, metro, shoppings and Sugar Loaf.   Two single beds (can be put together), TV, Wi-Fi, air conditioner, fridge and microwave.  Extra mattress for a third person (additional fee) Daily room cleaning service included.  Apart hotel offers restaurant, gym, pool and a tourism agency. Reception employees speak English.
space: Beautiful suite with two beds, fridge, cable TV, microwave, Wi-Fi and air. Very well located close to Copacabana beach, shopping (Rio Sul), metro and Sugar Loaf. Room service included. Facilites of Apart Hotel Residence: restaurant, pool, 2 saunas, gym and fitness center.
description: Excellent private suite with bathroom at the Apart Hotel Real Residence, very close to Copacabana beach, metro, shoppings and Sugar Loaf.   Two single beds (can be put together), TV, Wi-Fi, air conditioner, fridge and microwave.  Extra mattress for a third person (additional fee) Daily room cleaning service included.  Apart hotel offers restaurant, gym, pool and a tourism agency. Reception employees speak English. Beautiful suite with two beds, fridge, cable TV, microwave, Wi-Fi and air. Very well located close to Copacabana beach, shopping (Rio Sul), metro and Sugar Loaf. Room service included. Facilites of Apart Hotel Residence: restaurant, pool, 2 saunas, gym and fitness center. The check in time is after 2 PM and check out until 11 AM. It is possible to change this, but it will depend on the reservations calendar and should be agreed in advance. 24-hour reception desk with bilingual personnel. I meet the guests for handover the keys but in exceptional cases they are left at the rec
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana beach is located in a district of the same name in the South of Rio. Copacabana has bike racks, bike path, kiosks, hotels, bars and restaurants frequented both day and night. It also has two military forts, one at each end of the beach, with panoramic views, open to visitation. Stage of the largest New Year’s Eve party on the planet with their fires known worldwide, Copacabana has more than two million people every passing year.
notes: El aparcamiento  puede ser utilizado a través de una tasa diaria. El huésped puede tratar directamente con la administración del Apart. (R$ 70,00/dia - ref. Jan/2018). El restaurante ofrece buffet en el desayuno. (R$ 18,90 – ref. Jan/2018).
transit: El Apart está muy bien comunicado con metro, autobuses y taxis. La líena de metro más cerca, estación Arco Verde, se encuentra a 10 min caminhando, cerca de 800m. Desde el Aeropuerto Internacional es posible llegar al Apart de bus (línea 2018) o taxi comun.
access: The check in time is after 2 PM and check out until 11 AM. It is possible to change this, but it will depend on the reservations calendar and should be agreed in advance. 24-hour reception desk with bilingual personnel.
interaction: I meet the guests for handover the keys but in exceptional cases they are left at the reception. I live nearby and I am always available to guide and help via phone or Whatsaap. There is a folder in the apartment that describes the main sights and how to get around visit them.
house_rules: Checked-in guests only.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Gosto muito de viajar e mostrar ou indicar locais para se conhecer no Rio. Sou fã e praticante de esportes e recomendo usufruir das oportunidades  para se praticar esportes que o Rio oferece (bicicleta, caminhada, beach tennis).

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Dumont was very helpful with tips and advise about Rio. The apartment is very modern and clean. And so close to Copacabana beach. Just 3 blocks away. It has the benifet of being in an aparthotel. More private than we were expecting given it is listed as a private room. This was more like a hotel room at a fraction of the cost. We would highly recommend and come again if we return to Rio.

We really loved our experience staying here. It was our first time to Brazil and we could not have picked a better place. The apartment is modern and clean and well equipped with en suite plus fridge and microwave. The apartment block is very swoosh with 24 hour reception and doorman, and the location is good too. It felt very safe and has excellent transport links on bus and metro within 2-5 minute walk, plus tourist information office is just 200 meters away. This is a very private space, just like a hotel room with maid service to come and clean each day. Downstairs is a place for buffet breakfast for ~$4.
Dumont and Sandra were very helpful too, keeping in touch with email with lots of great advice. It felt like home from home and we would definitely stay here again if we came back to Rio.

Maravilhosa experiencia em Copacabana, fora a localização que por si só já e maravilhosa, as instalações são ótimas, quarto harmonioso, confortável, ducha sensacional, ao lado de shopping e muito próximo a praia, nem usei o carro devido fácil localização. Anfitrião muito educado e prestativo. Super recomendo.
Super expérience à Rio dans l'apart hôtel de Sandra Dumont, très propre, bien placé; personne très serviable, très accueillante, très gentille, je recommande vivement

Fui uma ótima surpresa
Já conhecia Copacabana 
A localização do prédio é fantástica!
E acomodação perfeita
Um banho de ducha revigorante, ar silencioso e muito funcional.
Obrigado pela atenção ,hospedagem, espero regressar em breve e indicarei aos amigos.

Nos sentimos muy bien alojando en Suite de apart hotel CopaCabana, nuestra anfitriona, Sandra se preocupo por todo lo relacionado a nuestra estadía.

La descripción corresponde, caen cómodamente dos huésped, la playa está muy cerca al igual que el centro comercial, el metro está un poco más alejado. 

El barrio es tranquilo, transitamos sin problema en todo horario.

En resumen recomiendo el hospedaje.
Adoramos o apartamento! Eh bem-equipado, com tudo que precisa. A cama eh muito confortavel, o banheiro eh espacoso, e a localizacao eh otima. Sandra e Dumont nos receberam muito bem.
excelente acogida....sandra es una persona especial..,el sitio es muy bueno y central..,mejor de lo que me esperaba...

Excelente alojamiento, magnifica atencion, muy confortable y buena ubicacion, pudimos disfrutar de todos los servicios que ofrece el edificio (picina, gimnasio, restaurante), totalmente recomendado para pasar unas vacaciones espectaculares.
Perfect safe location in Rio. Great shower, A/C , cheap typical all you can eat breakfast and every day cleaning. Sandra was a great host, on time and helpful. I highly recommend this place.

Todo muy bien. Sandra nos ayudo con informacion desde que hicimos la reserva. El depto muy limpio lindo y en una perfecta ubicacion. Hay un restaurant maravilloso cerca, se llama cervantes. Muuy recomendado!!

O lugar realmente nos surpreendeu.
A descrição do apartamento é fiel ao que encontramos e o conforto é além do esperado (a cama é muito confortável).
Eu e minha esposa nos sentimos completamente a vontade.
Uma ótima localidade. Tem tudo que precisamos por perto: Praia, Shopping, Restaurantes, Bancos, Metrô.
Me surpreendeu a segurança do local. O hotel fica próximo ao túnel que dá acesso ao shopping e possui policiamento 24h.
A anfitriã Sandra foi super solícita com tudo que precisamos, inclusive no deu dicas de vários lugares e restaurantes.
Extremamente recomendado.

We had a wonderful stay at the apartment. When we checked in, Sandra was already waiting for us, patiently helping with the apartment and with useful hints. For laundry We can really recommend "Edna" just a block away from the apartment. The bathroom is all new and a real eyecatcher. Being in second row, the apartment is calm though close to the busy Av. Pr. Isabel. We enjoyed our stay very much and recommended the place to friends and collegues.

Sandra é ótima anfitriã, gentil e disposta a resolver
eventuais problemas.
Salio todo perfecto.

Gostei muito da localização, do silêncio, da boa infraestrutura do predio- residence  e, sobretudo, da atenção de Sandra, ajudando no esclarecimento de dúvidas e até  nas orientações  turísticas.  Recomendo a todos.
Very good experience

Adorei a hospedagem, a localização do hotel é ótima, tem uma variedade de restaurantes, além disso fica pertinho da praia, do pão de açúcar, do shopping rio sul e etc. A anfitriã Sandra é uma pessoa muito atenciosa, me recebeu muito bem e me ajudou no que precisei. Tenho certeza que, próxima vez que voltar do Rio, vou procurá- la novamente. Abç

Nossa experiência no Rio foi muito mais completa e maravilhosa graças a todo o carinho e atenção da Sandra.
O quarto era tudo o que nós precisávamos: espaçoso, limpo, aconchegante e pretíssimo da praia de Copacabana.
A localização do apartamento não poderia ter sido melhor: pertinho do Pão de Açúcar, do shopping e dois blocos da praia.
A Sandra foi muito atenciosa e nos deu todas as dicas para aproveitarmos o Rio.
Estamos planejando nossa volta para o Brasil, e ficaremos com a Sandra se viermos ao Rio :-)

Sandra and Dumont were a great host. They made it feel like home. They answered our questions and give us some advice and where to go. They made sure that we were doing great while we were in Rio. The studio was very clean. There's a housekeeper that cleans the room everyday (we only asked her to clean our room once in 4 nights). Wifi was fast. The location was awesome it's close to everywhere. 3 blocks from Copacabana beach, 3 mins walk to the mall, about 5 mins walk to Subway station. Definitely will stay here again. Thank you Dumont and Sandra!

Super recomendable! El departamento es súper cómodo, ellugar queda en una ubicación ideal, a 300 mtrs de la playa de Copacabana (límite con Leme) y próximo de muchas paradas tanto de colectivo como de metro (es muuut fácil y barato moverse en colectivo en Río). Sandra es una anfitriona de primera. Ni bien nos recibió nos recomendó atracciones y estuvo siempre a disposición. Más que recomendable!
Bem localizado, apartamento muito arrumado e as fotos descrevem perfeitamente o Apart.

Experiencia nota 10, apartamento muito bem localizado perto da praia e do shopping. Sem falar do conforto e da limpeza. A Sandra é uma ótima pessoa, sempre (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza irei voltar.

Fiquei muito satisfeito com o quarto, instalação ótima, conformo, tudo muito limpo e de boa qualidade. A localização é ótima e a anfitriã Sandra é excelente! Atenciosa, prestativa, nos deixou muito confortável antes, durante a estadia. Estou muito satisfeito e recomendo!!

The Dumonts are a wonderful host, my me feel like I was with family. I have a short stay, but all the way Sandra was in communication, giving tips in what to do in Rio de Janeiro and even reminded me that the International Airport was going to be chaotic with the Olympic games which allow me to arrive with proper time to take my flight.
The description is accurate, actually Sandra forgot to mention that it has swimming pool, gym and sauna. The location of the Hotel is very nice, close to the beach.

Adoramos a estadia no Rio com certeza voltaremos.
o apart é super bem localizado e a Sandra mto solicita em atender nossas duvidas. 
foi tudo otimo
The space had many amenities including a spacious, well-lit shower.  It is close to the beach and a great mall.  Reception was very helpful!

Suite descrita como anunciada. Muito fácil de chegar e muitas facilidades proximas.
Shopping Rio Sul muito proximo. Perto da Praia de Copacabana.

O local é melhor que a maioria dos hotéis que já me hospedei. É perfeito para duas pessoas, tudo funcionando, o chuveiro é excelente a localização não poderia melhor. Fui muito bem recebido pela Sandra e pelo Dumont que além de me explicarem o funcionamento do prédio e da suíte, me deram dicas sobre a cidade. Não tenho dúvidas de que quando voltar ao Rio, ficarei hospedado aqui novamente.

It was a great experience in the hearth of Copacabana, The location was perfect. Dumont and Sandra are very good hosts, The hotel facilities are nice. I hope I will be turn back to Rio De Janeiro anytime in my life again :)) Thanks Guys :))

Suite muito boa! 
Ótima localização. 
Anfitriã super atenciosa.

Excelente! O preço é muito bom, uma ótima localização, próximo de tudo, principalmente da praia. O apto é  limpo, o banheiro tem um ótimo chuveiro, muito confortável e bem equipado. Apesar de ser próximo da avenida o quarto é bem silencioso.
Os anfitriões são muito simpáticos e atenciosos.

Dumont's appartment was ideal for our needs. It is very conveniently situated near Copacabana beach and an easy walk to the metro and buses and the praca do Lido, where vans leave for Christ the redeemer. There are plenty of restaurents and supermarkets nearby.
We did not meet Dumont but checking in was easy at the reception desk and Dumont was very helpful by e mail and gave us good advice about where to go and getting to the airport. We would definitely stay there again.

Muito bom , Sandra muito prestativa ..exelente localização proximo da praia , restaurantes , shopping ,metrô muito bom mesmo , o apartamento é exelente chuveiro muito bom me atendeu muito  muito bem eu e minha esposa , recomendo com certeza .....

Localização muito boa! A Sandra foi super atenciosa em todos os momentos durante a estadia, Ainda nos forneceu muitas dicas interessantes. O quarto é exatamente o que estava descrito nos comentários e nas fotos.
Desde o início da reserva do muito bom alugar o apartamento. Sempre tivemos retorno, fomos bem recebidos e a preocupação com nossa estadia era diária. Nossos anfitriões sempre estavam disponíveis.

I had a great time with Dumont and Sandra! The appartment lies on a 10 minutes walk from Copacabana beach and close to everything you need like a little supermarket & restaurants. As I flew in in the weekend there was a big warm welcome and a spontanious invite to ride me through down town Rio and the surburbs on sundaymorning! I understand they are qualified as superhosts! There nothing less, thanks for a great time! I'll be sure coming back one time!

El departamento esta en un zona muy linda, muy cerquita de la palya y para moverte sin problema. 
Sandra fue muy agradable! me brindo un monton de información.

A great little apartment close to the beach & well located for other Rio attractions. Dumont was a great host, meetings me at check in and giving me tips of where to go and what to do. Totally recommend if visiting Rio!
Foi muito bom estar no RJ, num local tão bem localizado, confortável e com serviços de ótima qualidade
Muy linda suite. Muy buena ubicación. Excelente atención del anfitrión. Lo recomiendo.

Communication with the host was excellent.  The suite was exactly as expected, with everything in perfect working order.  The location is very good, within walking distance of Copacabana beach and a major shopping center.  Lots of good restaurants nearby too.  The wifi is first class - high speed and constant.  Bathroom large.  Air conditioning in perfect state.  Overall, a very comfortable option and excellent value for money.
Excelente Apart, la atención muy buena, la comida del bar muy rica y variada, gracias Sandra por la acogida y por la atención recibida, será hasta la próxima
La Suite tiene una excelente ubicación, Dumont y Sandra están pendientes de todos los detalles.

Dumont ist nicht nur sehr sehr netter Gastgeber, auch ein toller Mensch. Wir(2 Kollegen) waren in seinem Studio 2 Wochen. Er hat uns persönlich empfangen, uns die Stadt gezeigt und mit uns mehrmals getroffen. Bei jeder Angelegenheit war er hilfsbereit und sofort da. Ich bin begeistert und kann nur weiterempfehlen!

Danke schön für alles Amigo
A Sandra nos recebeu super bem. Foi muito atenciosa e prestativa. A localização do apart é ótima e segura. Limpeza nota 10. Adorei.

I dealt with Sandra who was very accommodating and a good host. She had good recommendations for our stay in Rio.

The apartment had all the basics that we needed, and was clean. The facilities in the building (gym and pool) were a good addition to our stay. 

The location was only a short walk to the beach in what felt like a safe neighbourhood. It is a little bit further away  from the main part of Copacabana, but still relatively close and only a cheap Uber fare away. It's also close to a subway station which was handy for when we did our sightseeing.

All in all a great place to stay with friendly hosts.
Apartamento limpo, confortável. Proprietária muito educada e preocupada com a minha estadia. O local é ótimo para turismos tanto para quem vai à trabalho.

Excelente todo! La ubicación es muy buena, a tres cuadras de la playa de Copacabana y con mucha locomoción. El check in y el check out fue muy cómodo y sencillo. El apartamento es tal como se muestra en las fotos, tiene todo lo indispensable para pasar una buena estadía. La ducha del baño es genial! Además de todo, Sandra es muy buena anfitriona y muy amable, se comunicó conmigo de manera justa y siempre con buena disposición. 
Todo genial! Sin duda alguna volveríamos aquí!
Small but great place with an amazing shower. I would definitely stay there again if I go back to Rio.
Receptividade nota 10. Foi muito bom.

Sandra's appartement is great. A good location and easy to access everything in the city. 
The staff was nice and Sandra even nicer with a lot of advice and reachable at anytime. 
I highly recommend this place if you are staying in Rio
Very good hosts!

Rio is an amazing city and Sandra was absolutely lovely! Everyone in the building was helpful and the bathroom and the overall facilities were very clean! Definitely walking distance to Copacabana beach (no more than 7 minutes by walking). As an experienced traveler, I would highly recommend staying here.
O espaço de Dumont é confortável e muito bem localizado, fomos à praia e ao shopping Rio Sul à pé, tudo muito prático e seguro.
O apart é muito bom, tem o necessário! É super bem localizado e a Sandra é ótima, super atenta e prestativa. Recomendo!

O Apart é igualzinho a foto, possui uma excelente localização. A Sandra é um amor de pessoa, sempre preocupada com o melhor dos hospedes. A limpeza é impecável, a portaria foi muito atenciosa e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ao voltar o Rio, será minha primeira opção. Obrigado Sandra!!!!
A Sandra é uma anfitriã maravilhosa, sempre solicita, responde com rapidez. O apart é uma graça, pertinho da praia de Copacabana e dá pra ir a pé pro shopping Rio Sul.

Minha primeira experiência com a Airbnb e no Rio de Janeiro e não podia ter sido mais feliz na escolha! Superou todas as expectativas desde o atendimento e comunicação com a Sandra, localização do apartamento, limpeza e todos os itens. Espero voltar mais vezes e super recomendo!
Excelente localização, Sandra y Dumont foi muito legal e o local é muito bom

This was an amazing stay and not enough words can be said about how nice Dumont and Sandra are. They go above and beyond to ensure comfort and a good stay. The room is more or less a hotel. It is serviced if you want it serviced. There are great amenities you can use like a nice gym (gym's in Rio are expensive so it is very worth it), saunas, a pool, pool table/ping pong tables, and onsite laundry at a reasonable price. The location is nice, as it is close to the beach but not too far of a drive from Centro. Cheap ubers get you around all of Rio quickly. Maybe a 7 minute walk to the beach. Restaurant downstairs is pretty good as well! On my next trip to Rio I will definitely see if this place is available.

Sandra was the perfect host. We could talk in english and spanish. Nothing typical in Brazil. Awesome (:. The flat is located directly at the Copacabana beach. Just 5 min walk straight to the beach. It's very clean and neat. Oh and never underestimate the Power of a perfect Shower, haha. The bathroom and Shower is just amazing. From the apartment you get fast to every location you want. For Rio newbees it's the perfect match to stay

O apartamento é ótimo! Fica bem perto da praia, além de ser super limpo e arrumado. 
O wi-fi funciona super bem e a Sandra responde super rápido se precisar de alguma coisa. Super recomendo!

This was a great flat, exactly what one needs for one week in Rio! Super close to the beach and various supermarkets, clean, cosy, confu bed and a good shower! The host was super welcoming and thoughtful (there was a note with our names and he length of our stay in the room and a “welcome” message). Couldn’t have asked for anything else!
Thanks you !
Buena ubicación , y el departamento muy bien
The hosts were very friendly and accommodating!

Sandra is a very nice host. She's very helpful and very responsive to all your query with regards to tourism and the area. My husband and i are having our honeymoon and she prepared a small welcome note and a bottle of wine for us. We appreciated it so much. The place is very near to the beach and accessible to everything. We love staying here. The room feels like 5 star hotel. 'Til next time. Cheers!

Muy bueno!. Habitación espaciosa, limpia, cama cómoda y la ducha muy buena también.
La ubicación es genial, especialmente si se quiere ir a la playa. Hay lugares para comer cerca, recomiendo “Galeto Sats”.
La atención de Sandra impecable, siempre atenta y disponible para nuestras inquietudes.

Flat em área tranquila no Rio de Janeiro e muito próximo a praia de Copacabana e ao shopping Rio Sul. Gostei muito da limpeza do local,  a facilidade e proximidade para visitar o Cristo e o Pão de Açúcar. Ao lado fica a praia do Leme e logo abaixo a praia de Ipanema e Leblon. Valeu a pena cada momento no Rio de Janeiro.
PS. A ducha do flat e extraordinária.
Muy cerca de la playa, limpieza excelente.
Um lugar simplesmente maravilhoso, boas acomodações, tudo muito limpo e a nossa anfitriã sempre muito cuidadosa!!!!
Great hosts. Very thoughtful. They offer you a list of things to do in the area. Tips on how to go about the city.

Me senti muito bem no apartamento! Check in e check out super práticos, prédio com portaria 24hs. Limpo e com ótima ducha! É exatamente o que o anuncio diz. O contato com a Sandra foi super tranquilo (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei a me hospedar no apartamento!

this apartment is great for one or two people. very clean, safe, helpful staff, quiet location, 5 blocks to beach, lotsa good restaurants and bars.I am told by locals that this area is the safest in rio. and of course the price wow .... I will return
vic
Muito bom

Super recomendo. Ótima localização, tudo muito limpo, do jeito que queríamos.
Ambiente seguro, tranquilo e com uma ducha maravilhosa!! Rs
Com toda certeza voltarei

lugar ciento por ciento recomendable, cerca a las playas de Copa Cabana, Ipanema y Botafogo, variedad de restaurantes, casas de cambio y agencias de turismo, buen transporte, sector seguro, desde y hasta el aeropuerto ruta bus azul no. 2018 por un módico precio.

A viagem foi definitivamente maravilhosa! Passei o feriado muito bem e foi um dos melhores aniversários que ja tive, amo o (Website hidden by Airbnb) relaçao ao espaço nao tenho queixas, muito limpo, confortavel e bem organizado. A localizaçao é perfeita, bem próximo da praia de Copacabana, e com shopping, mercado, farmacia, etc tudo muito perto. O hotel em si é muito bom e fomos muito bem atendidos sempre tanto pela Sandra e Dumont quanto pela equipe de atendimento do hotel. Além disso o hotel conta com uma piscina aquecida muito boa, sauna que sao ótimos depois de uma praia e um restanrante com comida boa e relativamente barata! Pude conhecer o Cristo, Pao de açúcar, Pedra do Arpoador, praias de Ipanema, Copacabana e Maracanã. Recomendo muito a todos pela ótima estadia que tive!

Espaço muito bom, a anfitriã Sandra foi muito atenciosa todo o tempo, infelizmente chegamos em plena reforma da academia e não usamos, mas fora isso foi tudo como combinado, a localização é excelente e a ducha no ap é simplesmente maravilhosa.
Excelente estadia, anfitrião muito simpático e prestativo em tudo que precisamos. Adoramos os três dias hospedados e voltaremos mais vezes, com certeza.

Sandra y Dumont muy preocupados de nosotros. El departamento queda a un par de cuadras de Copacabana prácticamente a pie. Todo muy limpio y nos ayudaron para encontrar paseos en Rio. Muy preocupados todo un 10 recomendado!!
Muy seguro y cómodo
Es la segunda vez que voy al departamento y todo estuvo genial. Excelente ubicacion, limpieza y atencion de la anfitriona. Saludos y hasta la proxima...
Value for money. Quite nice gym
너무좋아요 정말 리우가시는 분들 여기서묵으시면 숙소 때문에 속상하실 일은 없을거에여
Fomos muito bem atendidos e o local e excelente.
Tudo como foi combinado, amei cada detalhe. Super indico

Nuestra estadía fue genial. La habitación es muy cómoda, todos los detalles previstos y la ubicación es muy conveniente. 

La habitación contaba con detalles que nos fueron muy útiles como por ejemplo adaptadores.

Muy recomendable.
Ótimo custo beneficio, flat com uma ótima localização, pertinho da praia e shopping.

name: March Madness Special! Aina Nalu Platinum D107
summary: Walk out to Saltwater Infinity Pool! Call us NOW for Special Rates!
space: We invite you to come and stay in our upgraded condo just two blocks from famous Front Street!  Relax and enjoy Coconut Condos Poolside Premier Platinum 2bd/2ba Aina Nalu condo in Lahaina, Maui.   Walk out your back door to a green space and the beautiful Makai pool area!  846 sq. ft. for spacious living for up to 6 adults (king bed in master bedroom, queen bed in guest room, and queen sleeper sofa in the living room)   Designer furniture upgrades throughout the condo Custom bedding by Maka Sea, designed in Hawaii and made in Bali Cold Towel Amenity upon arrival in the condo Luxury spa products by Malie Organics, made in Hawaii 48” Flat screen TV in the living room Calphalon Cookware JA Henckel knife set Baby bundle amenities include a portable crib/sheet, booster seat, umbrella stroller, and outlet covers Beach bundle keeps you well stocked for your beach excursions with beach toys, beach chairs, beach umbrella, and cooler Activity Annex also includes DVD player, books, and board game

neighborhood_overview: -Located in the heart of Lahaina town and a short walk to Lahaina`s famous Front Street, Waterfront, Harbor, Shopping, and award-winning restaurants. -Just minutes from Ka`anapali beach resort area, world-class golf courses and the renowned Kapalua resort. -10 minutes from Kapalua Airport & 45 minutes from Kahului airport. -Walk to the beautiful Baby Beach, 505 Beach, Breakwall and Harbors surf breaks. -Puamana and Launiupoko beach parks and surf breaks within 5 minutes drive. -Located within Lahaina`s Historic District.
notes: Onsite parking at Aina Nalu is available for $20/day. This payment must be paid by Tuesday the week prior to your arrival. This is offered as a courtesy to you, as the process of purchasing a parking pass after arrival can sometimes be inconvenient. Purchasing the parking pass in advance will ensure that it is in your condo when you arrive. 	 In an effort to provide a more affordable option for our guests, we have negotiated a special "Coconut Condos Rate" with Republic Parking lot located at 129 Dickenson St. (at the corner of Dickenson and Waine’e). The rate is $10 per 24 hours. We will provide the required parking pass that must be visible on the dashboard of your car at all times for rate to be valid. You will find this parking pass in the information binder in your condo. There is free but limited street parking nearby, too.
transit: You can walk to most attractions within Lahaina and on Front Street! If you do want to travel around the island, Aina Nalu is just one block away from the Maui bus or you can easily work with a local taxi or car rental company for transportation needs.
interaction: We do most of our interaction through emails and phone calls but we are also on property every day. We also provide different ways to contact us, as we want to be accessible if you have any questions before or during your stay! We try to make checking in and out as easy as possible. When you make a reservation with us, we will send you a door code specific for your reservation and condo unit two weeks prior to your stay. You do not have to worry about losing a key or having to check in at a front desk!
house_rules: As a guest of Coconut Condos, I agree to the following terms and conditions: TERMS AND CONDITIONS 1. Agreement:  The Owners and Guests agree as follows: Guest is over the age of 21 and will be an occupant of the unit during the entire reserved period. Other occupants will be family members, friends, or responsible children. No door key codes or key will be issued to anyone other than the tenant listed on rental agreement. The maximum number of guests per 2bd/2ba condominium is limited to six (6) persons. The maximum number of guests per 1bd/1ba condominium is limited to four (4) persons. This property requires a (3) night minimum stay and longer stays may be required during holiday periods. Rates are subject to change without notice. 2. Pets:  In the event that your animal is a service animal, please send official documents to our office as soon as possible and we can register the paperwork. It is Coconut Condos policy that all Service animals are registered. It is Coconut Condos polic

reviews.comments: We had a great time and really enjoyed this condo that we rented. The description and pictures accurately described the place and it was easy to book, even when we only booked 24 hours prior to checking in. It was a quick into Lahaina (5 min) and would happily stay here again.
The location of the unit was great with the pool just steps outside the back door. Our family had a great experience and an enjoyable time.
Just as described

Great place to stay!! I picked this resort based on the reviews and the close proximity to town.  I have 2 teenagers and knew they would be walking back and fourth quite a bit.  The resort is beautiful and our condo D107 was perfect the back door opened out to the pool area and cabanas I loved it.  The showers were amazing and the entire unit was up to date.  I didn't realize you could get a fourth night free or I would have stayed another night before we moved on! Wonderful stay thank you so much!! We will return for sure

Everything about the place was great!  They had tons of beach stuff for us to use in the closet, a pack and play, a boogie board, beach towels, a cooler, an infant chair and even a stroller! The unit was 40' from the pool / Jacuzzi which means my wife and I could go sit in the water and the baby monitor was still in range.  The second pool was 4 doors down with a barbque area. The kitchen was FULLY stocked with everything we need to cook so it made life easier and Foodland supermarket (a great market with AWESOME poke) was a 1 minute drive away.  Walking into the town / Front street couldn't be easier and Baby beach was a very short drive away.  Since the unit has a code for entry, not having keys to deal with was a great benefit. The washer/dryer were fantastic to have since we have a 1 year old and a 4 year old and cloths get dirty often. We packed superlight and knew it would not be a problem.  Thank you for an amazing 2 weeks in your unit!

Stop looking )) it is a really nice place to stay. Everything as on pictures, and this room is close to the pool, far from the road. Don't worry about the parking - we stayed 10 days, parked for free in the street. Thank you for the stay!
Never heard of these condos before and we were very happy. Eccellent location!!!!

We truly enjoyed our "home away from home" especially the proximity to all Lahaina has to offer - quick walk to shopping, restaurants, sunset viewing spots & beaches! While we spent most days snorkeling and sunbathing in local beaches, it was good to have a cozy condo to return to each day. The direct pool access right from the back door was fantastic, too. Last but not least, very friendly staff on site :)
Great condo, felt like a resort.

This condo is perfect! Walking distance to coffee, restaurants, everything. It was so nice to open the back door to the pool, made it super easy with kids. Street parking was easy for all ten days, no need to pay for parking.
Nice little place to stay , maybe a familly with two kids. Nice area, downtown Lahaina, beautifull!!
Great location only minutes from restaurants and sights. Condo backed out directly into main pool area which was great.
Great location!

name: Just Steps from the Ocean at Premier Platinum Townhouse Puamana 64-1
summary: Relax Hawaiian Style in Gated Community on Oceanfront Property. Call us NOW for Special March Rates!
space: ***NOTE: THE OCEAN INFINITY POOL ("POOL 1"0 WILL BE CLOSED FOR REPAIRS 4/9-4/15/19. ALTERNATE POOLS ("POOL 2" AND "POOL 3") WILL REMAIN OPEN. Come stay with us and enjoy island living Puamana-style! Swim and surf at the beach, soak up the sun and cool off in the oceanfront pool, play tennis, or relax under the coconut trees and enjoy stunning sunset views of Lanai’i, Kahoolawe, and Molokai.   Relax and enjoy Coconut Condos Premier Platinum 2bd/2ba Puamana townhouse in Lahaina, Maui.  1,150 sq. ft. townhouse includes a king bed in the master bedroom, a queen sofa sleeper in the family room and two twin beds in the upstairs loft to accommodate up to 6 guests. Private lanai with BBQ grill and table. description: Relax Hawaiian Style in Gated Community on Oceanfront Property. Call us NOW for Special March Rates! ***NOTE: THE OCEAN INFINITY POOL ("POOL 1"0 WILL BE CLOSED FOR REPAIRS 4/9-4/15/19. ALTERNATE POOLS ("POOL 2" AND "POOL 3") WILL REMAIN OPEN. Come stay with us and enjoy island living Puamana-style! Swim and surf at the beach, soak up the sun and cool off in the oceanfront pool, play tennis, or relax under the coconut trees and enjoy stunning sunset views of Lanai’i, Kahoolawe, and Molokai.   Relax and enjoy Coconut Condos Premier Platinum 2bd/2ba Puamana townhouse in Lahaina, Maui.  1,150 sq. ft. townhouse includes a king bed in the master bedroom, a queen sofa sleeper in the family room and two twin beds in the upstairs loft to accommodate up to 6 guests. Private lanai with BBQ grill and table.
